T02D2589:156a-1: ga ga n'a ma la su pa ri shuddho dharmma dh'a tu dzny'a na garbha n'a ma /
T02D2589:156a-3: nam mkha' dri ma med pa shin tu yongs su

T02D2589:156a-6: dkyil 'khor thams cad bsdus par gyur pa //

T02D2589:156a-10: shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen

T02D2589:156b-0: sgo @156b khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su //
T02D2589:156b-1: rdo rje rin chen spras bar ni //
T02D2589:156b-2: dkyil 'khor phyi rol thig gdab po //

T02D2589:156b-8: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lngas brgyan la //
T02D2589:156b-9: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni /

T02D2589:156b-12: dag pa thams cad rab tu gnas //
T02D2589:156b-13: de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni //

T02D2589:156b-17: chags bral la sogs chags pa che //
T02D2589:156b-19: skra mchog chen po mthon ka'i rtse //
T02D2589:156b-20: sangs rgyas rin chen cod pan ldan //
T02D2589:156b-21: zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa //
T02D2589:156b-22: sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan //

T02D2589:156b-26: dpe byad brgyad cus yang dag brgyan //
T02D2589:156b-27: chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ches //
T02D2589:156b-28: phyag gnyis dag ni rnam par brgyan //
T02D2589:156b-29: ral gri mda' dang rdo rje yis //
T02D2589:156b-30: g-yas pa'i phyag mchog rnam par mdzes /
T02D2589:156b-31: shes rab pha rol phyin dang gzhu //
T02D2589:156b-32: rdo rje dril mchog g-yon pa na //
T02D2589:156b-33: dri med dpe bral bsam mi khyab //
T02D2589:156b-34: shes rab ye shes dri ma med //
T02D2589:156b-35: mgon po sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos //
T02D2589:156b-36: dkyil 'khor mdun gyi gtso gyur la //
T02D2589:156b-37: rdzogs sangs rdo rje'i skyil krung bcas //
T02D2589:156b-38: 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni nges par dgod /

T02D2589:156b-46: gtsug tor rnam rgyal byang phyogs su //

T02D2589:157a-2: sngags rnams kun la'ang sgrub pa po //
T02D2589:157a-3: 'khor lo can ni de dag bri //
T02D2589:157a-4: rdo rje shugs kyis song nas su //
T02D2589:157a-5: dkyil 'khor bzhi po dag tu ni //
T02D2589:157a-6: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhi //
T02D2589:157a-7: sangs rgyas thams cad dgod par bya //
T02D2589:157a-8: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'ang //

T02D2589:157a-15: rab tu 'bad de bri bar bya //
T02D2589:157a-16: sgo rnams su yang sgo srung ni //

T02D2589:157a-18: rdo rje slob dpon blo ldan pas //

T02D2589:157a-20: rdo rje shugs kyis byung nas ni //
T02D2589:157a-21: dkyil 'khor mchog ni gnyis pa ru /

T02D2589:157a-28: pha rol phyin pa thams cad bri //
T02D2589:157a-29: nub tu dbang rnams bcu po ste //
T02D2589:157a-30: byang du gzungs ni thams cad bri //
T02D2589:157a-31: de bzhin mtshams su sgeg mo sogs //
T02D2589:157a-32: dngos grub bde ba kun sogs pa //

T02D2589:157a-34: rdo rje shugs kyis byung nas su //
T02D2589:157a-35: dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum par ni //
T02D2589:157a-36: bskal ba bzang po thams cad dang //
T02D2589:157a-37: de bzhin sgo srung rnams kyang bri //
T02D2589:157a-38: rdo rje me to ga la sogs pa'ang //
T02D2589:157a-39: go rims ji bzhin bri bar bya //
T02D2589:157a-40: de yi pho brang phyi rol bri //
T02D2589:157a-41: phyi rol rdo rje rigs kyis gnas //
T02D2589:157a-42: zlum zhing kun du bzang ba dang //
T02D2589:157a-43: sgo bzhi shin tu mdzes par yang //
T02D2589:157a-44: der ni tshangs pa la sogs pa //
T02D2589:157a-45: chung ma la sogs tshogs kyis brgyan //
T02D2589:157a-46: rgyan dang rang gi mtshan mar ldan //
T02D2589:157a-47: kun du rim bzhin legs par bri //
T02D2589:157a-48: phyi sgo'i shar gyi cha la ni //
T02D2589:157a-49: gshin rje gshed po'i phyag rgya che //
T02D2589:157a-50: thams cad bsrungs la rab brtson pa //

T02D2589:157a-56: phyag rgya chen po lho phyogs su //
T02D2589:157a-57: khro bo chen po rta mgrin gyi /

T02D2589:157b-0: rdo @157b rje 'jigs byed spyan gyis ni //

T02D2589:157b-42: rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis rta'i gdan la bzhugs pa //
T02D2589:157b-43: phyag g-yas rnams na rdo rje dang /
T02D2589:157b-47: phyag g-yon rnams na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang /
T02D2589:157b-49: gzhu dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o //

T02D2589:157b-55: zhal sgeg pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa dmar po dang nag po dang /

T02D2589:158a-10: khro bo chen po bcom ldan 'das don yod grub

T02D2589:158a-16: kha dog nag po g-yas pa zhi ba /
T02D2589:158a-17: kha dog dkar po rgyab sgeg pa /
T02D2589:158a-19: g-yon pa zhi ba'i tshul can mdog dkar po //
T02D2589:158a-20: phyag g-yas pa rnams ral gri dang rdo rje dang //

T02D2589:158a-26: rang gi gdan gyi seng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs par bya'o //
T02D2589:158a-27: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'ang sna tshogs rgyan dang gos 'chang ba //
T02D2589:158a-28: dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni //
T02D2589:158a-29: go rims ji bzhin bri bar bya //
T02D2589:158a-31: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor de nyid du //
T02D2589:158a-32: bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la dbang
T02D2589:158a-33: ldan gyi phyogs su rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog
T02D2589:158a-34: dkar po / phyag g-yas kyis rang gi thugs kar rdo rje bstod pa'i tshul gyis bsnams pa //
T02D2589:158a-35: g-yon bsnyems pas dril bu bsnams pa'o //
T02D2589:158a-36: padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rje'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa //
T02D2589:158a-37: rdo rje sems dpa'i gdan dang /
T02D2589:158a-39: dbu rgyan gyi nges pa ni rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa dang /
T02D2589:158a-40: thun mong yin la khyad par rnams ni bri bar bya ste /
T02D2589:158a-41: rdo rje rgyal po sku mdog ser po rdo rje dang lcags kyu 'dren zhing bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2589:158a-42: rdo rje chags pa sku mdog mar po mda' dang gzhu bsnams pa'o //
T02D2589:158a-43: rdo rje legs pa margad kyi mdog chan phyag gnyis kyis legs so zhes bya ba stsol ba'o //
T02D2589:158a-44: bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor du //
T02D2589:158a-45: rdo rje rin chen sku mdog ser po rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas su /
T02D2589:158a-46: phyag gnyis kyis dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba 'ching zhing bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2589:158a-47: rdo rje nyi ma sku mdog dmar po /

T02D2589:158b-1: phyag gnyis yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o //

T02D2589:158b-3: so'i phreng ba gnyis dang ldan pa'i rdo rje gnyis pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D2589:158b-4: bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor du rdo rje chos sku mdog dmar skya //
T02D2589:158b-5: phyag g-yon pa bsnyems pas padma'i sdong bu 'dzin cing phyag g-yas pas padma'i 'dab ma kha 'byed pa'o //
T02D2589:158b-6: rdo rje rnon po ni 'dir sku mdog gur gum lta bu phyag g-yas kyis ral gri 'phyar ba //
T02D2589:158b-7: phyag g-yon pas thugs kar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa'o //

T02D2589:158b-10: phyag g-yon pas dung bsnams pa'o //
T02D2589:158b-11: bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02D2589:158b-12: rdo rje las sku mdog ljang gu phyag gnyis na
T02D2589:158b-13: rdo rje rtse gsum pa bsnams nas spyi bor 'jog
T02D2589:158b-14: cing de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa'i don
T02D2589:158b-15: du gar mdzad cing bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2589:158b-16: rdo rje srung ba sku mdog ser po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje go cha bsnams pa'o //
T02D2589:158b-17: rdo rje gnod sbyin sku mdog nag po phyag gnyis
T02D2589:158b-18: kyis mche ba gnyis rang gi zhal du 'dzin cing
T02D2589:158b-19: gdug pa thams cad 'jigs par mdzad pas bzhugs pa'o
T02D2589:158b-20: // rdo rje khu tshur sku mdog dkar po phyag
T02D2589:158b-21: gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshur bsdams nas bzhugs pa'o
T02D2589:158b-22: // // mtshams rnams su spyan ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang 'dra'o //
T02D2589:158b-23: m'a ma k'i ni mi bskyod pa dang 'dra'o //
T02D2589:158b-24: gos dkar mo ni 'od dpag tu med pa dang 'dra'o //
T02D2589:158b-25: sgrol ma ni don yod par grub pa dong 'dra'o //
T02D2589:158b-26: sems ma bcu drug ni kun du bzang mo dang /
T02D2589:158b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa'i lcags kyu mo dang /
T02D2589:158b-28: dga' la chags ma dang legs ldan ma ste rdo rje rigs kyi'o //

T02D2589:159a-0: @159a * // 'di'i lugs kyis spyan ma la rdo rje rigs kyi sems dpas bskor //
T02D2589:159a-1: m'a ma k'i la rin po che'i rigs kyi sems dpa' bzhis bskor //

T02D2589:159a-5: babs med pa'o // lhag ma ni phyi'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2589:159a-6: de'i shar gyi sgor rdo rje lcags kyu sku mdog
T02D2589:159a-7: dkar po rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams pa g-yas brkyang
T02D2589:159a-8: bas bzhugs pa'o // lho'i sgor rdo rje zhags pa

T02D2589:159a-10: bsnams pa g-yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2589:159a-11: nub kyi sgor rdo rje lcags sgrog sku mdog dmar
T02D2589:159a-12: po phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje lu gu rgyud bsnams
T02D2589:159a-13: pa sa ga'i 'dug stangs kyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2589:159a-14: byang phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje 'bebs pa sku mdog
T02D2589:159a-15: ljang gu phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje bsdams pas rdo
T02D2589:159a-16: rje dang dril bu bsnams pa zlum po'i 'dug stabs
T02D2589:159a-17: kyis bzhugs par bri bar bya ste nang gi dkyil
T02D2589:159a-18: 'khor ro // gnyis pa nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi nyis 'gyur te gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2589:159a-19: gnyis pa der yang shar phyogs su sa bcu gnyis bri bar bya ste /
T02D2589:159a-20: kun kyang sna tshogs padma la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa //

T02D2589:159a-22: phyag g-yas na rdo rje bsnams pa //
T02D2589:159a-23: phyag g-yon na rang gi mtshan ma bsnams pa'o //

T02D2589:159a-25: padma ltar dmar ba phyag g-yon na padma dmar po
T02D2589:159a-26: bsnams pa'o // rab tu dga' ba'i sa ni rin po che padma r'i ga'i mdog can /

T02D2589:165b-10: nor sbyin ni mdog dmar po /
T02D2589:165b-11: rnam thos sras ni mdog ser po pi tsi gu
T02D2589:165b-12: nda li mdog dmar po ki li mi li mdog
T02D2589:165b-13: ljang gu sgo'i dbang po mdog ser po /
T02D2589:165b-14: sbyong pa'i dbang po mdog ser po /
T02D2589:165b-15: 'phrog ma gser gyi mdog can de la bu dang bcas pas pa'o //
T02D2589:165b-16: de dag thams cad kyang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bri'o //
T02D2589:165b-17: tha skar sku ma dog dkar po /
T02D2589:165b-27: bre mdog pri yang ku ltar ljang ser /
T02D2589:165b-44: nam gru mdog ser skya ste /
T02D2589:165b-45: rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag thams cad kyang rgyan dang ldan zhing gos gyon pa /
T02D2589:165b-47: bud med kyi gzugs su bri'o //
T02D2589:165b-48: tshangs pa ma ni tshangs pa dang 'dra bar bri'o //
T02D2589:165b-49: drag po ma ni drag po lta bu'o //
T02D2589:165b-50: khyab 'jug ma ni khyab 'jug lta bu'o //
T02D2589:165b-51: gzhon nu ma ni k'a rti ka lta bu'o //
T02D2589:165b-52: dpang po ma ni brgya byin lta bu'o //
T02D2589:165b-53: phag mo ni mdog nag po ste /
T02D2589:165b-56: thod pa lag na thogs pa'o //
T02D2589:165b-57: dga' bying ma ni mdog dmar po yi dgas la zhon pa /
T02D2589:165b-58: k'a ti ra dang thod pa lag na thogs pa'o //
T02D2589:165b-59: de dang nyi ba nyid du bri dga'i ri ti bri ste /
T02D2589:165b-60: ma mo bdun bhri nggi ri ti dang bcas par bri bar bya'o //
T02D2589:165b-61: tshogs kyi bdag po ni mdog dkar po lag pa bzhi pa /
T02D2589:166a-0: @166a * // glang po che'i mdog can lag pa g-yas dang g-yon pa na la du dang la phug thogs pa //
T02D2589:166a-1: de las gzhan pa gnyis nam dung rtse gsum dang dgra sta thogs pa //
T02D2589:166a-4: tshogs ru mas yongs su bskor ba bri bar bya'o //
T02D2589:166a-5: lha gzhan dag kyang gzhal yas khang na gnas par bri'o //
T02D2589:166a-6: 'dir yang sgo srung rnams ni rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa de dag nyid yin no //
T02D2589:166a-7: de ltar na nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa
T02D2589:166a-8: shin tu yongs su dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi
T02D2589:166a-9: ye shes kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen po sems
T02D2589:166a-10: can thams cad kyi sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa'i
T02D2589:166a-12: ma tshad ba med par bsgrub pa la sangs rgyas
T02D2589:166a-13: nyid la sogs pa'i 'bras bu mngon par 'dod pa
T02D2589:166a-14: rnams kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la sogs pas
T02D2589:166a-15: mngon par 'dod pa'i don rdzogs par 'gyur pas dkyil
T02D2589:166a-16: 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi cho
T02D2589:166a-17: ga mdor bsdus nas bri bar bya'o //
T02D2589:166a-18: de nas sngar nam mkha' dri ma med pa shin tu yongs su dag pa //
T02D2589:166a-19: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi snying po zhes
T02D2589:166a-20: bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur zhing rjes
T02D2589:166a-21: su gnang ba thob pa'i slob dpon gyis gang gi
T02D2589:166a-22: tshe / slob mas lan gnyis lan gsum du gsol ba btab par gyur na //
T02D2589:166a-23: de'i tshe 'di ltar yid la bya ste /
T02D2589:166a-24: ngas chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis bsdu bas sems can thams cad bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D2589:166a-25: 'di la yang bla na med pa yang dag par
T02D2589:166a-26: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sbyin par bya'o zhes bsam mo
T02D2589:166a-27: // de nas slob ma de la che ge mo
T02D2589:166a-28: zhes bya ba khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2589:166a-29: kyi ye shes kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen por
T02D2589:166a-30: 'jug par 'dod dam zhes dri bar bya'o //
T02D2589:166a-31: gal te bdag 'tshal lo zhes zer na //
T02D2589:166a-32: des kyang dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad tshogs sam /
T02D2589:166a-33: 'on te ma yin zhes dri bar bya'o //
T02D2589:166a-34: gal te cung zad ni chogs so zer na /
T02D2589:166a-35: de nas de'i lte bar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de'i
T02D2589:166a-36: steng du 'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun du
T02D2589:166a-37: 'khrigs pa'i yi ge h'um bsam pa dang /
T02D2589:166a-38: snying gar yang las kyi sgrib pa'i ngo bo yi ge ka nag /
T02D2589:166a-39: bor bsams la yi ge h'um gi 'bar ba'i 'od
T02D2589:166a-40: kyis gyen du 'byin par byed cang sna bug g-yas
T02D2589:166a-41: pa nas nges par 'byung ba ni gcer bu gzugs
T02D2589:166a-42: mi sdug pa gsus pa 'phyang ba /
T02D2589:166a-43: skra gyen du brdzes pa byung ba dang /
T02D2589:166a-44: yi ge h'um yang snying gar phyin pa dang /
T02D2589:166a-45: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyi snang bur de
T02D2589:166b-0: nyid nas byung nas @166b gsang sngags de za bar
T02D2589:166b-2: aom badzra yaksha kh'a da ya kh'a da ya //
T02D2589:166b-3: sarba p'a pam a'a ba ra na a'a sya h'um phat /
T02D2589:166b-4: yang na h'um las byung ba'i ro stod khro bo'i
T02D2589:166b-5: gzugs la ro smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i dbyibs
T02D2589:166b-6: su gnas pa'i phur bus gsang sngags 'di dang de
T02D2589:166b-7: nyid du phur bus gdab bar bya'o //
T02D2589:166b-8: aom badzra k'i li k'i la ya //
T02D2589:166b-9: sarba bigh'am bandha bandha h'um phat //
T02D2589:166b-10: de nas slob ma de sam las byung ba'i kun du bzang po'i gzugs su bsams la /
T02D2589:166b-11: de'i sbi bor ham phyung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje bsrung ba'i don du bsam par bya ste //
T02D2589:166b-12: de ltar byas na mang gi bdag nyid can gyi bgegs rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2589:166b-13: yo byad ma tshogs pa rnams kyang bde blag tu tshang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2589:166b-14: slob ma yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D2589:166b-15: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas grog mkhar gyis dang /
T02D2589:166b-16: skra dang phub ma la sogs pa las rang rang gi phyogs skyong gi gzugs brnyan bya ste /
T02D2589:166b-17: dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs byed pa rnams sngags 'dis bkug la bcug ste /
T02D2589:166b-18: bcings la phur bus legs par btab ste /
T02D2589:166b-19: h'um bzhi ba'i sngags bzlas pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnun la gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2589:166b-20: khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis rgyab sbyar ba byas la mthe'u chung gnyis lcags sgrog lta bur mdud de /
T02D2589:166b-21: mdzub mo g-yas pa lcags kyur byas la bzhag pa
T02D2589:166b-22: ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ste sngags la
T02D2589:166b-23: / aom badzra aam gu sha ma h'a kro dha a'a karsha ya sarba sa ma yam h'um dza:/
T02D2589:166b-24: de nyid dang mdzub mo gnyis rtse sprad nas zhags
T02D2589:166b-25: pa dang 'dra bar bzhag pa ni rdo rje zhags
T02D2589:166b-27: sngags la aom badzra p'a sha ma h'a kro dha
T02D2589:166b-28: par be sha ya sarba sa ma ya h'um h'um
T02D2589:166b-29: / de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis lu gu rgyud
T02D2589:166b-30: ltar mdud pa ni rdo rje lcags sgrig gi phyag
T02D2589:166b-32: aom badzra spho ta ma h'a kro dha bandha ya sarba sa ma ya h'um bam /
T02D2589:166b-33: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcing
T02D2589:166b-34: sa la de rnams kyi mgo la yi ge h'um
T02D2589:166b-35: bkod de / snga ma bzhin du rdo rje thur bu bskyed la /
T02D2589:166b-36: rkad [*rkang?] pa'i mthar thug pa'i bar phur bus gdab par bsams te /
T02D2589:166b-37: bka' bsgo ba'i tshul gyis sngags 'di brjod par bya'o//
T02D2589:166b-38: aom badzra k'i li k'i la ya sarba bighnam bandha h'um phat /
T02D2589:166b-39: de nas badzra k'i li k'i la ru ta ma ta /
T02D2589:166b-40: zhes bya ba lan bdun bzlas pa'i yungs kar yi
T02D2589:166b-41: ge h'um 'bar pa lta bus brdeg par bya ste
T02D2589:166b-42: / chog 'di ni ji srid dkyil 'khor zhag gi
T02D2589:166b-43: bar du nyin te zhing nyi ma kung la bya'o
T02D2589:167a-3: // / de nas yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas
T02D2589:167a-4: su spos chu la sogs pas nye bar byugs shing
T02D2589:167a-5: me tog sil ma gtor la bdug spos dri zhim
T02D2589:167a-7: ci snyed pa'i mchod pa rnam pa lda dang ldan
T02D2589:167a-8: pa dag tu stan nang tshangs can 'jam pa la
T02D2589:167a-9: 'dug ste / sngags 'di dag gis sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2589:167a-10: aom barba p'a pam ka po ka pi ka po
T02D2589:167a-11: ci ka man so bh'a tam r'a ga de sha
T02D2589:167a-12: mo ha m'a da man aa bhishthi na ya rkri
T02D2589:167a-13: tam tre k'a li kam / h'um h'um h'um h'um
T02D2589:167a-15: sarb p'a pa spo ta y'a mi sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:167a-16: aom sarba p'a pam pra ti de sha mi sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:167a-17: sarba ta th'a ga ta nam /
T02D2589:167a-18: aa tma bha ba na ni ry'a ta y'a mi ;
T02D2589:167a-19: sarba ta th'a ga ta pra ti krihnan tu mam sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:167a-20: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pu nye dznya na
T02D2589:167a-21: sam bha ram aa nu mo de y'a mi sv'a
T02D2589:167a-22: h'a / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sa manta
T02D2589:167a-23: bha dra ma h'a badzra sa ma ya ma h'a
T02D2589:167a-24: bo dhi tsi tto tp'a ta mutpa da ya mi
T02D2589:167a-25: h'a / sv'a h'a / de nas aom sarba ta
T02D2589:167a-26: tha'a ga ta shvan si ta sarba sa ta dh'a
T02D2589:167a-27: h'a / sv'a h'a / nam / sarba siddha ya
T02D2589:167a-28: sam pa na dyan tam sarba ta th'a ga ta
T02D2589:167a-30: sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dha rm'a:sv'a bh'a ba shu ddho& ham /
T02D2589:167a-31: zhes bya bas phyi deng nang gi chos thams cad
T02D2589:167a-32: gzod ma nas ma skyes pa rang bzhin gyis yongs
T02D2589:167a-33: su dag pa nam mkha' dang mnyam par bsgom par
T02D2589:167a-34: bya'o // de nas bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
T02D2589:167a-35: tshogs kyis bsgom pa'i sems nyid nam mkha'i ngos kyi
T02D2589:167a-36: dbus su chud pa 'od kyi dra ba chen po
T02D2589:167a-37: dang ldan pa'i padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du
T02D2589:167a-38: gyur pa la de'i steng du shes rab dang thabs
T02D2589:167a-39: kyi bdag nyid can gyi yi ge mu kha dog
T02D2589:167a-40: bya'o // dmar skya / de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba'o //
T02D2589:167a-41: de yongs su gyur pa las rje btsun 'jam dpal zla ba lta bu'i sku dang ldan pa /
T02D2589:167a-42: padma dang zla ba'i steng du rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa //
T02D2589:167a-43: phyag g-yas gnyis na ral gri dang /
T02D2589:167a-45: phyag g-yon gnyis na shes rab kyi pha rol du
T02D2589:167a-46: phyin pa'i glegs bam dang gzhu bsnams pa nyid de
T02D2589:167a-47: / shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs //
T02D2589:167a-49: sangs rgyas lda'i cod pan can mnga' ba //
T02D2589:167a-50: byis pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2589:167a-51: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
T02D2589:167a-54: rig pa'i lha mo thams cad spro ba dang /
T02D2589:167b-0: bsdu ba'i bdag nyid can du bdag nyid @167b rnam par bsams la //
T02D2589:167b-1: snying ga dang smin mtshams dang /
T02D2589:167b-2: lkog ma dang spyi bo rnams su rdo rje dang rin po che dang /
T02D2589:167b-3: padma dang sna tshogs rdo rje dag la rdo rje sems ma dang /
T02D2589:167b-6: las kyi sems ma'i ngo bo nyid de //
T02D2589:167b-7: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab par bdag nyid rnam par bsams la //
T02D2589:167b-10: de nas mdun du yi ge hr'i: las padma aa
T02D2589:167b-11: las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la ye shes sems
T02D2589:167b-12: dpa' rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas bkug la
T02D2589:167b-13: bcings te / dbang du bya ba nas mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dang /
T02D2589:167b-17: dri la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2589:167b-18: lta ba nyid du byas nas de bzhin du mchod
T02D2589:167b-19: cing dbang bskur la rang gi lus la gzhug par
T02D2589:167b-20: bya ste / ye shes sems dpa' de bltas nas
T02D2589:167b-21: rang gi lus la rnam par bsgom zhes gsungs pa'i
T02D2589:167b-22: bya ste / phyir ro // de nas gcig tu
T02D2589:167b-23: gyur pas rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan
T02D2589:167b-24: pa mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02D2589:167b-25: dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pas de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2589:167b-26: thams cad la sogs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D2589:167b-27: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sprul par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2589:167b-28: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur
T02D2589:167b-29: bar bdag nyid shes nas rdo rje nas rdo rje
T02D2589:167b-31: gan rkyal du khar bzhag ste /
T02D2589:167b-32: thams cad bskor la sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2589:167b-33: aom badzra tsa kra h'um phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la /
T02D2589:167b-34: mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar byas pa ni rdo rje 'khor lo'o //
T02D2589:167b-35: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ma lus pa mngon sum bzhin du yang dag par bltas la /
T02D2589:167b-36: 'og nas bshad pa'i mchod pa'i khyad par rnams kyis legs par mchod de /
T02D2589:167b-37: rje btsun gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa thun
T02D2589:167b-38: bzhi'i rim gyis ji srid du mthong bar gyur pa
T02D2589:167b-39: de srid du bzla bar bya ba'am //
T02D2589:167b-41: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir rmi lam mthong gi bar du /
T02D2589:167b-42: aom badzra t'i kashna zhes bya ba la sogs pa'am /
T02D2589:167b-43: gsang sngags gzhan dag bzla ba'am /
T02D2589:168a-0: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa spro ba dang @168a * //
T02D2589:168a-1: bsdu ba'i bdag nyid can skad cig ma'i ye shes
T02D2589:168a-2: las byung ba'i rje btsun 'jam dpal du bdag nyid
T02D2589:168a-3: bsams la / dngos po thams cad kyi ngo bo
T02D2589:168a-4: nyid sems tsam gyi sprul pa khong du chud pas
T02D2589:168a-5: sems kyi sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo yang
T02D2589:168a-6: dag par bltas la ji srid mtshan ma byung bar
T02D2589:168a-7: gyur pa de srid kyi bar du mtshan yang dag
T02D2589:168a-8: par brjod pa bklag par bya'o //
T02D2589:168a-9: sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga mdor bsdus pa'o //
T02D2589:168a-12: lo te nyid du ji ltar mngon par dga' bar
T02D2589:168a-13: bsgrub cing zla ba yar gyi do la cho ga
T02D2589:168a-14: bzhin du dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
T02D2589:168a-15: de la rgyal pos ni khru brgya 'am /
T02D2589:168a-17: blon po 'am blon po chen po rnams kyis ni khru lnga bcu 'am /
T02D2589:168a-20: tshong dpon chen po rnams kyis ni ni shu rtsa lnga'am /
T02D2589:168a-22: sgrub pa po rnams kyis ni khru bcu gnyis sam /
T02D2589:168a-25: de la dang por re zhig yo byad thams cad
T02D2589:168a-26: yang dag par ldan pas mngon par 'dod pa'i dkyil
T02D2589:168a-27: 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su mi rus kyi phye ma'i
T02D2589:168a-28: sbyin sreg gis dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs mngon par bsal
T02D2589:168a-29: la / bdag dang slob ma la sogs pas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2589:168a-30: de nas sa spyad bar bya ste /
T02D2589:168a-31: 'dom gang tsam mam khru gang tsam 'og tu brkos
T02D2589:168a-32: la dri zhi ma po'i chus gtor ba'i sas slar
T02D2589:168a-33: bkang la / rdo rje rtse mos mngon par bsngags pa'i spos chus chag chag btab ste /
T02D2589:168a-34: kun du brdungs la shin tu mnyam pa khang pa
T02D2589:168a-35: brtsegs pa'i nang du chud pa rta babs bzhis mdzes
T02D2589:168a-36: par byas la / sgo bzhi dang skar khung dra
T02D2589:168a-37: ba can la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba la
T02D2589:168a-38: mtha' ma rnams su legs par bris shing dril bu
T02D2589:168a-39: btags pa'i rgyal mtshan bzang po gzugs pa dang /
T02D2589:168a-40: bla re dam pa bri ba dang /
T02D2589:168a-41: sangs rgyas rin po che la sogs pa'i ras ris
T02D2589:168a-42: kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa ba'i lci bas
T02D2589:168a-43: dang dag par sbyangs shing dros nye bar byugs pa
T02D2589:168a-44: dang / mtshams bzhir spos khang bzhag pa dang /
T02D2589:168a-45: me tog dang gos la sogs pas nye bar mdzes par byas la //
T02D2589:168a-46: lag pa sa la bzhag se /
T02D2589:168b-0: yi ge brgya pa lan bdun yongs su bzlas par @168b bya'o //
T02D2589:168b-1: de nas khrus byas shing dris byugs la gos dmar po'i stod g-yogs dang /
T02D2589:168b-2: ze'u ka bcings la me tog gi phreng ba gdags
T02D2589:168b-3: shing gdong dri zhim pos byugs la gdu bu dang
T02D2589:168b-4: / rna rgyan la sogs pas bdag nyid legs par brgyan te /
T02D2589:168b-5: zla ba nya ba nas brtsams nas /
T02D2589:168b-6: phyi ma'i nya'i bar du dkyil 'khor gyi las byas pa'am //
T02D2589:168b-7: yar gyi ngo la tshes gcig nas brtsams pa'am //
T02D2589:168b-8: de bzhin nyid tshes brgyad dang /
T02D2589:168b-10: tshes bcu gsum dang tshes bcu bzhi rnams la brtsams nas nya'i bar du'am /
T02D2589:168b-11: snga dro'i dus su brtsams nas bya'o //
T02D2589:168b-12: de la dang por dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su
T02D2589:168b-13: 'dug la bgegs bsal ba la sogs pa bya ste
T02D2589:168b-14: / sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug nas /
T02D2589:168b-15: de nyid kyis na rdo rje gzung //
T02D2589:168b-16: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02D2589:168b-17: dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya cher //
T02D2589:168b-18: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla //
T02D2589:168b-19: de ltar mchog tu dam tshig gsum thob pa'i slob
T02D2589:168b-20: dpon gyis rang gi phyag rgyas rdo rje dang dril
T02D2589:168b-21: bu bzung la // sems can thams cad la phan pa'i cho ga'i bya ba byas te /
T02D2589:168b-22: rtog pa kun la yang dag 'jug / dkyil 'khor thams cad bsgrub pa ni //
T02D2589:168b-23: dam tshig chen po gsum zhes bya //
T02D2589:168b-25: dngos grub cho ga thams cad la //
T02D2589:168b-26: rdo rje dril bu rab bskul bas //
T02D2589:168b-27: cho ga lhag gam ma tshang yang //
T02D2589:168b-29: de yang dang po sa'i lha mo yi ge pam
T02D2589:168b-30: las byung ba lag na bum pa thogs pa rgyan
T02D2589:168b-31: thams cad kyis brgyan pa bsams la //
T02D2589:168b-33: me tog la sogs pas mchod nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D2589:168b-34: de la phyag rgya dang sngags 'di yin te /
T02D2589:168b-35: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis rgyab sbyar la mdzub mo dang /
T02D2589:168b-36: mthe'u chung gnyis mdud pa bya ba ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2589:168b-39: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2589:168b-40: spyod pa'i tshul gyi khyad par dang //
T02D2589:168b-41: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
T02D2589:168b-42: lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur //
T02D2589:168b-43: sh'a kya seng ge skyob pa yis //
T02D2589:168b-44: ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa //
T02D2589:168b-45: de bzhin bdag gis bdud kyi sde //
T02D2589:169a-3: de nas de nyid du thim par gyur par bsams la /
T02D2589:169a-4: de'i steng du rdo rje bcing ga ba thur du bstan te bcings la bzhag ste /
T02D2589:169a-7: de nas rdo rje bcing ba las byung ba'i hum
T02D2589:169a-8: 'bar ba'i tshogs kyi sa gzhi gtan pa la thug
T02D2589:169a-9: gi bar du rdo rjer gyur par rnam par bsams
T02D2589:169a-12: de nas dang po'i sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2589:169a-13: rgyal mchog dang las kyi rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i
T02D2589:169a-14: ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom par bya ste /
T02D2589:169a-15: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid can //
T02D2589:169a-16: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gzugs su 'og min
T02D2589:169a-17: gyi gzhal yas khang na gnas nas mngon par byang
T02D2589:169a-18: chub mngon sum du byed cing /
T02D2589:169a-19: mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs par rim pa 'dis bsam par bya ste /
T02D2589:169a-20: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba'am //
T02D2589:169a-21: phyin ci ma log par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T02D2589:169a-22: byang chub pa'i man ngag sbyin par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2589:169a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'dus
T02D2589:169a-24: par gyur nas // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
T02D2589:169a-25: chen po don zhes bya ba byang chub kyi snying
T02D2589:169a-26: por bzhugs pa gang na bder gshegs te /
T02D2589:169a-27: byang chub sems dpa' de la ched du bya ba
T02D2589:169a-28: rdzogs pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku bstan nas 'di
T02D2589:169a-30: rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang gis de bzhin gshegs
T02D2589:169a-31: pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid ma rtogs
T02D2589:169a-32: par bka' ba spyad pa thams cad la spro ba
T02D2589:169a-33: bskyed cing // ji ltar bla na med pa yang
T02D2589:169a-34: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
T02D2589:169a-35: bya snyam zhes gsung shing gan du byon te /
T02D2589:169a-36: badzrod tishtha zhes bya ba'i sngags dang /
T02D2589:169a-37: se go la brdabs pas slong bar mdzad par bsam mo //
T02D2589:169a-38: de nas langs nas mchog tu dad pas //
T02D2589:169a-39: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya b'a ka
T02D2589:169a-40: tsi tta badzra pra na mya na badzra bandha nam
T02D2589:169a-41: ka ro mi zhes brjod la phag byas nas 'di
T02D2589:169a-43: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bdag
T02D2589:169a-44: gis ma 'tshal na de kho na nyid ji lta
T02D2589:169a-45: bu lags / de ltar na bsgrub par bgyi //
T02D2589:169b-1: de nas rigs kyi bu rang gi sems la so sor rtog cing mnyam par zhog la /
T02D2589:169b-2: rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dgar bzlas
T02D2589:169b-3: shing bsgrub par gyis shig / ces gsung zhing sems
T02D2589:169b-4: so sor rtogs pa'i man dag de stsol bar bsam
T02D2589:169b-6: aom tsi tta pra ti be dham ka ro mi zhes bya ba phung po dang /
T02D2589:169b-8: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba //
T02D2589:169b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang gnyis su med
T02D2589:169b-10: pa de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs
T02D2589:169b-11: pa de'i bdag nyid kyi sems so sor rtogs pa
T02D2589:169b-12: dang / sems kyi rin po che de nyid snying rje chen pos brgyan pa //
T02D2589:169b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid can //
T02D2589:169b-14: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bu rang gi snying gar bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2589:169b-15: de nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02D2589:169b-16: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bdag
T02D2589:169b-17: gi snying ga na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur
T02D2589:169b-18: gda' ba bdag gis rtogs so //
T02D2589:169b-19: de nas rigs kyi bu sems de ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas na /
T02D2589:169b-20: de lta bur sbyangs pa de ltar 'gyur te /
T02D2589:169b-21: dper na ras dkar po la tshon gyis bsgyur ba bzhin no zhes bka' stsal nas /
T02D2589:169b-22: slar yang byang chub kyi sems kyi man ngag ston par mdzad par bsam pa ni /
T02D2589:169b-23: aom bo shi tsi tta autpa'a da 'a mi zhes bya'o //
T02D2589:169b-24: de nas shin tu 'od gsal ba'i sems zla ba'i
T02D2589:169b-25: dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par yongs su gyur pa las
T02D2589:169b-26: // rim gyis nye bar 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2589:169b-27: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par gyur to //
T02D2589:169b-28: de nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
T02D2589:169b-29: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba gad lags
T02D2589:169b-30: pa de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du mthong
T02D2589:169b-32: shin tu rnam par dag cing nam mkha' ltar dri
T02D2589:169b-33: ma med pa la spros pa thams cad par bral
T02D2589:169b-34: ba me long lta bur rnam par gnas so //
T02D2589:169b-35: aom dznya' na shashmi pri si dza h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis rnam par spros te /
T02D2589:169b-36: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang ba las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs par gang zhing byung ste /
T02D2589:169b-37: byung ba de rnams chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhal yas
T02D2589:169b-38: khang du zhugs nas zhes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad
T02D2589:170a-1: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi ri bo'i rtse mo bcom ste /
T02D2589:170a-2: rtogs par byas nas rdo rje chen po'i gzugs gcig tu gyur nas byung ste /
T02D2589:170a-3: rtse lda pa spyi bo nas thugs kar bzhugs te /
T02D2589:170a-4: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu gnas so //
T02D2589:170a-5: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying
T02D2589:170a-6: po sems bskyed pa kun du bzang po khyod kyis
T02D2589:170a-7: mngon sum du gyur gyis de legs par sgrubs shig
T02D2589:170a-8: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sems bskyed
T02D2589:170a-9: pa kun du bzang po de bstan par bya ba'i
T02D2589:170a-10: phyir // sngags 'dis rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i
T02D2589:170a-11: dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i dbyibs su soms shig /
T02D2589:170a-12: phyir // aom tishtha badzra / yang sngags 'dis spro bar bya'o //
T02D2589:170a-16: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta dzny'a na badzra h'um h'um /
T02D2589:170a-18: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du
T02D2589:170a-19: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na rdo rjer bdag
T02D2589:170a-20: gis mthong ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2589:170a-21: thams cad kyi kun du bzang po'i sems rdo rje
T02D2589:170a-22: gis mthong ngo // 'di // sngags 'dis brtan par bya'o //
T02D2589:170a-24: de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par
T02D2589:170a-25: 'jug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
T02D2589:170a-26: dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dbyings ji snyed pa
T02D2589:170a-27: de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2589:170a-28: kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sems dpa'i rdo rje der
T02D2589:170a-29: zhugs so // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2589:170a-30: cad kyis rdo rje'i dbyings zhes rdo rje ming gi
T02D2589:170a-32: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku ni bdag lags par mthong ngo //
T02D2589:170a-33: sems dpa' chen po de lta bas na de bzhin
T02D2589:170a-34: gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems pa'i rdo rje de
T02D2589:170a-35: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan po'i dang
T02D2589:170a-36: rgyas kyi skur bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i
T02D2589:170a-37: sngags 'di ci dgar zlos la sgoms shig / aom
T02D2589:170a-38: ya tha sarba ta th'a ga ta sta th'a aa
T02D2589:170a-39: ham / de nas bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2589:170a-40: mngon par rdzogs par thams cad rgyas nas de bzhin
T02D2589:170a-41: gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te 'di skad
T02D2589:170a-42: ham / ces sol to // bcom ldan 'das de
T02D2589:170b-0: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad @170b kyis bdag la byin
T02D2589:170b-1: gyis rlobs la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa
T02D2589:170b-3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin
T02D2589:170b-4: gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje
T02D2589:170b-5: der zhugs so // de nas skad cig de nyid
T02D2589:170b-6: kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2589:170b-7: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par
T02D2589:170b-8: der zhugs so // sangs rgyas so // de bzhin
T02D2589:170b-9: gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i mnyam pa nyid
T02D2589:170b-10: kyi ye shes kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsang
T02D2589:170b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin
T02D2589:170b-13: po che dbang bskur pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye
T02D2589:170b-14: shes kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig tu zhugs
T02D2589:170b-15: so // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
T02D2589:170b-16: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs pas rang bzhin
T02D2589:170b-17: so // gyis dag go // de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2589:170b-18: thams cad kyi las mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
T02D2589:170b-19: gyi 'od gsal ba'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas su
T02D2589:170b-20: gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
T02D2589:170b-21: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur to //
T02D2589:170b-22: de ltar sems so sor rtogs pa nas brtsams te /
T02D2589:170b-23: dkyil 'khor ba rnams kyang rang rang gi bdag nyid dang 'dra bar 'byung bar bsam par bya ste /
T02D2589:170b-24: rang gi sems las tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2589:170b-25: yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi
T02D2589:170b-26: sems dpa'i rdo rje de las de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2589:170b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes bskyed de /
T02D2589:170b-29: nam mkha' las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur //
T02D2589:170b-30: kun du spyan ras gzigs dbang pos chos kyi ye shes bskyed //
T02D2589:170b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad la rab tu bzhag nas //
T02D2589:170b-32: dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams kyis phyogs bzhi nas yongs su bskor te /
T02D2589:170b-33: lhan cig yang dag par gnas so //
T02D2589:170b-34: de nas gzhan gyi don mdzad pa'i mngon par rdzogs
T02D2589:170b-35: par sangs rgyas pa yin pas byams pa dang snying
T02D2589:170b-36: rje'i mig gis sems can thams cad la bltas pa
T02D2589:170b-37: dang mi shes pa las 'dod chags dang /
T02D2589:171a-0: gti mug gis dkrugs par shes nas bdag 'dir @171a * //
T02D2589:171a-1: babs la skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil
T02D2589:171a-2: 'khor la sogs par sprul pas rjes su gzung bar
T02D2589:171a-3: bya'o zhes yid la nges par byas te /
T02D2589:171a-4: rim pa 'dis snod kyi 'jig rten bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2589:171a-11: de nas nam mkha' las yi ge kham las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsams la /
T02D2589:171a-12: de'i sku'i yan lag thams cad las chu'i rgyun spom
T02D2589:171a-13: po byung bas snod thams cad yongs su gang bar
T02D2589:171a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyang de nyid du thim par gyur par rnam par bsams nas /
T02D2589:171a-16: me dang chu'i bar du h'um lam h'um zhes bya ba rnam par bkod la /
T02D2589:171a-17: de bkod pa sngon du 'gro ba las sku rdo
T02D2589:171a-18: rje'i ting nge 'dzin brtan par gyur pa las gser
T02D2589:171a-20: de'i steng du h'um sum h'um zhes bya ba las ri'i rgyal po ring ba bsam mo //
T02D2589:171a-21: de'i steng du kham las khang pa brtsegs ma rnam par bsam la /
T02D2589:171a-22: de'i dbus su sa bon 'di rnams las padma la
T02D2589:171a-23: sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ba'i lha'i grangs snyed kyi gdan
T02D2589:171a-24: rnam par bsam par bya ste /
T02D2589:171a-25: yi ge hr'i: las thams cad du padma bsam //
T02D2589:171a-26: aa si aa zhes bya ba 'dis dbus su 'khor
T02D2589:171a-27: lo can gyi seng ge'i gdan shar la sogs pa'i
T02D2589:171a-28: phyogs rnams su / h'um gam h'um /
T02D2589:171a-32: 'di dag las grangs ji lta ba bzhin du glang po che dang /
T02D2589:171a-35: nam mkha' lding gi gdan rnams bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2589:171a-36: de nas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa dang lhan cig babs te /
T02D2589:171a-37: seng ge'i gdan la legs par 'dug ste /
T02D2589:171a-38: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhi glang
T02D2589:171a-39: po che'i gdan la sogs pa nye bar gnas par
T02D2589:171a-40: bsams la / bdag nyid zhal bzhi pa byang chub
T02D2589:171a-41: mchog gi phyag rgyas gnas par bsgom zhing bcom ldan
T02D2589:171a-42: 'das rdo rje'i dbyings ni nga yin no zhes bya
T02D2589:171a-44: 'di ni dang po sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to /
T02D2589:171a-46: // / rje btsun 'jam dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyi tshul gyis mngon par sangs rgyas te /
T02D2589:171a-47: rdo rje dbyings zhes bya ba ni mtshan tsam gyis
T02D2589:171b-0: gzhan du gyur pa yin @171b pas na log par
T02D2589:171b-1: khong du chud par mi bya'o //
T02D2589:171b-2: de nas dkyil 'khor ba rnams rang rang gi gnas
T02D2589:171b-3: su 'og nas bshad pa'i snying pos phyag rgya chen
T02D2589:171b-4: po'i tshul du gzhag par bya ste /
T02D2589:171b-5: 'di ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D2589:171b-6: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis
T02D2589:171b-7: brlab pa'i rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcings la
T02D2589:171b-8: // aom badzra sa ma y'a dza dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod pa /
T02D2589:171b-9: sangs rgyas thams cad 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'i tshogs rnams byon pa dang /
T02D2589:171b-10: zhabs la phyag bya ba sngon du 'gro bas ched
T02D2589:171b-11: du brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod ma thag
T02D2589:171b-12: tu bdag nyid kyi phyag rgya bzhi la zhugs par
T02D2589:171b-13: bsam mo // de la phyag 'tshal ba dang /
T02D2589:171b-14: ched du brjod pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D2589:171b-15: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'a ta banda nam ka ro mi ae ma'o //
T02D2589:171b-17: kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i mchog / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yi ;
T02D2589:171b-18: / dbus nas de bzhin gshegs pas mdzes //
T02D2589:171b-20: de nas nus pa ma lus pa'i //
T02D2589:171b-21: shugs kyis byin gyis brlabs te byung nas //
T02D2589:171b-22: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol na gnas pa'i mi bskyod
T02D2589:171b-23: pa la sogs pa'i thugs kar zhugs te ched du
T02D2589:171b-24: brjod pa 'di ched du brjod cing /
T02D2589:171b-25: chu dang 'o ma bzhin du gcig tu 'dres par gyur pas gnas par bsam mo //
T02D2589:171b-26: de la ched du brjod pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D2589:171b-27: ae ma 'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2589:171b-28: rgya chen gdod nas skye ba min //
T02D2589:171b-29: rdul phran thams cad drangs rnyed kyi //
T02D2589:171b-30: sangs rgyas rnams ni gcig tu gyur //
T02D2589:171b-31: de nas rnal 'byor pas dkyil 'khor ba'i lha rnams rang gi las la yang dag par sbyar nas //
T02D2589:171b-32: de rnams kyi thugs ka'i zla ba la sngags kyi yi ge'i phreng ba bsams la /
T02D2589:171b-33: lan bdun rnam brgyad kyis bzlas brjod byas nas //
T02D2589:171b-34: de rnams nyid kyis bdag nyid mchod par gyur par bsams pa'am //
T02D2589:171b-35: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag
T02D2589:171b-36: po rdo rje'i dbyings ni nga yin no zhes mchog
T02D2589:171b-37: tu yang nga rgyal bya ste /
T02D2589:171b-38: 'di ni las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D2589:171b-39: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thal mo sbyar nas cung zad btung de /
T02D2589:172a-1: bstod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /
T02D2589:172a-2: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i phyir gsol ba 'debs par bdag nyid tshigs su bcad pa 'dis brtag par bya'o //
T02D2589:172a-3: mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag gis //
T02D2589:172a-4: bdag cag gis ni bstod pa yis //
T02D2589:172a-5: theg pa chen po rtogs pa yis //
T02D2589:172a-6: tshul chen yang ni rgyas par mdzod //
T02D2589:172a-7: mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni //
T02D2589:172a-8: sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che //
T02D2589:172a-9: dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa yi //
T02D2589:172a-10: cho ga mchog ni bshad du gsol //
T02D2589:172a-11: de nas sngags pas yang dag par byin gyis brlabs
T02D2589:172a-12: pa'i mchod yon la sogs pa rang gi snying pos
T02D2589:172a-14: lha rnams kyi 'khor lo phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab par bya ste /
T02D2589:172a-15: spos la sogs pas yang dag par mchod nas //
T02D2589:172a-16: snying rje chen pos yongs su gdungs pa'i yid kyis dkyil 'khor gyi sbyor bas gnas la /
T02D2589:172a-17: 'di ltar bdag nyid spro ba bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2589:172a-18: deng ni bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
T02D2589:172a-19: bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas //
T02D2589:172a-20: lha dang dam tshig gis mnyam par //
T02D2589:172a-21: gyur par bdag ni som nyi med //
T02D2589:172a-22: byang chub sems dang sems gcig las //
T02D2589:172a-23: mi ldog par ni bdag gyur te //
T02D2589:172a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni //
T02D2589:172a-25: deng bdag skye bar the chom med //
T02D2589:172a-26: deng bdag nyid ma dam pa ste //
T02D2589:172a-27: bdag gi mchod sbyin bla na med //
T02D2589:172a-28: sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas //
T02D2589:172a-29: deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no //
T02D2589:172a-30: de nas lus thams cad kyis phyag byas la bdug spos phul te /
T02D2589:172a-31: sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
T02D2589:172a-32: ma lus phyogs nas bzhugs pa yi //
T02D2589:172a-33: sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol //
T02D2589:172a-34: bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis //
T02D2589:172a-35: rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D2589:172a-36: deng 'dir sangs rgyas kun gshegs te //
T02D2589:172a-37: dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol //
T02D2589:172a-39: rang gi dam tshig phyag rgyas bdag nyid lan cig byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D2589:172a-40: rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya dag gis 'khor lo steng du nam mkha' la gzhag ste /
T02D2589:172a-41: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas rang gi rkang mthil
T02D2589:172a-42: gnyis su aa las sna tshogs rdo rje bkod la
T02D2589:172b-0: / rkang mthil nas yongs @172b su bzung ste /
T02D2589:172b-1: rlung gi dkyil 'khor nas brtsams te /
T02D2589:172b-2: ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi steng du rdo rjer gyur par lhag par mos la /
T02D2589:172b-3: dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te bskor la /
T02D2589:172b-4: sna tshogs rdo rje de dag nyid sa la 'bri
T02D2589:172b-5: zhing bgegs thams cad skrod pa la brtson par 'gro
T02D2589:172b-7: phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin langs //
T02D2589:172b-8: kun du rnam par bltas nas ni //
T02D2589:172b-9: badzra sa tva zhes brjod nas //
T02D2589:172b-10: bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor //
T02D2589:172b-11: sngags pas rdo rje sems zlos shing //
T02D2589:172b-12: rdo rje lta bas bltas nas ni //
T02D2589:172b-13: dkyil 'khor gyi ni sa yi char //
T02D2589:172b-14: nyes ldan pa yang dag par 'gyur //
T02D2589:172b-16: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas //
T02D2589:172b-17: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgyas snying ga dang /
T02D2589:172b-19: lkog ma dang spyi bor byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2589:172b-20: g-yas pas khro bo'i rdo rje chen po gsor zhing //
T02D2589:172b-21: g-yon pas rdo rje dril bu gsil nas khro bas 'bar ba'i lus dang /
T02D2589:172b-22: bskor ba lan gsum byas la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D2589:172b-23: slob dpon ming 'di zhes bya bas slob ma che
T02D2589:172b-24: ge zhes bya ba rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su
T02D2589:172b-25: rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02D2589:172b-26: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes
T02D2589:172b-27: kyi 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir sa phyogs
T02D2589:172b-28: 'dir nam mkha' ltar dri ma med pa chos kyi
T02D2589:172b-30: lha dang lha ma yin dang /
T02D2589:172b-31: gnod sbyin dang srin po dang yi dgas dang /
T02D2589:172b-38: rig sngags grub pa rgan po dang /
T02D2589:172b-39: rgan mo g-yog dang 'khor du bcas pa gang dag
T02D2589:172b-40: 'khod pa rnams dengs shig / deng 'di ltar rdo
T02D2589:172b-41: rje 'chang gi bka' thos nas myur ba nyid du
T02D2589:172b-42: dengs shig / gang dag mi 'gro ba de dag
T02D2589:172b-43: nga'i ye shes kyi rdo rjes mgo bo tshal pa
T02D2589:172b-44: brgyar rnam par 'gas par bya'o zhes lan gsum brjod
T02D2589:172b-45: par bya'o // de nas lha la sogs pa de rnams sa de spangs nas song bar bsams la //
T02D2589:172b-46: rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas mthe'u chung dang mdzub mo gnyis mdud pa ltar byas la /
T02D2589:173a-0: kha'i steng du kha sbub ste @173a * //
T02D2589:173a-2: mthun pa'i rkang stabs la sogs pas mchongs la /
T02D2589:173a-3: h'um badzra bam h'um zhes brjod la byis pa gzhon
T02D2589:173a-4: nu bzhin du bdag po lnga'i gnas su yongs su
T02D2589:173a-5: bskor // de nas sna tshogs rdo rje bdag nyid bsams la /
T02D2589:173a-6: bdag po'i gnas su rkang pa gnyis dang /
T02D2589:173a-7: lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar te /
T02D2589:173a-8: shar phyogs su bltas nas snying ga la reg par byas la /
T02D2589:173a-9: de bzhin du gnas nas lag pa gnyis thad kar brkyang ste /
T02D2589:173a-10: bdag nyid sna tshogs rdo rje chen po zhig aa zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D2589:173a-11: de nas khro bo'i lta bas dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang /
T02D2589:173a-12: ra ba dang dra ba rnams bya'o //
T02D2589:173a-13: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'a rka h'um zhes
T02D2589:173a-14: brjod la g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur snying gar
T02D2589:173a-15: bzhag nas // g-yas pas rdo rje gsor te bgegs rnams gzhom par bya'o //
T02D2589:173a-16: yang rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas kyang bgegs bsreg pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D2589:173a-17: aom badzra dzva la aa na la ha na da
T02D2589:173a-18: ha pa tsa ma tha bha nydza ra na h'um
T02D2589:173a-19: phat / rdo rje bcing ba nang du byas pa'i
T02D2589:173a-20: sor mo rnams nang du 'bar ba lta bur byas
T02D2589:173a-21: phat / la / mthe bo rdo rje ltar bsgreng ba 'di ni rdo rje me'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:173a-22: aom badzra ne gri bandha bighn'an zhes bya bas bgegs rnams bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2589:173a-23: rdo rje bsdams pa las mtho bo gnyis brkyang ste /
T02D2589:173a-24: mnyam par gzhag pa ni rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:173a-25: rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang bas la bzhag nas 'og phyogs bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2589:173a-26: aom badzra dri dho me bha ba raksha sarbam dv'a h'a /
T02D2589:173a-27: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pas nam mkha' bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2589:173a-29: rdo rje thal mo las mthe bo gnyis brkyang la //
T02D2589:173a-30: mdzub mo gnyis mche bar byas bar byas pa 'di ni phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:173a-31: yang na rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyi steng du nam mkha' bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2589:173a-33: rdo rje khu chur gnyis bcings la mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du bskor te /
T02D2589:173a-34: mgo bo'i steng du mdzub mo lcags kyu lta bur bzhag pa ni //
T02D2589:173a-35: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:173a-36: rdo rje gtsug tor rdo rje dang ldan pas shar phyogs bcing bar bya ste /
T02D2589:173a-38: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las mthe'u chung gnyis lcags sgrog ltar mdud de /
T02D2589:173b-0: mdzub mo @173b gnyis rtse sprad la yongs su bzlog ste /
T02D2589:173b-2: yang rdo rje zhags pas de nyid bcing bar bya ste /
T02D2589:173b-4: rdo rje khu tshur mkhrig ma mdud pa bya ba ni zhags pa'o //
T02D2589:173b-5: rdo rje ba dan gyis nub phogs bcing bar bya ste //
T02D2589:173b-6: aom badzra pra tam ke p'a tam ti ni ra ta /
T02D2589:173b-7: rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bong gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bya //
T02D2589:173b-8: mdzub mo gnyis mnyam par sbyar srin lag phye la mthe'u chung ba dan no //
T02D2589:173b-9: rdo rje nag mos byang phyogs bsrung bar bya ste /
T02D2589:173b-10: hri badzra k'a li ru ta ma ta /
T02D2589:173b-11: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya nyid khar bzhag
T02D2589:173b-12: la brtan par byas pas ni rdo rje nag mo'o
T02D2589:173b-13: // rdo rje rtse mos lho phyogs bcing bar bya ste /
T02D2589:173b-14: aom badzra shi kha re ru ta ma ta /
T02D2589:173b-15: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis ri bo 'degs pa'i tshul
T02D2589:173b-16: du byas pa ni rdo rje rtse mo'i phyag rgya'o
T02D2589:173b-17: // rdo rje las kyi dkyil 'khor bcings la ra ba bya'o //
T02D2589:173b-19: yang rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis ra ba bya ste /
T02D2589:173b-20: h'um rdo rje bcing bas rdo rje ra ba bya'o //
T02D2589:173b-21: sngags ni badzra bandha zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2589:173b-22: yang h'um aa nu r'a ga y'a mi h'um zhes
T02D2589:173b-23: bya bas dkyil 'khor bcing ba la sogs pa ni
T02D2589:173b-24: rdo rje gar las byung ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis
T02D2589:173b-25: bya ste // de la phyag rgya ni 'di rnams yin no //
T02D2589:173b-26: khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis kyi phyogs kyi 'khor lo bskor bas //
T02D2589:173b-27: bskor ba 'di ni dkyil 'khor bcing ba'o //
T02D2589:173b-28: khar bskor ba ni mtshams bcing ba'o //
T02D2589:173b-29: snying la 'bar ltar zhugs gyur cing //
T02D2589:173b-30: phyogs kun rdo rje me 'bar bas //
T02D2589:173b-31: nga yi'ang khro bo chen po yi //
T02D2589:173b-32: 'bar ba'i rdo rje ra ba bya //
T02D2589:173b-33: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
T02D2589:173b-34: aom ma h'a badzra tsa kra aa dhi tishtha siddhya
T02D2589:173b-35: h'um zhes bya ba 'di phyag rgya dang ldan pa
T02D2589:173b-37: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis 'khor lo bskor ba ni 'di'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:173b-38: aom badzra mandala h'um dzdza: zhes bya ba 'dis gsang b'i gzugs can gyi dkyil 'khor bkug la /
T02D2589:173b-40: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mdzub mo gnyis gnyis dang /
T02D2589:173b-41: mthe bo rdo rjer byas pa ni rdo rje 'khor lo'o //
T02D2589:173b-42: 'dis dkyil 'khor thams cad 'gugs shing bsgrub par 'gyur la //
T02D2589:173b-43: 'jig rten pa rnams kyang zhugs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2589:174a-0: de la phur bu ni 'di yin te sor brgyad pa'i tshad tsam @174a * //
T02D2589:174a-1: gyis seng ldeng gi phur bu tsandan dmar pos byugs la srad bu dmar po dang /
T02D2589:174a-2: me tog dmar pos bcings la /
T02D2589:174a-3: stod khro bo'i gzugs la smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i dbyibs su 'dug pa h'um las bskyed do //
T02D2589:174a-4: aom badzra k'i li k'i la ya sarba bi ghnam
T02D2589:174a-5: bandha h'um phat ces bya ba brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
T02D2589:174a-6: la g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshar gyis bzung ste
T02D2589:174a-7: / g-yas pas rdo rje tho ba bzung nas //
T02D2589:174a-8: des dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bzhir brdung bar bya'o //
T02D2589:174a-11: sanyts'u rn'a ya sanyts'u rn'a ya /
T02D2589:174a-12: badzra badzra bungga ra h'um phat ces bya ba rdo
T02D2589:174a-13: rje tho ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te
T02D2589:174a-15: srad bu dmar pos bcings la /
T02D2589:174a-17: des kun du brdung bar bya'o //
T02D2589:174a-19: bcing ba'i cho ga'i sbyor ba ni //
T02D2589:174a-20: rdo rje khu tshur rab tu brtag / dkyil 'khor bsrung ba thams cad la //
T02D2589:174a-21: rdo rje go chas go cha bya //
T02D2589:174a-22: de nas badzra shi kha re ru ta ma ta
T02D2589:174a-23: zhes bya bas mngon par bsngags pa'i spos chus dkyil
T02D2589:174a-24: 'khor nye bar byugs la gur kum dang /
T02D2589:174a-25: aa ka ru dang tsandan dang /
T02D2589:174a-27: gla rtsi la sogs pa'i dri dang dkyil 'khor ba'i
T02D2589:174a-28: lha rnams kyi sngags kyis btab la lha rnams kyi
T02D2589:174a-29: grangs ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor bya'o //
T02D2589:174a-30: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la yid kyis dkyil 'khor yongs su brtags te /
T02D2589:174a-31: dkyil 'khor de rnams su rnam par snang mdzad chen
T02D2589:174a-32: po yongs su gyur pas rje btsun 'jam dpal du
T02D2589:174a-33: gyur pa la sogs rang gi snying por bzhag la
T02D2589:174a-34: // mchod pa rnam pa lngas yang dag par mchod do //
T02D2589:174a-35: de nas dbang bskur ba'i phyir rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa sngags kyis mngon par gdab bo //
T02D2589:174a-36: de la cho ga ni 'di yin te /
T02D2589:174a-37: bam las rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi bum pa rtsa ba nag nog med pa /
T02D2589:174a-38: lto ba che ba mgrin pa ring ba /
T02D2589:174a-40: de'i dbus su hr'i: las byung ba'i padma de'i steng du aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams la /
T02D2589:174a-41: der lha rnams kyi 'khor lo rang gi dam tig gis gnas pas bzhugs par bsams la /
T02D2589:174a-42: de las byung ba'i byang chub kyis mes kyi chus yongs su bkang bar bsam la //
T02D2589:174b-0: @174b rin po che sna lnga dang ldan pa me
T02D2589:174b-1: tog gi phreng bas bcings pa'i gsang ba'i snying po
T02D2589:174b-2: can mgul pa gos gtsang mas dkris la /
T02D2589:174b-3: aa mra'i lo ma la sogs pas kha bkab pa byas la /
T02D2589:174b-4: dkyil 'khor ba'i sngags kyis mngon par bzla zhing /
T02D2589:174b-5: aom badzro da ka h'um h'um zhes bya ba stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ste /
T02D2589:174b-6: spos la sogs pas mchod nas dkyil 'khor bskor te /
T02D2589:174b-7: bcom ldan 'das rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi spyan sngar
T02D2589:174b-8: bzhag la dkyil 'khor gyi nyin mo dus gsum du
T02D2589:174b-9: bzlas brjod byas nas dkyil 'khor du yang bzlas brjod
T02D2589:174b-10: bya ste / de nas dbang bskur bar bya'o//
T02D2589:174b-11: sang gri bya ghri krita ka rni ka ha sa de ba ste /
T02D2589:174b-12: sman rnams kun zhes bya ba la //
T02D2589:174b-13: lda po 'di dag shes par bya ste /
T02D2589:174b-14: 'bras kyi so ba mon sran gre'u dang /
T02D2589:174b-15: nas dang gro dang til dang lnga //
T02D2589:174b-16: 'bru rnams kun zhes bya ba ni //
T02D2589:174b-17: las rnams kun la di dag gsungs //
T02D2589:174b-18: byi ru gser ni sa le sbram //
T02D2589:174b-19: dung dang mu tig nor bu ste /
T02D2589:174b-20: rin chen kun zhes bya ba la //
T02D2589:174b-21: snga po 'di dag shes par bya //
T02D2589:174b-22: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sngags dang phyag rgya dang bcas pas //
T02D2589:174b-23: las thams cad ba'i bum pa la mngon par bsngags la /
T02D2589:174b-24: de bzhin du me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2589:174b-25: dkyil 'khor gyi sgor gzhag par bya //
T02D2589:174b-26: de la sngags dang phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02D2589:174b-27: aom sum bha ni sum bha h'um /
T02D2589:174b-29: gri hn'a pa ya gri hn'a pa ya h'um /
T02D2589:174b-30: a'a na ya go: bha ga b'an badzra h'um phat /
T02D2589:174b-31: khro bo'i khu tshur gnyis bcings te /
T02D2589:174b-32: mthe'u chung rtse mo mdud byas la /
T02D2589:174b-33: mdzub mo gnyis ni bsgrad ba dag /
T02D2589:174b-34: rdo rje h'um mdzad phyag rgya 'di'o zhes bya ba 'di phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:174b-35: gsol ba 'di ltar gdab par bya ste /
T02D2589:174b-36: ji srid dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa de srid
T02D2589:174b-37: du 'dir 'dug pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis nges
T02D2589:174b-38: par bzlog tu gsol zhes bya'o //
T02D2589:174b-39: de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin la nye reg bya ste /
T02D2589:174b-40: dad cing gus par phyag 'tshal te //
T02D2589:174b-41: slob ma rnams lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D2589:174b-42: de la re zhig slob ma legs par khrus byas shing //
T02D2589:174b-43: gos gtsang ma gon la lag na me tog thogs pas slob dpon la phyag bya ste /
T02D2589:175a-2: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02D2589:175a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa //
T02D2589:175a-4: mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //
T02D2589:175a-5: dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol //
T02D2589:175a-6: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02D2589:175a-7: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D2589:175a-8: skyabs gsum dag ni bdag la stsol //
T02D2589:175a-9: thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu //
T02D2589:175a-10: mgon po bdag ni 'jug par bgyi //
T02D2589:175a-11: de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma'i snying gar h'um las rdo rje bskyed la /
T02D2589:175a-12: khu tshur g-yas pas bzung nas //
T02D2589:175a-13: rdo rje de snying gar snying po bzhag ste /
T02D2589:175a-14: su ra te sa ma ya stam ho badzra siddha ya th'a su kham /
T02D2589:175a-15: de nas de bzhin du de'i mgo bor lag pa
T02D2589:175a-16: bzhag la rdo rje las kyis nying po brjod nas
T02D2589:175a-17: / sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2589:175a-18: de nas ham badzra raksha zhes bya ba las go cha bskyed la /
T02D2589:175a-19: rkang ba'i mthar thig gi bar du go cha bskyon par bya'o //
T02D2589:175a-20: de nas rdo rje'i dris lag par dri sbyin /
T02D2589:175a-21: me tog gis me tog gtor zhing //
T02D2589:175a-22: bdug pas bdug pa gtul te /
T02D2589:175a-23: me mar nye bar bstan la re re zhing 'di skad ces brjod par byas te /
T02D2589:175a-24: deng nas brtsams te bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur pas nye bar gnas par gyis shig //
T02D2589:175a-25: de nas slob ma'i gtso bo la bos te /
T02D2589:175a-27: khyod ni tshul chen snod yin gyis //
T02D2589:175a-28: bu tshur theg pa chen po yi //
T02D2589:175a-29: gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga 'di //
T02D2589:175a-30: khyod la yang dag bstan par bya //
T02D2589:175a-31: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang //
T02D2589:175a-32: de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang //
T02D2589:175a-33: da ltar byung ba'i mgon po rnams //
T02D2589:175a-34: 'gro la phan phyir bzhugs pa dag / de dag kun gyis gsang sngags kyi //
T02D2589:175a-35: cho ga mchog bzang 'di mkhyen nas //
