T02D2589:178a-46: chos kyi byings la nges zhugs la //
T02D2589:178a-47: de rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02D2589:178a-48: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang //
T02D2589:178a-49: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D2589:178b-0: @178b bdag ming 'di zhes pa bgyi ba yis //
T02D2589:178b-1: yo byad ci 'byor ba yis ni //
T02D2589:178b-2: chos dbyings rang bzhin grong khyer mchog / dkyil 'khor sang ni 'dri bar bgyid //
T02D2589:178b-3: thugs brtse nye bar bzhag nas ni //
T02D2589:178b-4: byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol //
T02D2589:178b-5: de nas rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya dag gis 'khor lo bteg la //
T02D2589:178b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams nyid dang shel lta
T02D2589:178b-7: bu'i khang pa brtsegs ma'i nang du bzhugs par bsams
T02D2589:178b-8: la / kha sbyar byas la gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2589:178b-9: de la kha sbyar bya ba'i sbyor ba ni 'di yin te //
T02D2589:178b-10: aom h'um tr'am hr'i: aa: zhes bya ba'i dbus su
T02D2589:178b-11: steng dang 'og dang bar du dkri bar bya ba'i
T02D2589:178b-13: yang steng du bam lnga dang /
T02D2589:178b-14: 'og tu yang h'um lnga bsam ste //
T02D2589:178b-15: de ltar bdag dang dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2589:178b-16: de nas de nyid du slob ma'i gtso bo dang //
T02D2589:178b-17: lhan cig bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag pa'i blo dang ldan pas nyal bar bya'o //
T02D2589:178b-18: nyi ma gnyis pa la nyi ma 'char kar legs
T02D2589:178b-19: par khrus byas shing rgyan thams cad brgyan par rab
T02D2589:178b-20: tu dga' zhing yid bde ba ldan pas dkyil 'khor
T02D2589:178b-21: gyi gnas spos kyi chus byugs la me tog la
T02D2589:178b-22: sogs pas nye bar mdzes par byas te //
T02D2589:178b-27: dkar po'i kha dog dang ldan pa'i tshon dris bsgos la //
T02D2589:178b-28: so so'i srad bu bcos te //
T02D2589:178b-29: rim pa bzhin du legs par bzhag la h'um tr'am
T02D2589:178b-30: hr'i: aa zhes pa'i rang gi sa bon rnams las
T02D2589:178b-31: byung ba'i srad bu'i 'od zer rnams kyis mi bskyod
T02D2589:178b-32: pa la sogs pa rang gi phyogs na bzhugs pa
T02D2589:178b-33: rnams kyi gan du btang bas 'bar blta zhing lcags
T02D2589:178b-34: kyu rang gi lag pa na gnas pas drangs te
T02D2589:178b-35: // de rnams kyi srad bu dbu rnams legs par bkal la //
T02D2589:178b-36: aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta /
T02D2589:178b-37: sarba dha rmma pa ra spha ra aa nu pra
T02D2589:178b-38: bishta sarba dha rmma aatahaya nata aa nu pra bishta
T02D2589:178b-39: sarba dharmma h'um zhes brjod la bsgril bar bya'o //
T02D2589:178b-40: de nas tsandan bzang po la sogs pas bskus pa'i
T02D2589:178b-41: gser gyi snod la sogs pa'i nang du legs par
T02D2589:178b-42: bzhag la // me tog gis gtor te /
T02D2589:178b-43: thig gdab pa'i sngags rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung
T02D2589:178b-44: nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzla bar bya'o
T02D2589:179a-0: // de nas bdag po rnams kyang brgya rtsa brgyad @179a * //
T02D2589:179a-2: yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2589:179a-3: phyag byas la lang nas yid kyi rnam par snang
T02D2589:179a-4: mdzad du gyur pa'i rang gi snying ga nas grogs
T02D2589:179a-5: po rdo rje las h'um dzdza zhes bya ba 'dis
T02D2589:179a-6: phyung nas / ma dang ta las mig g-yas dang
T02D2589:179a-7: g-yon gnyis su nyi ma dang zla ba ser po
T02D2589:179a-9: yi ge dzas grogs po'i lag tu srad bu btang //
T02D2589:179a-10: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis dang po srad bu bzung la phyi nas ci bder bya'o //
T02D2589:179a-11: mkhas pa dkyil 'khor theg gdab pa //
T02D2589:179a-12: shar dang nub kyi phyogs dag dang //
T02D2589:179a-13: byang dang lho yi phyogs dag tu ;
T02D2589:179a-14: / thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad //
T02D2589:179a-15: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra
T02D2589:179a-16: ma h'um zhes bya ba 'dis sangs rgyas kyi zhing
T02D2589:179a-17: thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D2589:179a-18: sems can gyi don phyir 'dir gshegs su gsol zhes
T02D2589:179a-20: zur bzhi pa la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'i rim gyis thams cad thig gdab par bya ste //
T02D2589:179a-21: chur dkyil 'khor gyi nyi ma bldab sboms su sgo'i
T02D2589:179a-22: nyi shu cha'i tshad kyi srab bus dkyil 'khor thams
T02D2589:179a-23: cad rim pa 'dis thig gdab bo //
T02D2589:179a-24: de la dang por de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas la ;
T02D2589:179a-25: / yi ge dzdza las sgrub pa po'i grogs mchog
T02D2589:179a-26: de rdo rje las kyi gzugs su byas par btang
T02D2589:179a-27: la // phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du bsams nas nub phyogs kyi sgor 'dug ste //
T02D2589:179a-28: shar phyogs su mngon par phyogs par byas la /
T02D2589:179a-29: lte ba'i phyogs su gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2589:179a-30: de nas bskor ba'i tshul gyis song la byang du mngon par phyogs te gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2589:179a-32: de bzhin du shar du blta ba dang //
T02D2589:179a-33: byang du blta ba bya ste //
T02D2589:179a-34: dbus kyis gzhir thig brkyang la //
T02D2589:179a-35: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes brjod de gdab par bya'o //
T02D2589:179a-36: de nas me'i phyogs char 'dug la /
T02D2589:179a-37: byang phyogs su mngon par phyogs par phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi shar gyi ngos su thig gdab bo //
T02D2589:179a-38: rlung gi phyogs su gnas nas //
T02D2589:179a-40: nub kyi phyogs kyi thig gdab bo //
T02D2589:179a-41: de bzhin du 'dug la shar du mngon par phyogs te /
T02D2589:179b-0: @179b byang phyogs kyi thig gdab bo //
T02D2589:179b-1: yang me'i phyogs char 'dug la nub tu mngon par phyogs te //
T02D2589:179b-2: lho'i ngos mngon par thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2589:179b-3: de bzhin du khyams kyi thig dang lha'i gnas kyi thig gdab par shes par bya ste //
T02D2589:179b-4: thams cad du'ang slob dpon dang //
T02D2589:179b-5: sgrub pa'i grogs mchog g-yas nas bskor ba'i tshul gyi 'gro bar bya'o //
T02D2589:179b-6: de nas me'i mtshams su 'dug la rlung gi phyogs kyi bar du bre bar bya'o //
T02D2589:179b-7: yang bden bral gyi phyogs su 'dug la //
T02D2589:179b-8: dbang ldan gyi phyogs kyi bar du srad bu bre bar bya ste //
T02D2589:179b-9: thams cad du yang aom badzra sa ma ya s'u dzdzam m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes brjod do //
T02D2589:179b-10: dza: dza: zhes bya ba'i dza gsum dang /
T02D2589:179b-11: sgrub pa po'i grogs mchog gis srad bu drang bar bya'o //
T02D2589:179b-12: de la sgo thams cad ni brgyad cha'o //
T02D2589:179b-15: lha'i gnas ni sgo'i phyed kyi tshad do //
T02D2589:179b-16: tshon sna lnga'i sa ni khyams kyi phyed kyi tshad do //
T02D2589:179b-17: dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pas cha bcur gsungs pa dang //
T02D2589:179b-18: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba las chad gur gsungs pa dang //
T02D2589:179b-19: bcu drug cha dang ldan pa yis //
T02D2589:179b-20: cha dgu dag tu bsngags pa yin //
T02D2589:179b-22: de la sgro khyud ni sgo'i tshad do //
T02D2589:179b-23: de'i phyed ni sgo 'gram dang sgo logs kyi tshad do //
T02D2589:179b-24: de'i phyed ni tshon sna lnga'i sa'o //
T02D2589:179b-25: khyams dang lha'i gnas ni sgo'i phyed du brtag par
T02D2589:179b-26: bya'o zhes pa ni rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa'i rim
T02D2589:179b-27: pas phyed pa ste 'gal ba med do //
T02D2589:179b-28: rta babs kyi tshad ni thams cad du yang sgo'i sum pa lnga ba yin no //
T02D2589:179b-29: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed ni gnyis pa'o //
T02D2589:179b-31: nang gi dkyil 'khor ni zur bzhi sgo bzhi pa
T02D2589:179b-32: la rta babs med pa legs par thig btab nas
T02D2589:179b-33: // dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar seng ldeng gi phur bu smad rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i dbyibs la //
T02D2589:179b-34: stod rdo rje rtse lnga pa lta bu h'um las bskyed nas //
T02D2589:179b-35: aom badzra k'i li k'i la ya sarba bi ghn'ana
T02D2589:179b-36: bandha ya h'um phat ces bya ba lan brgya rtsa
T02D2589:179b-37: brgyad bzlas la rdo rje tho bas brdung bar bya'o
T02D2589:179b-38: // de nas de la btags pa'i srad bus nang
T02D2589:179b-39: gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol rdo rje phreng ba'i
T02D2589:180a-0: // thig btab pa // der dkyil 'khor brgyad 'dra bar ka @180a * //
T02D2589:180a-1: ba brgyad kyi thig kyang de bzhin du gdab par bya ste //
T02D2589:180a-2: cha mnyam pa la shar phyogs kyi cha'i ka ba'i
T02D2589:180a-3: thig lho'i phyogs kyi char 'dug la byang du bltas
T02D2589:180a-5: nub phyogs kyi cha'i ka ba'i thig ni byang phyogs kyi char la 'dug la lho phyogs su blta'o //
T02D2589:180a-6: byang phyogs kyi cha'i ka ba'i thig ni nub phyogs kyi char 'dug la shar phyogs su blta'o //
T02D2589:180a-7: lho phyogs cha'i ka ba'i thig ni shar phyogs kyi char 'dug la //
T02D2589:180a-8: nub phyogs su mngon par bltas te thig gdab bo //
T02D2589:180a-9: dbus kyi phur bu la btags pa'i srad bu nyid
T02D2589:180a-10: kyis phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du 'od kyi
T02D2589:180a-11: dkyil 'khor dang // bskor phyogs su phyi'i rdo rje rigs kyi gnas kyi dkyil 'khor zlum po dang //
T02D2589:180a-13: khor yug chen po dag gi thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2589:180a-14: dkyil 'khor 'dri bar byed pa na gal te 'ga' zhig 'gron tshol zhing bgegs bskyed par byed dam //
T02D2589:180a-15: bdag nyid bgegs byed par gyur na dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2589:180a-16: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du grog mkhar gyi sa las
T02D2589:180a-17: lha la sogs pa'i bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan bya ste
T02D2589:180a-18: // brgya byin gyi gzugs brnyan rang gi phyogs gnas
T02D2589:180a-19: pa la ai las brgya byin mdog ser po dang
T02D2589:180a-20: // // de bzhin du me lha la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan ram las me lha mdog dmar po //
T02D2589:180a-21: aom h'am las gshin tu rje nag po /
T02D2589:180a-22: kam las srin po nag po //
T02D2589:180a-23: bam las chu lha dkar po //
T02D2589:180a-24: yam las rlung lha dung ka //
T02D2589:180a-25: phat las lus ngan po ser po //
T02D2589:180a-26: sum bha zhes bya ba las dbang ldan dkar po
T02D2589:180a-27: bskyed la rdo rje lcags kyus la sogs pas bkug
T02D2589:180a-29: dbang du byas nas phur bus gdab bo //
T02D2589:180a-30: shin tu yang yun ring du bgags med par byed 'dod pas sas ngag ba par bya'o //
T02D2589:180a-31: de lta na yang gal te bgegs byed na //
T02D2589:180a-32: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor bar byas la //
T02D2589:180a-33: 'dod pa'i rgyal pos bkug nas bcug la bcings te /
T02D2589:180a-34: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings la //
T02D2589:180a-35: rkang pa g-yon pas mnan te //
T02D2589:180a-36: h'um bam h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa spel
T02D2589:180a-37: ba'i tshul gyis g-yas rkyang ba'i gnas pa 'dug la
T02D2589:180a-38: // bgegs byed pa sprin la sogs pa la mngon par bltas te //
T02D2589:180b-0: de la phyag rgya 'phangs la nam mkha'i khams @180b
T02D2589:180b-1: thams cad du sprod pas 'od zer 'bar ba kun
T02D2589:180b-3: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis kyang rkang pos brdeg cing
T02D2589:180b-4: bsnun pas sprin la sogs pa thal bar byas par
T02D2589:180b-6: des ni de dag bcom pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D2589:180b-7: yang na stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du byas la /
T02D2589:180b-8: de'i 'og tu aa las rnam par snang mdzad du gyur nas //
T02D2589:180b-9: ham las 'phags pa mi g-yo ba yid kyis thugs ka nas phyung ste //
T02D2589:180b-10: badzra ham shandha zhes yid la brjod la phyi'i dkyil
T02D2589:180b-11: 'khor gyi phyi rol du rlung gi phyogs su dris
T02D2589:180b-13: theg le re re zhing yam re re'i nang du chud par byas la //
T02D2589:180b-14: dbus ma yang yam dang thig le bdun dang ldan par bya ste //
T02D2589:180b-15: thig le bdun po de dag kyang rlung lha bdun par ri dags la zhon pa //
T02D2589:180b-16: mdog nag po 'phags pa mi g-yo bas //
T02D2589:180b-17: zhags pas bcings nas bkug par gyur par bsams la //
T02D2589:180b-18: de rnams kyi dbus ma gcig ni gtso bo yin la //
T02D2589:180b-19: lhag ma rlung lha drug po ni de la 'khor du bskor te kun nas gnas par bsam mo //
T02D2589:180b-20: de nas kham phor ma las ri rab tu bsams la //
T02D2589:180b-21: de'i steng du dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor yi ge
T02D2589:180b-22: ma nyid las thams cad du rdo rjes g-yogs pa
T02D2589:180b-23: // dbus su yang rdo rje rtse lnga pa yi ge h'um byung ba dang //
T02D2589:180b-24: mtshams rnams su mdung rtse rnam pa bsams la //
T02D2589:180b-25: de bzhin du badzra ham bandha zhes brjod de kham
T02D2589:180b-26: phor de rnams kyi ji skad du bshad pa'i yam
T02D2589:180b-28: de nas kham phor dang ri rab kyi steng du
T02D2589:180b-29: aom las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsams
T02D2589:180b-30: te / 'phags pa mi g-yo ba yang bcom ldan
T02D2589:180b-31: 'das kyi spyan sngar g-yon brkyang bas ri rab mnan
T02D2589:180b-32: nas ril gri dang zhags pas rlung rnams la sdigs
T02D2589:180b-34: de lta bus ni rlung thams cad bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2589:180b-35: de nas chu'i bgegs bzlog pa bshad par bya ste //
T02D2589:180b-36: ham las rlung dang me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i 'phags pa mi g-yo bar bdag nyid bskyed la //
T02D2589:180b-38: ba lang gi lci bas ma lhung bas bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan byas nas //
T02D2589:180b-40: ram la me'i snying po yod pa bskyed la //
T02D2589:181a-0: @181a * // lcags kyu'i rang bzhin can bskyed de /
T02D2589:181a-1: lag pa g-yon pas bzung la //
T02D2589:181a-2: lag pa g-yas pas lcags kyu dang /
T02D2589:181a-3: zhags pas drangs nas bgegs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi nang du bcug ste /
T02D2589:181a-4: g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pas btsir la 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02D2589:181a-5: na ma: sa manta badzr'a n'i /
T02D2589:181a-6: tsanna ma h'a ro sha na spho ta ya h'um
T02D2589:181a-7: dra ta hom mom zhes brjod nas gzugs brnyan de
T02D2589:181a-10: lan tshva la sogs pas gzugs brnyan bskus la mes gdung bar bya'o //
T02D2589:181a-11: de ltar mes gdungs pas de nyid gdungs par 'gyur bar the tshom med de //
T02D2589:181a-12: tshangs pa'am ni brgya byin dag /
T02D2589:181a-13: de yi mod la myur du 'tshig / ces bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so //
T02D2589:181a-14: las 'di dag kyang 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i rnal
T02D2589:181a-15: 'byor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis 'di'i gsang sngags khri bzlas
T02D2589:181a-16: la'i sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas /
T02D2589:181a-18: yang na aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba 'di yang
T02D2589:181a-19: gshin rje gshed sku mdog nag po zhal bzhi pa
T02D2589:181a-20: phyag bzhi pa // zhabs drug pa /
T02D2589:181a-21: phyag gnyis na ral gri dang dgra sta bsnams pa /
T02D2589:181a-22: phyag g-yon gnyis na zhags pa dang gtun shing bsnams pa /
T02D2589:181a-24: khro bo'i tshogs rnams kyis nam mkha' kun du gang bar gnas par rnam par bsams la /
T02D2589:181a-25: mdung thung gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2589:181a-26: sprin la sogs pa bzlog pa'i bsams pas 'khrugs pa dang bcas pas rab tu sbyar bar bya'o /
T02D2589:181a-27: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la /
T02D2589:181a-28: mdzub mo gnyis sbyar ba ni mdung thung gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:181a-29: de lta na yang gal te bgegs rnams zhi bar ma gyur na /
T02D2589:181a-30: kham phor so ma btang ba gnyis kyi nang du khrag dang /
T02D2589:181a-31: dud khrod kyi sol ba dang /
T02D2589:181a-33: da du ra'i lo ma'i khu bas gsang sngags bris
T02D2589:181a-34: la yungs kar la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas
T02D2589:181a-35: nas kham phor kha sbyar te /
T02D2589:181a-36: de'i nang du bzhag la me'i bgegs la sogs pa bsams la /
T02D2589:181a-38: sreg blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2589:181a-39: de nas de dag 'jigs pa'am 'chi ba'am mi ma yin pas gzung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2589:181b-0: yang na rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi @181b sbyor bas yi ge h'um bzlas brjod 'bum byas la /
T02D2589:181b-1: mi rus kyi rgyu las byas pa'i phur bu sor
T02D2589:181b-2: bzhi ba'i tshad tsam la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
T02D2589:181b-3: la de bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs
T02D2589:181b-4: pas bkug cing bcug nas bcings te /
T02D2589:181b-5: gzugs brnyan phur bus gdab po //
T02D2589:181b-6: de nas me'i tsha bzhi bar 'dod na /
T02D2589:181b-7: me'i steng du bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2589:181b-8: de'i steng du padma'i dbus na gnas pa'i 'khor lo //
T02D2589:181b-9: de'i steng du bam nyid las bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dung dang /
T02D2589:181b-10: kunda ltar dkar ba bzhugs te /
T02D2589:181b-11: mtsho chen po ma dros pa 'dra ba'i rgya mtsho
T02D2589:181b-12: chen po bzhi las chu bo bzhi 'bab pa'i char
T02D2589:181b-13: gyi rgyun dgus phyogs bcur 'gengs par gyur par bsam
T02D2589:181b-14: par bya'o // rdo rje spyan dang /
T02D2589:181b-15: rdo rje me ltar 'bar bas kham phor gyi ri rab dang /
T02D2589:181b-16: phur bu yang dag par bsrungs la rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /
T02D2589:181b-17: rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan dag gis de rnams kyi nam mkha' bcing bar byas la //
T02D2589:181b-18: rdo rje bcing bas rdo rje'i dra ba bya'o //
T02D2589:181b-19: yang na chos thams cad ni rnam par rig pa tsam las byung ba yin la /
T02D2589:181b-20: bgegs rnam skyang de'i ngo bo nyid yin pas bdag med pa'i mes thal bar byas nas //
T02D2589:181b-21: de'i 'og tu phyi dang nang gi bgegs rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2589:181b-22: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba la gnas pa'i
T02D2589:181b-23: phur bu yi ge h'um bzhis phung la phur bu'i
T02D2589:181b-24: bu ga tshon sna lngas mnyam par bya'o //
T02D2589:181b-25: srad bu ni tshon dkar po dri zhim po la sbags nas gdab par bya'o //
T02D2589:181b-26: de ltar legs par thig gdab nas mig g-yas dang
T02D2589:181b-27: g-yon gnyis su yi ge hri las nyi ma dang
T02D2589:181b-29: khro bo'i lta bas kun du bltas nas sgo rnams dbye'o //
T02D2589:181b-30: de yang hri las byung ba'i nyi ma dang zla
T02D2589:181b-31: ba dag / mig la rnam par bkod de sgo
T02D2589:181b-32: rnams dbye'o // khro bo'i lta bar gnas pas kun bltas nas /
T02D2589:181b-33: de nas sgo rnams thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur zhes gsungs pas so //
T02D2589:181b-34: de nas srad bu la bshad pa'i kha dog gi rim pas tshon rtsi rnams blangs la /
T02D2589:181b-35: h'um h'am hr'i: aa: aa zhes bya ba 'di rnams las bskyed de /
T02D2589:181b-36: rang gi rigs kyi ngo bor bsams la /
T02D2589:181b-37: aom dzra ci tra sa ma ya h'um zhes bya
T02D2589:181b-38: ba d'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas stong rta brgyad
T02D2589:182a-2: de la de'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02D2589:182a-3: rdo rje phyag rgya gnyi ga yi //
T02D2589:182a-4: mdzub mo'i rtse mo rab sbyar ba //
T02D2589:182a-5: byas nas tshon rtsi thams cad la //
T02D2589:182a-6: 'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya //
T02D2589:182a-8: rdo rje padma'i phyag rgyas sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2589:182a-9: de la 'bar ba'i lta ba ni 'di yin te /
T02D2589:182a-10: rab tu myur bar g-yo ba'i mig //
T02D2589:182a-11: mig gi rdzi ma 'dren pa ni /
T02D2589:182a-12: 'bar ba'i lta ba zhes su gsungs //
T02D2589:182a-14: de nas tshon mang por bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2589:182a-15: bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs pa bya ste /
T02D2589:182a-16: bden pa gang gis sems can rnams la sangs rgyas
T02D2589:182a-17: rnams sems can rjes su dpag pas chags par mdzad
T02D2589:182a-18: pa'i bden pa des tshon rtsi rnams 'bar bar gyur
T02D2589:182a-19: cig ces bya'o // de nas yang dag par mchod la //
T02D2589:182a-20: rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas rdo
T02D2589:182a-21: rje sems dpa'i phyag rgyas tshon dkar po blangs la
T02D2589:182a-22: / aom badzra r'a ga sa ma ya h'um zhes brjod de //
T02D2589:182a-23: dbus su bkye la dbang ldan gyi phyogs su song ste /
T02D2589:182a-24: de bzhin du sngags zlos shing nang du gnas la //
T02D2589:182a-25: g-yas na sa bskor ba'i rim pas mnyam zhing rgyun
T02D2589:182a-26: ma 'chad par g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu chur chen
T02D2589:182a-27: pos dang po tshon bkye la //
T02D2589:182a-29: de la rim pa 'dis bkye bar bya ste /
T02D2589:182a-30: sngo po rdo rje rtse rang bzhin //
T02D2589:182a-31: gnyis pa gser la dmigs pa ste /
T02D2589:182a-32: padma r'a ga'i rang bzhin gzhan //
T02D2589:182a-33: gzhan dag mar kata lta bur bshad //
T02D2589:182a-34: dkar po nang du shes bya ste //
T02D2589:182a-35: 'di ni tshon gyi rim par bshad //
T02D2589:182a-36: shar phyogs su ni sngon po ste //
T02D2589:182a-37: lho ni ser po legs sbyar ba ;
T02D2589:182a-38: / nub kyi char ni dmar po ste /
T02D2589:182a-39: byang ni ljang gu yang dag ldan //
T02D2589:182a-40: dbus kyi sa yi cha nyid de //
T02D2589:182a-41: shel ltar snang ba bla na med //
T02D2589:182a-42: rdo rje dril bu rtag 'chang zhing //
T02D2589:182a-43: shin tu mnyam bzhag legs par bri //
T02D2589:182a-44: gsang sngags de nyid yongs bzlas shing //
T02D2589:182a-45: tshon gyis thig ni yongs su dgang //
T02D2589:182a-46: nang gi 'khor lo tshon dkar pos bri'o //
T02D2589:182a-47: gnyis pa gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ni tshon sna lngas bri'o //
T02D2589:182a-48: gsum pa ni tshon gyi phye ma lngas bri'o //
T02D2589:182a-49: phyi rol rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor ni tshon dkar po dang /
T02D2589:182b-0: @182b khor yug chen po'i thig ni dkar po'am //
T02D2589:182b-2: de nas phyi rol kun du dri zhim po'i dris nye bar byugs la /
T02D2589:182b-3: me tog gi sil ma gtor te /
T02D2589:182b-4: yi ge brgya pa bzlas pa'i chus dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02D2589:182b-5: phyi dang nang du bcas pa bsang gtor bya'o /
T02D2589:182b-6: de nas dkyil 'khor chen po byin gyis brlab par
T02D2589:182b-7: bya ba'i phyir rdo rje 'khor lo'i phag rgya kha'i
T02D2589:182b-9: aom badzra tsakra h'um zhes bzlas brjod bya'o //
T02D2589:182b-10: de nas phyi dro'i dus su glu dang rol mo'i mchod pa rnams dang /
T02D2589:182b-11: me tog dang spos la sogs pa rnams kyis dang po'i 'khor lo ji snyed pa dang ;
T02D2589:182b-12: ci 'dod pa de bzhin du mchod cing brtag par bya'o //
T02D2589:182b-13: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur po'i dam tshig
T02D2589:182b-14: sems dpa'i sku gzugs lugs ma la sogs pa dmar
T02D2589:182b-15: skya sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod la rang gi
T02D2589:182b-16: snying pos bzhugs su gsol te /
T02D2589:182b-17: yi ge phyin ci ma log pas kha sbyar gyi
T02D2589:182b-18: sdom pa gsal bar snang la bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan
T02D2589:182b-19: 'das rang gi dam tshig phyag rgyas dgug pa la
T02D2589:182b-20: sogs pa'i tshul gyis bkug la bcug ste bcings nas
T02D2589:182b-22: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab pa byas la //
T02D2589:182b-23: byin gyis brlab cing mnyes par byas nas gzhag par bya ste /
T02D2589:182b-24: de bzhin du thams cad la'ang shes par bya'o //
T02D2589:182b-25: aom h'um hr'i: bha ga b'ana dzny'a na m'u rti b'a g'i shvar //
T02D2589:182b-26: ma h'a pa tsa ga ga na /
T02D2589:182b-27: aa ma la su pa ri shuddh dharmma dh'a tu
T02D2589:182b-28: dzny'a na garbha a'a: zhes bya ba 'dis dbus su
T02D2589:182b-29: bcom ldan 'das bzhugs su gsol te /
T02D2589:182b-31: aom h'um hr'i: zhes bya ba'i snying pos bzhugs su gsol te /
T02D2589:182b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po yin pa'i phyir thams cad kyi thun mong yin no //
T02D2589:182b-33: yang na rang rang gi sngags kyis bzhugs su gsol te /
T02D2589:182b-34: de la aom bhr'um aushn'i sha /
T02D2589:182b-35: shar gyi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la'o //
T02D2589:182b-36: aom te dzo ra shi sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:182b-38: aom ma ma ma ma h'um /
T02D2589:182b-42: aom gle sha aashta ni h'um phat /
T02D2589:182b-46: audgha ta aashn'i sha dhu na dhu na h'um /
T02D2589:182b-50: aom dzva la dzva la aushn'i sha /
T02D2589:183a-3: aom h'um tr'am hr'i: aa: zhes bya ba'i snying pos mi bskyod pa dang /
T02D2589:183a-6: don yod par grub pa ste /
T02D2589:183a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dgod par bya'o //
T02D2589:183a-12: aom rdo rje rin chen no //
T02D2589:183a-13: aom rdo rje gzi brjid do //
T02D2589:183a-14: tram rdo rje rgyal mtshan no //
T02D2589:183a-22: h'um rdo rje gnod sbyin no //
T02D2589:183a-23: bam rdo rje khu tshur ro //
T02D2589:183a-26: sgo rnams su dza: rdo rje lcags skyu'o //
T02D2589:183a-28: bam rdo rje lcags sgrog go //
T02D2589:183a-30: aom badzra be ga aa kra ma h'um zhes bya ba dang //
T02D2589:183a-31: rdo rje shugs kyis byung la /
T02D2589:183a-32: gnyis pa gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du //
T02D2589:183a-33: aom bh'u mi bi sho dha ni sarba aartha pa
T02D2589:183a-34: ri p'u ra ni bam tam zhes bya bas shar
T02D2589:183a-36: aom sarba p'a ra mi t'a aartha pa ri p'u
T02D2589:183a-37: ra ni ao pra h'um ham zhes bya bas lho
T02D2589:183a-38: phyogs su pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dgod do
T02D2589:183a-39: // aom sarba ba shi te hram ru h'um zhes bya bas nub tu dbang thams cad dgod do //
T02D2589:183a-40: aom kha sa m'a: sarba dharma kham zhes bya bas byang du gzungs thams cad dgod do //
T02D2589:183a-41: de nyid du sgo rnams su dza: rdo rje lcags kyu'o //
T02D2589:183a-43: bam rdo rje lcags sgog go //
T02D2589:183a-45: mtshams su ho rdo rje sgeg mo'o //
T02D2589:183a-46: l'a rdo rje phreng ba ma'o //
T02D2589:183a-49: rdo rje shugs kyis rgal la rim pa gsum pa'i
T02D2589:183a-50: dkyil 'khor du shar nas kun du bzang po la
T02D2589:183a-51: sogs pa dgod par bya ste /
T02D2589:183a-52: aom sa manta bha dra sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:183a-54: aom aa ksha ya karmma a'a bar na bi sho dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:183a-55: ku kshi ha ra dz'a sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:183a-56: aom kha a'a k'a sha garbha ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:183a-57: lho phyogs su aom ga ga n'a g'a na dz'a sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:183a-58: aom rtan b'a ni sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:183a-59: aom s'a ga ra ma ti sam ha ra sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:183a-62: aom hr'i: aom sth'a me sth'a me ma h'a sth'e me ba ti sv'a h'a //
T02D2589:183a-63: tsandre su tsa nbre bya ba lo gi te sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:183a-64: aom dzva la ni ma h'a dzva la ni sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:183a-66: aom aa mri te pra bhe aa mri ta ba ti h'um /
T02D2589:183b-0: aom bra ti @183b bha ne bra ti bha na ku te h'um /
T02D2589:183b-1: aom sarba sho ka ta mo ni ra ha ta ma hi h'um /
T02D2589:183b-2: aom sarba ni ba ra na bishkam bi na h'um /
T02D2589:183b-7: aom aa mri ta kunda li bighna nta ka h'um /
T02D2589:183b-11: grihn'a pa la ya grihn'a pa la ya h'um a'a
T02D2589:183b-12: na ya ho: bha ga b'an bidya r'a dza h'um
T02D2589:183b-13: phat // khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i 'o //
T02D2589:183b-14: aom badzra dzva la aa na l'a rka h'um /
T02D2589:183b-16: aom he ru ka badzra sa ma ya hr'i sarba
T02D2589:183b-17: dushta sa ma ya mutta bra bha sta tsakra h'um
T02D2589:183b-31: sgo'i mtshams kyi le'u co rnams su'o //
T02D2589:183b-32: rdo rje shugs kyis phyung la /
T02D2589:183b-33: phyi rol gyi rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du
T02D2589:183b-34: tshangs pa la sogs aom dang sv'a h'a gnyis par
T02D2589:183b-35: du ming dang ldan par dgod par bya ste /
T02D2589:183b-36: aom bra hma ne sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:183b-38: zhes thams cad la sbyar ro //
T02D2589:183b-39: de nas dkyil 'khor yang dag par mchod la //
T02D2589:183b-40: lha'i 'khor lo phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab par bsgoms nas //
T02D2589:183b-41: de'i gsang sngags brjod la dkyil 'khor len bdun bskor ba bya ste /
T02D2589:183b-42: rdo rje dril bu dkrol la me tog sngon po'i phreng ba blangs te /
T02D2589:183b-43: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi sbyor bas bskor ba lan
T02D2589:183b-44: gsum byas la nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir
T02D2589:183b-45: bltas la / bcom ldan 'das la phrul te /
T02D2589:183b-46: gar byas nas blangs la rdo rje h'um mdzad nyid kyis rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2589:183b-47: de'i 'og rdo rje slob dpon mnyam par gzhag pas
T02D2589:183b-48: dbus su 'dug la yid kyis sgo bzhi dbye bar
T02D2589:183b-49: bya ste / aom badzra audbha ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha ya h'um //
T02D2589:183b-50: 'di'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje mdzu ba mo legs pa ni //
T02D2589:183b-51: sbyar la bkan te bsdams nas su //
T02D2589:183b-52: rab tu khros nas dbye ba ni //
T02D2589:183b-53: sgo 'byed pa yi mchog yin no //
T02D2589:183b-54: de'i 'og tu phyag bzhi sngon du 'gro ba'i sdom pa bzung bar byas la //
T02D2589:183b-55: gos dmar po la rdo rje sems dpa' dang gtsug tor yongs su bzlas pa'i se'u ka bcings te /
T02D2589:184a-2: rdo rje go chas go gon zhing ze'u ka la
T02D2589:184a-3: sogs pa bcings pa'i slob dpon 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi
T02D2589:184a-4: dam tshig gi phyag rgyas me tog gi phreng ba
T02D2589:184a-5: blangs la // aom badzra sa ma ya pra be sha mi zhes brjod do //
T02D2589:184a-6: de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs la bdag nyid 'jug par bya ste //
T02D2589:184a-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pas rang gi snying gar phyag rgya dgrol ba la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D2589:184a-9: phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por dor la //
T02D2589:184a-10: rang gi mgo la bcings te gdong g-yogs dgrol chu'i dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2589:184a-11: sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan dang /
T02D2589:184a-16: rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ba rnams bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas la //
T02D2589:184a-17: bcom ldan 'das las blang bar bya zhing //
T02D2589:184a-18: de kho na nyid dang chos kyi sdom pa dang /
T02D2589:184a-19: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs rnams kyang blangs nas me tog la sogs pa dang /
T02D2589:184a-20: sgeg mo la sogs pas bdag nyid yang dag par mchod de //
T02D2589:184a-21: 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi phyag rgya chen por mthong na /
T02D2589:184a-22: manydzu gho sha ham zhes rang gi ming brjod par bya'o //
T02D2589:184a-23: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor ma lus par bsgrub ra
T02D2589:184a-24: bya'o / bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs
T02D2589:184a-25: ji lta bur ni bka' nod do //
T02D2589:184a-26: de ltar bgyis nas bdag ming brjod //
T02D2589:184a-27: de nas rdo rje sgrub par bgyi //
T02D2589:184a-28: zhes bya bas sgrub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2589:184a-30: rdo rje slob dpon mnyam par gzhag ste /
T02D2589:184a-31: rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' yi //
T02D2589:184a-32: rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni //
T02D2589:184a-33: rjod rje se gol brdab bgyis la //
T02D2589:184a-34: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bgyi //
T02D2589:184a-35: aom badzra sa ma ya dza dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2589:184a-36: de nas mgon po 'jam dbyangs kyi //
T02D2589:184a-37: phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing //
T02D2589:184a-38: ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni //
T02D2589:184a-39: lan cig rab tu brjod par bgyi //
T02D2589:184a-41: mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud //
T02D2589:184a-42: yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud //
T02D2589:184a-43: stong nyid las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02D2589:184a-44: sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud //
T02D2589:184a-45: sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud //
T02D2589:184a-47: sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud //
T02D2589:184b-3: sangs rgyas gsung nyid khyod la 'dud //
T02D2589:184b-5: med pa las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02D2589:184b-7: nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02D2589:184b-8: ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud //
T02D2589:184b-10: sangs rgyas rol ston khyod la 'dud //
T02D2589:184b-11: thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud //
T02D2589:184b-12: ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud //
T02D2589:184b-14: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas rang rang gi sgo nas dgug pa dang /
T02D2589:184b-17: dbang du bya ba byas la mchod yon phul te /
T02D2589:184b-19: dri shya ho zhes brjod do //
T02D2589:184b-20: dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya ho nya ham /
T02D2589:184b-21: de nas rang gi gsang sngags brjod do //
T02D2589:184b-22: de ltar na grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2589:184b-23: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams bstan par bya ste //
T02D2589:184b-24: dam tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni //
T02D2589:184b-25: rdo rje bsdams las byung bas na //
T02D2589:184b-26: de dag bsdams pa rdo rje yi //
T02D2589:184b-27: bsdams pa bla med bshad par bya //
T02D2589:184b-28: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings pa las byung ba ni gtsug gtor rnams kyi'o //
T02D2589:184b-29: rdo rje bsdams pa las gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs gsum pa bcag la ral gri lta bur bzhag //
T02D2589:184b-30: mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs la mthe bo'i steng du bcag
T02D2589:184b-31: nas gzhag pa ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi phyag rgya'o
T02D2589:184b-32: // mthe'u chung srin lag khu tshur bya //
T02D2589:184b-33: gung mo dag ni rab tu brkyang //
T02D2589:184b-34: mdzub mo mthe bo sbyar ba ni //
T02D2589:184b-35: 'khor los sgyur nyid ster byed pa'o //
T02D2589:184b-36: rab tu brkyang nas sbyar ba ni //
T02D2589:184b-37: gtsug tor dkar po yin par bshad //
T02D2589:184b-38: srin lag mthe bong legs sbyar zhing //
T02D2589:184b-39: gung mo gnyis ni rnam par brtag //
T02D2589:184b-40: gzi brjid phung po de bzhin du //
T02D2589:184b-41: ral gri sbyar ba rnam rgyal yin //
T02D2589:184b-42: de nyid rgyal ba zhes grags pa'i //
T02D2589:184b-43: rdo rje dkrol ba de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2589:184b-44: khu tshur nang du ldan byas la //
T02D2589:184b-47: mi bskyed pa yis la reg //
T02D2589:184b-48: de bzhin mchog sbyin rin chen 'byung //
T02D2589:184b-49: bsam gtan phyag rgya 'od dpag med //
T02D2589:184b-50: don yod grub kyi mi 'jigs sbyin //
T02D2589:185a-1: mo gnyis ni sbyar ba mchog //
T02D2589:185a-2: mthe bong mthe chung rab tu brkyang //
T02D2589:185a-3: lcags kyu mda' yi sbyor ba dang //
T02D2589:185a-4: legs so zhes ni sbyin par bya //
T02D2589:185a-5: dbus ma rin chen rdo rje mchog //
T02D2589:185a-6: mdzub mo rnams phye gzi brjod mchog //
T02D2589:185a-7: rgyal mtshan gsan sus nges sbyar dang //
T02D2589:185a-8: bzhad pa'i dus su rab sbyar te //
T02D2589:185a-9: rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che //
T02D2589:185a-10: gung mo padma rab bskum pa'o //
T02D2589:185a-13: kha 'byed gyur pa'i phyag rgya ni //
T02D2589:185a-14: rdo rje smra ba 'ba' zhig gi //
T02D2589:185a-15: las kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni //
T02D2589:185a-16: sna tshogs rdo rje gar byed pa'o //
T02D2589:185a-17: go cha gon pa'i tshul dag ni //
T02D2589:185a-18: rdo rje srung ba'i mche ba gnyis //
T02D2589:185a-19: rnam gtsigs rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi //
T02D2589:185a-20: khu tshur bsdus pa khu tshur gyi //
T02D2589:185a-21: thal mo khong stong sbyar nas ni //
T02D2589:185a-22: mthe bong gnyis ni gzhi bas nas su //
T02D2589:185a-23: mdzub gnyis mig gi dbyibs 'drar byas //
T02D2589:185a-24: sangs rgyas spyan ni yin par bshad //
T02D2589:185a-25: mdzub mo mthe bo rdo rje nyid //
T02D2589:185a-26: m'a ma k'i yi yin par bshad //
T02D2589:185a-27: padma'i thal mo gos dkar mo //
T02D2589:185a-28: rdo rje thal mo kha phye ba //
T02D2589:185a-30: mthe'u chung gnyis ni legs mdud la /
T02D2589:185a-31: mdzub mo dag ni lcags kyur sbyar //
T02D2589:185a-32: de nyid zhags pa lta bu dang //
T02D2589:185a-33: lcags sgrog 'dra ba dag tu'ang brtag //
T02D2589:185a-34: bzhi pa rdo rje dril bur ni //
T02D2589:185a-35: srin lag nang bcug khu tshur ni //
T02D2589:185a-36: mdzub mo gnyis ni legs sbyar ba //
T02D2589:185a-37: rdo rje chen po zhes grags te /
T02D2589:185a-38: rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bar sbyar //
T02D2589:185a-40: thal mo khong stong du sbyar la //
T02D2589:185a-41: mdzub mo gnyis rgyal tu bkug ste /
T02D2589:185a-42: rin po che 'dra bar gzhag pa ni //
T02D2589:185a-43: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi'o //
T02D2589:185a-44: sor mo thams cad brkyang la /
T02D2589:185a-45: padma lta bur gzhag pa ni dbang thams cad kyi'o //
T02D2589:185a-46: sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya nyid ni gzungs thams cad kyi'o //
T02D2589:185a-47: rdo rje thal mo snying gar bzhag la //
T02D2589:185a-48: rdo rje sgeg mo yin par bshad //
T02D2589:185a-49: spyi bo'i gnas su thal sbyar ba //
T02D2589:185a-50: rdo rje phreng bar rnam par bsgrags //
T02D2589:185a-51: thal mo sbyar ba khar bud pa //
T02D2589:185a-52: rdo rje glu ma yin par bshad //
T02D2589:185a-53: gar brdung ba yi tshul gyis ni //
T02D2589:185a-54: bskor nas 'jog par gar gyi yin //
T02D2589:185a-55: padmo'i thal mo thur du ldugs //
T02D2589:185b-0: @185b thal mo spyi bor 'jog pa ni me tog gi'o //
T02D2589:185b-1: snying gar mthe bong bsnyams pa ni mar me'i 'o //
T02D2589:185b-2: rab tu brkyang nas byug pa ni byugs pa'i 'o //
T02D2589:185b-3: gzugs kyi phyag rgya ni steng du lag pa gnyis rab tu brkyang ba'o //
T02D2589:185b-4: rna ba'i thad kar brkyang pa ni sgra'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:185b-5: dri rnam par bkod pa'i tshul ni dri'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:185b-6: khar thal mo sbyar ba ni ro'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:185b-7: nam mkha' la reg pa'i tshul ni reg gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:185b-8: thal mo khong stong du sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste /
T02D2589:185b-9: rin po che ltar byas pa ni kun du bzang po'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:185b-10: thal mo legs par brkyang nas yid bzhin gyi nor
T02D2589:185b-11: bu 'dzin pa lta bu ni blo gros mi zad
T02D2589:185b-12: pa'i phyag rgya'o // sa gnon gyi phyag rgya nyid ni sa'i snying po'i 'o //
T02D2589:185b-13: mdzub mo gnyis nang du bcug la /
T02D2589:185b-14: ral gri ltar byas pa ni nam mkha'i snying po'i 'o //
T02D2589:185b-15: gar brdung ba'i tshul gyis rin po che'i rdo rje snying gar gzhag pa ni //
T02D2589:185b-17: lag pa gnyis legs par brkyang pa ni phyag na rin chen gyi'o //
T02D2589:185b-18: lag pa gnyis mtsho'i rlabs ltar bya ba ni rgya mtsho'i blo gro skyi'o //
T02D2589:185b-19: rdo rje rtse lang ba'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje snying po'i 'o //
T02D2589:185b-20: gar byed pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje thal mo brkyang
T02D2589:185b-21: la padma ltar bya ba ni phyag na padma'i 'o
T02D2589:185b-22: // ral gri 'debs pa'i tshul du lag pa gnyis brkyang ba ni ma thu chen thob pa'i 'o //
T02D2589:185b-23: mthe bo dang mdzub mo zla ba 'dra bar byas pa ni zla 'od kyi'o//
T02D2589:185b-24: 'od 'phro ba gtong ba lta bu ni dra ba can gyi 'od kyi'o //
T02D2589:185b-25: dbang bskur ba ster ba'i tshul ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i 'o //
T02D2589:185b-26: se gol brdebs pa'i tshul du byed pa ni sbobs [?] pa rnam par brtsegs pa'i 'o //
T02D2589:185b-27: thal mo sbyar ba 'byed pa ni mya ngan gyi
T02D2589:185b-28: mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros
T02D2589:185b-29: kyi'o // ral gri brdebs pa'i tshul du byed cing
T02D2589:185b-30: gnas pa ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
T02D2589:185b-31: kyi'o // ba'i 'o // rdo rje bsdams pa las
T02D2589:185b-32: gung mo gnyis gzhibs la srin lag gnyis kyi g-yas
T02D2589:185b-33: pa'i mdzub mos g-yon pa'i srin lag dang /
T02D2589:185b-34: g-yon pa'i mdzub mos g-yas pa srin lag bzung la zlum par bya ste /
T02D2589:185b-35: mthe bong gnyis mngon par phyogs par byas la //
T02D2589:185b-36: kha'i tshul du gzhag pa ni gshin rje gshed kyi'o //
T02D2589:186a-0: lag pa g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa @186a * //
T02D2589:186a-1: las khro bo'i mdzub mo snying gar bzhag la //
T02D2589:186a-2: lag pa g-yas pa thal lcag gi tshul du byas pa ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i 'o //
T02D2589:186a-3: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las mthe'u chung lu gu
T02D2589:186a-4: rgyud ltar mdud nas mdzub mo gzhi bas te bsgreng
T02D2589:186a-5: ba las ldog nas dpral bar gzhag pa ni rta
T02D2589:186a-7: lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bos mthe bo chung gi
T02D2589:186a-8: sen mo mnan nas dpung mgo'i drud du rdo rje
T02D2589:186a-9: bcing ba'i tshul du byas te gzhag pa ni bdud
T02D2589:186a-10: rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag rgya 'o //
T02D2589:186a-11: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya nyid ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:186a-12: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la sor mo
T02D2589:186a-13: rnams dbus su 'bar bltar byas nas mthe bo gnyis
T02D2589:186a-14: bsgreng ba ni rdo rje ltar me 'bar ba'i 'o
T02D2589:186a-15: // rdo rje bcing ba las mdzub mo gnyis dam
T02D2589:186a-16: du mdud la mthe bong gung mo rdo rje ltar
T02D2589:186a-17: dpral bar gzhag pa ni khrag 'thung gi phyag rgya'o
T02D2589:186a-18: // // sna tshogs rdo rje ba dan gsum pa bsgreng ba ni rta mchog gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:186a-19: 'jig rten pa rnams kyi phyag rgya ni lag ba gcig mdung rtse gsum pa ltar byas la //
T02D2589:186a-20: mthe bos mthe'u chung mnan pa dbang ldan gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:186a-21: de nyid las lag pa g-yas pa steg ste //
T02D2589:186a-22: rdo rje 'dra bar byas la ni brgya byin gyi phyag rgya 'o //
T02D2589:186a-23: aom zhes bya ba'i lag pa la mthe bos dbus su bzhag pa ni me lha'i 'o //
T02D2589:186a-24: mdzub mo dang mthe bo sbyar nas dbyig par byas pa ni gshin rje'i 'o //
T02D2589:186a-25: de nyid las 'khor lo lta bur byas nas gzhag pa ni khyab 'jug gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:186a-26: lag pa gcig na thod pa thogs pa lta bu ni ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:186a-27: sor mo gnyis bsgreng ba ni srin po rnams kyi'o //
T02D2589:186a-28: mdzub mo dang mthe bo sbyar ba zhags pa ltar bya ba ni chu lha'i 'o //
T02D2589:186a-29: mdzub mo dang grung mo gnyis rgyal mtshan ltar bsgreng
T02D2589:186a-30: pa ni rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya ste rlung lha'i
T02D2589:186a-31: 'o // gung mo gcig tu bsgrengs nas dbyig pa
T02D2589:186a-32: ltar bya ba'i phyag rgya ni lus dan po'i 'o
T02D2589:186a-33: 'o // // mchod sbyin thogs kyi phyag rgya ni tshangs pa'i 'o //
T02D2589:186a-34: mdung gi phyag rgya ni drag po'i 'o //
T02D2589:186a-35: glang po'i sna ni tshogs kyi bdag po'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:186a-36: bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor lta bu ni zla ba'i 'o //
T02D2589:186a-37: 'od zer stong 'gyed pa lta bu lag pa gnyis kyis bstan pa ni nyi ma'i phyag rgya'i 'o //
T02D2589:186b-0: @186b pi wang brdung zhing glu len pa lta bu ni dri za rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:186b-1: rdza rnga brdung ba lta bu ni dga' byed dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:186b-2: 'khar dkrol thogs pa lta bu ni mi'am ci'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:186b-3: rtag par rnga brdung ba lta bu ni rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:186b-4: lag pa gnyis gdengs ka ltar bya ba ni klu rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:186b-5: gzhan dag ni phyag rgya chen po nyid dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
T02D2589:186b-6: snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje bsgoms nas phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2589:186b-7: lce la yi ge hri las padma de'i steng du
T02D2589:186b-8: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du h'um
T02D2589:186b-9: las rdo rje // de'i dbus su hr'i: las byung
T02D2589:186b-10: ba'i bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa sku
T02D2589:186b-12: sngags kyi yi ge thams cad brjod pa ni chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:186b-13: aa las sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor bsams la
T02D2589:186b-14: gar las byung ba ni las kyi phyag rgya ste
T02D2589:186b-15: // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa
T02D2589:186b-16: la mchod pa la 'jug par byed pa rdo rje
T02D2589:186b-18: phyag rgya chen po yang ji ltar bris pa'i rjes
T02D2589:186b-19: su mthun par sa bon gyi yi ge rnams las
T02D2589:186b-21: de ltar phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab pa'i lha'i 'khor
T02D2589:186b-22: lo rnams rnam par bsgoms pa la bum pa gang
T02D2589:186b-23: ba la sogs bas ma don par mchod par bya'o
T02D2589:186b-24: // de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ji skad du bshad pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa //

T02D2589:186b-27: man s'u ni aa dad tu ku ru ku ru
T02D2589:186b-28: dza:h'um bam ho: aa: zhes bya bas 'jam dpal dbyangs
T02D2589:186b-29: kyi dam tshig phyag rgya rgyas bzung la /
T02D2589:186b-30: me tog gi yal ga las lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas la /
T02D2589:186b-31: mgon po 'jam ba'i dbyangs kyi spyan sngar gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2589:186b-32: bum pa gzhan dag kyang mi bskyod pa la sogs

T02D2589:186b-35: lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la /

T02D2589:186b-38: so so zhing re re zhig gam /
T02D2589:186b-39: spyi la de bzhin du dbul bar bya'o //

T02D2589:191a-27: dri za srin po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang //
T02D2589:191a-28: gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can //
T02D2589:191a-29: bu smad tshogs bcas g-yog 'khor bcas pa la /
T02D2589:191a-30: bdag gis pus mo sa la btsugs nas su //
T02D2589:191a-31: thal mo sbyar te khyed la gsol 'debs kyis //
T02D2589:191a-32: gnas nas phan gdags slang du 'dir spyon cig /'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang //
T02D2589:191a-33: dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang //
T02D2589:191a-34: shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang //
T02D2589:191a-35: ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang //
T02D2589:191a-36: chu bo kun dang chu yi mdo rnams dang //
T02D2589:191a-37: rin chen gnas na lhag par gnas pa dang //
T02D2589:191a-38: mtsho dang rdzing dang lteng ka chu ngogs dang //
T02D2589:191a-39: g-ya' chu sil ma can na gang gnas dang //
T02D2589:191a-40: grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer stong pa dang //
T02D2589:191a-41: khang stong dang ni lha yi khang pa dang //
T02D2589:191b-0: gtsug lag khang @191b ngam grong khyer gnas dag gam //
T02D2589:191b-1: dka' thub gnas dang glang chen bres dang ni //
T02D2589:191b-2: rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang //
T02D2589:191b-3: lam srang bzhi mdo dag dang sum mdo dang //
T02D2589:191b-4: gang dag lam chen dang ni shing gcig drung //
T02D2589:191b-5: dur khrod chen po'am nags tshal chen po dang //
T02D2589:191b-6: seng ge dred dang gcan zan gnas dag dang //
T02D2589:191b-7: 'brog chen 'jigs su rung bar gang gnas dang //
T02D2589:191b-8: gang dag gling mchog dag na gnas pa dang //
T02D2589:191b-9: lhun po dur khrod dag na gnas pa rnams //
T02D2589:191b-10: rab tu dgyes shing mgu bar gyur nas su //
T02D2589:191b-11: phreng ba me tog dri dang bdug pa dang //
T02D2589:191b-12: bstod dang gtor ma mar me gus phul ba //
T02D2589:191b-13: 'di dag bzhes te btung zhing bsnams nas su //
T02D2589:191b-14: las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
T02D2589:191b-16: de ltar gtor ma sbyin pa thams cad ni 'phags pa gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ba'am /
T02D2589:191b-17: rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i sbyor bas bya'o //
T02D2589:191b-18: de nas nye reg byas la lhag dang ma tshang
T02D2589:191b-19: ba'i cho ga'i nyes pa nye bar zhi bar bya
T02D2589:191b-20: ba'i phyir / sbyan la sogs pas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas la /
T02D2589:191b-21: phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan rnams kyi rigs kyi dbye bas dkyil 'khor mchod par bya ste /
T02D2589:191b-22: rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya ni phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:191b-23: las kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya ni phyag rgya'i lan no //
T02D2589:191b-24: rin po che'i rigs kyi phyag rgya ni phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:191b-25: padma'i rigs kyi phyag rgya ni phyag rgya'i lan te /
T02D2589:191b-26: shin tu byang bar bslabs pa'i slob ma dang /
T02D2589:191b-27: rang nyid kyis bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2589:191b-28: gal te dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i zhag 'byor pa
T02D2589:191b-29: yod na dkyil 'khor las ha cang mi ring bar
T02D2589:191b-30: bsnyen bkur dang gus pa sngon du 'gro bas shar
T02D2589:191b-31: du bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol
T02D2589:191b-32: tu phyin pa bklag par bya'o //
T02D2589:191b-33: lhor ni rin po che tog gi mdo /
T02D2589:191b-34: nub tu sdong pos brgyan pa'o //
T02D2589:191b-35: byang du zla ba'i sgron ma'i mdo bklag par bya zhing /
T02D2589:191b-36: phyi rol du gar byed du gzhug pa la sogs
T02D2589:191b-37: pa ltad mo pa rnams kyang phyogs bzhir byed du
T02D2589:191b-38: gzhug go // de nas lus khrus byas shing dris
T02D2589:191b-39: bsgos pa me tog gi phreng bas brgyan pa gdong
T02D2589:191b-40: dri zhim pos byugs shing bdag nyid rgyan thams cad
T02D2589:192a-0: kyis brgyan nas mgo bo 'jam pa'i dbyangs @192a *
T02D2589:192a-1: gzhug go // // kyi phyag rgya'i mchog gis me
T02D2589:192a-2: tog gi phreng ba bzung la dkyil 'khor du 'jug
T02D2589:192a-4: byang chub kyi sems bskyed cing sdom pa gzung ba la sogs pa byas nas 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2589:192a-5: 'jug pa'i tshe slob ma la sogs pas 'di ltar glu blang ngo //
T02D2589:192a-6: aom pra bi sha bha ga b'an ma h'a su kha mo kasha bu ram /
T02D2589:192a-7: sarba si ddhi ma h'a su kh'a ra mya pa
T02D2589:192a-8: ra su kho tta ma si ddhya dza: h'um bam
T02D2589:192a-10: zhugs nas rol cing dga' ba dang //
T02D2589:192a-11: sgeg pas mgon la phyag bya'o //
T02D2589:192a-12: phyag byas nas ni dkyil 'khor der //
T02D2589:192a-13: lan gsum bar du bskor bar bya //
T02D2589:192a-14: ma h'a ra ta su ti dha su su to shya /
T02D2589:192a-15: su khu kho manydzu na tha bya si ddha m'a ma zhes kyang brjod do //
T02D2589:192a-16: de nas yang mdun du 'dug la de kho na nyid 'di lan cig brjod do //
T02D2589:192a-17: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
T02D2589:192a-18: rdo rje chen po rin che ba //
T02D2589:192a-19: ye shas chen po las che ba //
T02D2589:192a-20: 'jam pa'i rdo rje de dag grub //
T02D2589:192a-21: de nas rdo rje chu 'thungs la /
T02D2589:192a-22: khro bo'i khu tshur rdo rje sems ma'i khu tshur gyis phye la bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
T02D2589:192a-23: badzra a'a be sha aa: zhes byas la bcom ldan
T02D2589:192a-24: 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang mi bskyod pa la sogs
T02D2589:192a-25: bas bdag nyid gang bar bsams la /
T02D2589:192a-26: yi ge brgya pa brjod na babs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2589:192a-27: de nas dbab pa'i phyag rgya snying po 'dis snying gar dgrol lo //
T02D2589:192a-28: aom tishtha badzra dzri dho me bha ba /
T02D2589:192a-29: sh'a shva to me bha ba aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D2589:192a-30: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02D2589:192a-33: sarba si ddhim me phra ya tstsha /
T02D2589:192a-34: sarba ka rmma su tsa me ci ttam shre ya:
T02D2589:192a-35: ku ru h'um ha ha ha ha ho: de nas
T02D2589:192a-36: phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por snying po 'dis
T02D2589:192a-37: dor bar bya'o // aom pa ra ma su kh'a
T02D2589:192a-38: sh'a ya su la li ti bi l'a sa na
T02D2589:192a-39: mi te na ma mi bha ga b'a na dza:
T02D2589:192a-40: h'um bam ho: hi hi hi hi pra t'i tstsha
T02D2589:192a-41: badzra ku su ma aa nydza lin n'a tha ho
T02D2589:192a-42: dor bar bya'o // / de nas phreng ba bcing ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D2589:192a-43: dngos grub kyi rdo rje blang ba'i bar du byas la //
T02D2589:192a-44: rdo rje tha la mo bskor bas bcom ldan 'das
T02D2589:192a-45: la phyag byas nas 'og nas bshad pa'i cho gas
T02D2589:192a-46: sdom pa 'dzin pa'i bar du byas pa kho nang

T02D2589:192a-49: phyir byung la slob ma gzhug par bya ste /
T02D2589:192a-50: slob dpon du 'os pa'i slob ma las thams cad pa'i chus bsangs la /
T02D2589:192b-0: rdo rje @192b sems dpar byin gyis brlab cing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan la /
T02D2589:192b-1: rdo rje gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i gos dmar pos stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs bskon la /
T02D2589:192b-2: aom badzra tishthi h'um phags ces mngon par bsngags pa gos dmar po las byas pa'i gtsug tor dang /
T02D2589:192b-3: sgo srung bzhi'i snying po yongs su bzlas pa'i gos dmar po'i gdong g-yogs bcings la /
T02D2589:192b-4: yon gyi dam pa dag phul ba yongs su gzung ste /
T02D2589:192b-8: spyi bo rnams su rdo rje dang /
T02D2589:192b-9: rin po che dang padma dang /
T02D2589:192b-10: sna tshogs rdo rje zla ba'i steng du de'i sa bon gyis rnam par bkod la /
T02D2589:192b-11: shar gyi sgor rdo rje thal mo brkyang nas lus thams cad phab pas /
T02D2589:192b-12: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dzo pasth'a n'a ya a'a tma nam ni r++y'a ta y'a mi /

T02D2589:192b-14: aa dhi ti shtha sva m'am zhes brjod la phyag byed du gzhug go //
T02D2589:192b-15: de nas rang gi bdag po las gnang ba thob
T02D2589:192b-16: cing rdo rje sems dpas rang gi rigs kyi bdag
T02D2589:192b-17: nyid can dang 'dra bar sprul la /
T02D2589:192b-18: de'i snying gar bcug nas byin gyis brlab par rnam par bsam mo /
T02D2589:192b-19: de nas phyogs kyi sgor 'dug la rdo rje thal mo snyid gar sbyar nas /
T02D2589:192b-20: dpral ba sa la reg par phyag byed du gzhug go //
T02D2589:192b-21: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza aa bhi she ka ya /
T02D2589:192b-22: a'a tma nam ni r++y'a ta y'a mi sarba ta

T02D2589:192b-28: kha sa la reg pa'i phyag byed du gzhug go //
T02D2589:192b-29: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza bra bar ta na ya /
T02D2589:192b-30: a'a dma nam ni r++y'a ta y'a mi /
T02D2589:192b-31: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra dha rmma bra bar ta ya m'am /

T02D2589:192b-33: kyi 'khor lo bskor bar nus pa bskyed par bsam
T02D2589:192b-34: mo // de nas byang phyogs kyi sgor 'dug la
T02D2589:192b-35: rdo rje thal mo snying gar sbyor du bcug la
T02D2589:192b-36: mo // ; mgo bo sa la reg bar phyag byed du gzhug go //
T02D2589:192b-37: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza karmma ni a'a tma nam ni r++y'a ta y'a mi /
T02D2589:192b-38: sarba ta th'a g'a ta badzra ka rmma ku ru m'am /
T02D2589:192b-39: des kyad [*kyang?] de bzhin du rdo rje las kyis byin gyis brlabs pas /

T02D2589:193a-2: de nas shar phyogs kyi sgor bzhag la de bzhin du sdom pa sbyin no //
T02D2589:193a-3: aom bo dhi tsi tta autp'a da y'a mi zhes brjod do //
T02D2589:193a-4: byang chub sems ni bla med pa //
T02D2589:193a-5: dam pa dag gis bskyed nas su //
T02D2589:193a-6: de yi snying gar rdo rje ni //
T02D2589:193a-7: snying pos rab tu gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2589:193a-8: de nas su ra ta sa ma ya stvam ho /
T02D2589:193a-9: siddhi badzra ya th'a su kham zhes bskul lo //
T02D2589:193a-10: de nas sa ma ya stvam zhes pa'i sngags kyis
T02D2589:193a-11: 'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'ching
T02D2589:193a-12: du gzhug cing / de bzhin du phreng ba 'dzin du gzhug go //
T02D2589:193a-13: de nas snga ma bzhin du rang nyid 'jug pas
T02D2589:193a-14: zhugs pa la yang lan gsum pa skor ba byas
T02D2589:193a-15: nas / 'dod chags chen po'i bde ba che //
T02D2589:193a-16: rdo rje chen po rin che ba //
T02D2589:193a-17: ye shes chen po las che ba //
T02D2589:193a-18: 'gro kun bdag nyid grub par mdzod //
T02D2589:193a-21: bskul bas me tog dor ba la sogs pa cho ga thams cad rjes su bsgrubs la ;
T02D2589:193a-22: phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis mngon par mchod de /
T02D2589:193a-23: 'dis bden pa'i byin gyis brlab pa bya'o //
T02D2589:193a-24: sems can kun gyi yid khyab cing //
T02D2589:193a-25: sems can kun gyi snying la zhugs //
T02D2589:193a-26: sems can kun gyi yab gyur nyid //
T02D2589:193a-27: 'dod chags dam tshig mchog gyur pa'o //
T02D2589:193a-28: mgon po bden pa 'di yis ni //
T02D2589:193a-29: bdag la khyed kyis 'dod rdzogs shog / ces bya'o //
T02D2589:193a-30: de nas chos kyi dbyings kyi byin rlabs dang //
T02D2589:193a-31: dam tshig kyang ni dgongs pa yis //
T02D2589:193a-32: dngos grub thams cad thob pa'i phyir //
T02D2589:193a-33: thugs rjes 'gro kun don mdzod cig / ces bya
T02D2589:193a-34: ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab nas
T02D2589:193a-35: / slob ma gzhug pa'i phyir bka' nod par bya ste /
T02D2589:193a-36: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
T02D2589:193a-37: rdo rje slob dpon brtul zhugs che //
T02D2589:193a-38: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2589:193a-39: slob ma 'di ni gzhug par bgyi //
T02D2589:193a-40: rdo rje ye shes thob byed pa'i //
T02D2589:193a-41: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
T02D2589:193a-43: bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bgyi //
T02D2589:193a-45: sa ma ya h'um zhes brjod de slob ma bcug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2589:193a-46: ma h'a ra ta pu ti dha su to shya
T02D2589:193a-47: su su kho badzra satva daya siddhya mam zhes smos
T02D2589:193b-0: shig / de nas @193b 'di skad ces kyang bsgo'o
T02D2589:193b-1: // deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis //
T02D2589:193b-2: ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grub pa'ang thob na /
T02D2589:193b-3: dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
T02D2589:193b-4: de lta bu'i ye shes bskyed par bya yis khyod
T02D2589:193b-5: kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la
T02D2589:193b-6: ma smra shig / dam tshig nyams par gyur ta
T02D2589:193b-7: re / de nas rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya
T02D2589:193b-8: kha thur du bstan pa rdo rje slob ma'i spyi
T02D2589:193b-9: bor bzhag la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T02D2589:193b-10: 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje dam tshig yin gyis /
T02D2589:193b-11: gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2589:193b-12: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyang
T02D2589:193b-13: mna'i chu'i snying po sa lan cig bsngags la slob
T02D2589:193b-15: de la mna'i snying po ni 'di yin te /
T02D2589:193b-16: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid khyod kyi //
T02D2589:193b-17: snying la yang dag zhugs mdzad kyis //
T02D2589:193b-18: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02D2589:193b-19: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02D2589:193b-21: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02D2589:193b-22: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02D2589:193b-23: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni //
T02D2589:193b-24: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu yis 'grub //
T02D2589:193b-25: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya rnams //
T02D2589:193b-26: gal te dkyil 'khor ma mthong smras //
T02D2589:193b-28: dad pa med la rten la bstan //
T02D2589:193b-29: de nas slob ma la 'di skad bsgo zhing /
T02D2589:193b-30: deng phyid chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis //
T02D2589:193b-31: ngas 'di gyis shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de yang bya dgos so //
T02D2589:193b-32: khyod kyis nga la brnyas par ma byed cig /
T02D2589:193b-33: mi bde ba ma spangs pas khyod 'chi ba'i dus
T02D2589:193b-34: byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re /
T02D2589:193b-35: 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2589:193b-36: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la dbab par gyur cig ces smros shig ces bsgo'o //
T02D2589:193b-37: de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur ba nyid
T02D2589:193b-38: du sems ma rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di

T02D2589:193b-41: rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags //
T02D2589:193b-42: rdo rje ye shes bla med ni //

T02D2589:194a-0: de nas phyag rgya bcings pa las byung nas de'i @194a * //
T02D2589:194a-2: rdo rje sems ma babs par gyur par bsams na babs par 'gyur ro //

T02D2589:194a-4: se'u 'bru'i me tog dang 'dra ba'i rdo rje sems
T02D2589:194a-5: dpa' rang gi dam tshig dang bcas pa rang gi
T02D2589:194a-6: snying po las nges par phyung la /
T02D2589:194a-8: zhes bya bas de'i snying ga phye la der bcug ste /
T02D2589:194a-9: rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya bcings la sngags brjod de /
T02D2589:194a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang bar gyur bar bsams na yang babs par 'gyur ro //

T02D2589:194a-14: ro // slob ma'i gtso bo'i snying gar rdo rje bya //

T02D2589:194a-16: bdag lus gang yin snod kyi sgo dbye zhing //
T02D2589:194a-17: snying la gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su blta //
T02D2589:194a-18: sngags kyi bdag po yi ge aa dmar gzugs //

T02D2589:194a-20: slob ma'i lus 'dir sgo ni dbye byas par //

T02D2589:194a-24: sngags pas slob ma'i rkang pa de la dbab //
T02D2589:194a-25: kun du dril bu'i sgra ni yang dag dkrol //
T02D2589:194a-26: lag pa'i padma 'bab pa'i phyag rgya byas //
T02D2589:194a-27: mi bskyod rin chen la sogs bde gshegs rnams //
T02D2589:194a-28: rang gi phyogs rtogs las byon 'od babs pas //
T02D2589:194a-29: legs babs gyur pas rang gi bu la blta //

T02D2589:194b-68: aa dzi ta na dza ya /

T02D2589:195a-1: ba'i phyogs su mdzes pa'i ra gnas pa //
T02D2589:195a-2: sngags pas rang gi bu yi mig phye ste //
T02D2589:195a-3: 'khor lo 'di dag ma lus bstan par bya //
T02D2589:195a-4: gang tshe des der ci yang ma mthong na //
T02D2589:195a-5: ra las byung ba'i 'od kyi phreng ba yis //
T02D2589:195a-6: de snying snang bar byas la de nas ni //
T02D2589:195a-7: de ni nyis 'gyur mig tu zhugs par bsam /
T02D2589:195a-8: de yi 'od kyis mig gnyis bskul bas na //
T02D2589:195a-9: de tshe cung zad de yis mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D2589:195a-10: des kyang de bzhin mtshan ma ma mthong na //
T02D2589:195a-11: rjes mthun gnas las bden pa'i byin rlabs bya //
T02D2589:195a-12: 'gro ba'i don la chags bral ma mdzad ces //
T02D2589:195a-13: brtul zhugs can gyis de sogs kyis bskul zhing //
T02D2589:195a-14: pus mo gnyi ka sa la btsugs nas ni //
T02D2589:195a-15: gzugs mthong phyir na mchod yon dbul bar bya //
T02D2589:195a-16: de nas babs te babs ma thag tu lha'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur /
T02D2589:195a-17: ye shes des pha rol gyi sems shes par 'gyur

T02D2589:195a-19: ro // de nas tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas de'i snying ga'i phyag rgya dgrol la /
T02D2589:195a-20: tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs brjod par bya'o //
T02D2589:195a-22: dkyil 'khor du ni legs bcug na //
T02D2589:195a-23: lha yi rigs kyi rim pa dag /
T02D2589:195a-27: rigs ni gang gi snod 'gyur dang //
T02D2589:195a-28: bsod nams mthun ni gang yod pa //
T02D2589:195a-30: de nas aom pa ra ma su kh'a sh'a ya
T02D2589:195a-31: su la la ti bi la s'a na mi ti
T02D2589:195a-32: na m'a mi bha ga w'ana /
T02D2589:195a-33: dza: h'um pam ho: hi hi hi hi /
T02D2589:195a-34: pra t'i tstsha badzra ku su ma aanydza li n'a tha ho:/
T02D2589:195a-35: zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis phreng ba de dkyil 'khor du dor ro //
T02D2589:195a-36: de nas dngos grub rab 'bring me tog babs pa las brtag par bya ste /
T02D2589:195a-37: lha rnams kyi khyad par dang gnas kyi khyad par las brtag ste /
T02D2589:195a-38: gad tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan gyi //
T02D2589:195a-39: dbul me tog babs gyur na //
T02D2589:195a-40: de tshe gtsug tor mdzod spu dag /'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za //
T02D2589:195a-41: spyan la sogs pa'i sngags rnams kyang //
T02D2589:195a-43: stod du babs na phyogs rnams 'grub //
T02D2589:195b-0: ro smad phyogs su @195b babs na ni //
T02D2589:195b-1: dngos grub pa la rnams 'grub par 'gyur //
T02D2589:195b-2: bar gyi sku la babs na ni //
T02D2589:195b-4: smad du babs par gyur na ni //
T02D2589:195b-6: rim pa de dag thams cad ni //
T02D2589:195b-7: rigs bzhi rnams las shes par bya //
T02D2589:195b-8: de bzhin lha rnams gzhan la yang //
T02D2589:195b-9: dngos grub rnam pa gsum du bshad //
T02D2589:195b-10: gal te lha yi gzugs dag las //
T02D2589:195b-11: me tog ring du lhung gyur na //
T02D2589:195b-12: de yi dngos grub yun ring 'gyur //
T02D2589:195b-13: nye na dngos grub myur du 'grub //
T02D2589:195b-14: gsang sngags rnams kyi mchod pa dag / gang du bkram pa tshun chad ni //
T02D2589:195b-15: de yis sa ris de yin te //
T02D2589:195b-16: me tog der lhung de yi rigs //
T02D2589:195b-17: lha gnyis kyi ni bar ngag tu //
T02D2589:195b-18: gal te me tog babs gyur na //
T02D2589:195b-19: gang du nye bar gyur pa ni //
T02D2589:195b-20: de ni de yi rigs su bshad //
T02D2589:195b-21: gal te la la'i me tog ni //
T02D2589:195b-23: de la dngos grub pa la 'grub cing//
T02D2589:195b-24: da ni dad pa'ang rab tu chud //
T02D2589:195b-25: gal te me tog dor ba dag / ra ba'i ri mo la babs na //
T02D2589:195b-26: zhi bar byas nas de nas gdod //
T02D2589:195b-27: nan tan bskyed de 'dor du gzhug / de ste the tshom gyur na ni //
T02D2589:195b-28: mkhas pas bzlas te 'dor mi gzhug / de ni gar yang nges med pas //
T02D2589:195b-30: gnyis kyi bar du mnyam pa dang //
T02D2589:195b-31: don med phyi rol lhung na ni //
T02D2589:195b-32: zhi ba'i spyin sreg byas nas su //
T02D2589:195b-33: de nas me tog 'dor du gzhug / snying por me tog babs na ni //
T02D2589:195b-34: rtag tu don med mi 'gyur bshad //
T02D2589:195b-35: srad bu ngag gi cho ga bzhin //
T02D2589:195b-36: de yi nye 'khor shes par bya //
T02D2589:195b-37: de la sogs pa'i rnam pa yis //
T02D2589:195b-38: me tog rnams ni bor ba la //
T02D2589:195b-39: bdag gi mdun du gang lhung ba //
T02D2589:195b-40: de la zi ba brtsams par bya //
T02D2589:195b-41: sbyin sreg gis ni zhi byas nas //
T02D2589:195b-42: de ni slar yang 'dor du gzhug / lan gsum spogs te bor na yang //
T02D2589:195b-43: gal te legs par ma babs na //
T02D2589:195b-44: re thag bcad de slar gtad ngo ;
T02D2589:195b-45: / de nas me tog babs pa las /
T02D2589:195b-46: lha yang ngag par shes par byas nas /
T02D2589:195b-48: aom pra ti gri hna ta mi mi sa tva
T02D2589:195b-49: ba la zhes brjod nas de'i mgo la bcing ngo
T02D2589:195b-50: // ye shes babs pa'i mtshan ma las nye bar mtshon nas //
T02D2589:195b-51: de la mig gis ji ltar mthong ba zhes dris te /
T02D2589:196a-0: @196a * // des ji ltar mthong ba de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2589:196a-1: gal te dkar po rnam par mthong na ni //
T02D2589:196a-2: de la dngos grub mchog bslab bo //
T02D2589:196a-3: gal te ser po mthong na de la don 'byung ba'i ye shes bslab po //
T02D2589:196a-4: gal te dmar po mthong na de la rjes su chags pa'i ye shes bslab bo ;
T02D2589:196a-5: /'on te nag por mthong na de la mngon spyod kyi ye shes bslab bo //
T02D2589:196a-6: gal te sna tshogs par mthong na de la dngos
T02D2589:196a-7: grub thams cad kyi ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes
T02D2589:196a-9: de nas snying po 'dis gdong g-yogs bkrol te /
T02D2589:196a-10: aom badzra satva sa ma yi te dya tsaksh'u dgha ta ta tpa ra /
T02D2589:196a-11: audhga ta ya ti sarb'a ksho badzra tsaksh'u ra nu tta ram /
T02D2589:196a-12: de nas he badzra pa shya zhes brjod do //
T02D2589:196a-13: de nas gdong g-yogs dgrol nas ni //
T02D2589:196a-14: dkyil 'khor bzang po bstan par bya'o //
T02D2589:196a-15: de nas bla ma dgar gyur nas //
T02D2589:196a-16: slob ma de la 'di skad ces bsgo'o //
T02D2589:196a-18: de ni dad pa rab tu bskyed //
T02D2589:196a-19: khyod ni sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02D2589:196a-20: sngags dang rig pas byin gyis brlabs //
T02D2589:196a-21: 'gro ba phun sum dngos grub kyang //
T02D2589:196a-22: thams cad khyod la mngon du 'gyur //
T02D2589:196a-23: dngos grub thob phyir dam tshig skyongs //
T02D2589:196a-24: gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis //
T02D2589:196a-25: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02D2589:196a-26: mi mnyam med pas zur bzhi snyoms //
T02D2589:196a-27: dran dang dbang pos sgo bzhi ste //
T02D2589:196a-28: bsam gtan rnams kyi rta babs bzhi //
T02D2589:196a-29: ting 'dzin khyams su shes par bya //
T02D2589:196a-30: khyams la brten pa'i rdo rje dag / gzugs rnams lha mos mchod pa yin //
T02D2589:196a-31: rgyan rnams kun gyis bkra ba yin //
T02D2589:196a-32: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o //
T02D2589:196a-33: gdul byas bskyod pa sna tshogs mchog / dar 'phan dril bu sgrogs pa yin //
T02D2589:196a-34: me long ye shes rtag me tog / byang chub yan lag me tog phreng //
T02D2589:196a-35: dra ba dra phyed rin chen mchog / nyi ma zla bar yang dag ldan //
T02D2589:196a-36: kun grub mi zad bde ba ste //
T02D2589:196a-37: bde ba chen po zhes grags pa'o //
T02D2589:196a-38: de ni nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi //
T02D2589:196a-41: dngos grub bde ba kun ster ba'i //
T02D2589:196a-42: rnam thar brgyad po de nyid yin //
T02D2589:196a-43: theg pa chen po'i byang chub sems //
T02D2589:196a-44: mdo sde'i 'khor lo bskor bas na //
T02D2589:196b-0: rdo rje @196b thig gis yongs btab cing //
T02D2589:196b-1: thams cad du yang yongs su rdzogs //

T02D2589:196b-3: mi tshugs pa dang mi ldog pa dang //
T02D2589:196b-4: bde ba chen por rab grub phyir //
T02D2589:196b-5: de dag dag par yang dag 'gyur //

T02D2589:196b-7: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te /

T02D2589:196b-9: de nas yon blangs la gang du me tog babs par gyur pa de'i rigs dang //
T02D2589:196b-11: de'i phyag rgya dang sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2589:196b-12: snying po 'di dang rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur ro //
T02D2589:196b-14: de nas de dang rjes su mthun pa'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs kyis dbang bskur la /
T02D2589:196b-15: gang gi mtshan ma'i dbang bskur ba lag tu byin te /
T02D2589:196b-16: mtshan ma dang rjes su mthun par sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02D2589:196b-17: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i dbang //
T02D2589:196b-18: de ring khyod la bskur bar bya //
T02D2589:196b-19: sangs rgyas kun du rab grub phyir //
T02D2589:196b-20: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long //
T02D2589:196b-21: rang gi mtshan mas bdag po'i dbang //
T02D2589:196b-22: snying po 'dis sbyin par bya ste /
T02D2589:196b-23: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam /
T02D2589:196b-24: aa bhi shinyts'a mi ti shtha badzra sa ma ya stvam /
T02D2589:196b-25: de nas snying po 'dis dril bu sbyin no //
T02D2589:196b-26: aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dha rmm'a n'am /
T02D2589:196b-28: de nas snying po 'dis rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur ro //
T02D2589:196b-29: aom badzra sa tva stvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi /
T02D2589:196b-30: badzra n'a ma aa bhe she ka ta /
T02D2589:196b-31: kye rdo rje zhes gang gi ming gang brjod ba de la der skye zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2589:196b-32: de nas phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du bzhag la /
T02D2589:196b-33: spos la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la /
T02D2589:196b-34: sngags bskul ba'i tshigs brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i sngags byin la /
T02D2589:196b-35: phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes rig pa'i dbang bskur bas /
T02D2589:196b-36: bslab par bya ba ni rig pa'i dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D2589:196b-37: slob mas kyang rdo rje thal mo bskor ba byas la phyag bya ste /
T02D2589:196b-38: phreng ba bcing ba la sogs pa de dag thams cad gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2589:196b-39: rig pa'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D2589:196b-40: de nas slob dpon du 'os pa'i slob mas yon
T02D2589:196b-41: bzang po phul la gsol ba gdab par bya ste
T02D2589:197a-0: / aom sarba buddha par ratna mam dza ya @197a * //

T02D2589:197a-3: shr'i badzra sa tva sa ma ya stvam aa ham
T02D2589:197a-4: / zhes bya ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das rnam par

T02D2589:197a-6: / la / slob dpon rje btsun 'jam dpal nyid
T02D2589:197a-7: rnam par snang mdzad chen po nyid du gyur pas
T02D2589:197a-8: / la / ; shar phyogs kyi sgo'i mthar sna tshogs padma bris la /
T02D2589:197a-9: slob dpon rdo rje 'dzin chen po'i skur zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gnas par bsams la /
T02D2589:197a-10: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs te dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2589:197a-11: yang na dkyil 'khor las khru gsum tsam yongs su
T02D2589:197a-12: dor bar dbang bskur ba'i sgo la mngon par byas
T02D2589:197a-13: par nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyi tshad tsam
T02D2589:197a-14: la zur bzhi pa sgo nub phyogs su bltas pa'i
T02D2589:197a-15: dkyil 'khor tshon sna lngas bris la /
T02D2589:197a-16: de'i dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri /
T02D2589:197a-17: de'i steng du seng ge'i gdan la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ras kyi bkab pa dang ;
T02D2589:197a-18: seng ge'i gdan gyi steng du bla re bre zhing
T02D2589:197a-19: g-yas logs su dar dang me tog gi phreng bas

T02D2589:197a-21: dmar ba la gtsug tor gdugs dkar po yongs su bzlas pa /

T02D2589:197a-24: legs par bzhag la mchod yon phul te /

T02D2589:197a-29: phyi rol du gar dang glu la sogs pa dang /
T02D2589:197a-30: sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod cing /
T02D2589:197a-31: bkra shis kyi glu len cing dril bu dgrol bzhin
T02D2589:197a-32: du rdo rje 'bebs pa la sogs pa'i bum pa'i
T02D2589:197a-33: chu rnams kyis de'i sngags gdon pa sngon du 'gro
T02D2589:197a-34: ba nyid dang / rdo rje slob dpon chen po nyid du dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D2589:197a-35: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2589:197a-36: ji srid rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i bar du dbang bskur ro //

T02D2589:197a-39: ho: su ra ta stvam zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas
T02D2589:197a-40: la rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i slob dpon du
T02D2589:197b-0: 'gyur ro // shes rab @197b yan lag 'dus pa'i rdo rje las byung ba'i //
T02D2589:197b-1: byang chub sems kyis 'jam dbyangs phyad chub de dbang bskur //
T02D2589:197b-2: rgyal mchog sras bcas rnams kyis legs gsungs bkra shis gang //

T02D2589:197b-4: dpal ldan rdo rje sems tshogs dkyil 'khor la 'jug cing //
T02D2589:197b-5: srid pa'i snying por rnams rol sgeg mo la sogs pas //
T02D2589:197b-6: bde byed rab mchog legs par glur blangs bkra shis gang //
T02D2589:197b-7: des ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis
