T02D2589:197b-9: ma lus pas // sems can bde gshegs rtogs mdzad bcom ldan dbang bskur la //
T02D2589:197b-10: dpag med lha yi mchog gis legs gsungs bkra shis gang //
T02D2589:197b-11: des ni khyod kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis
T02D2589:197b-12: shog / dpal ldan khams gsum rnam rgyal dkyil 'khor
T02D2589:197b-13: rab mchog la // 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal por rgyal mchog dbang bskur ba //
T02D2589:197b-14: lha yi mchog gis btud de rab bshad bkra shis gang //
T02D2589:197b-15: des ni khyod kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis
T02D2589:197b-16: shog /'gro ba sna tshogs 'dul phyir phyag na padmo
T02D2589:197b-17: yis // rdzogs sangs rin chen cod pan bdud rtsi'i chus dbang bskur //
T02D2589:197b-18: padma'i 'dod chags rnams legs pa yi bkra shis gang //
T02D2589:197b-19: des ni khyod kyi dbang bskur mchog la bkra shis
T02D2589:197b-20: shog / nam mkha'i snying po nor bu rin chen
T02D2589:197b-22: don rnams kun grub bde sbyin dbang bskur chen po la //
T02D2589:197b-23: dge ba phun tshogs mdzad pas legs gsungs bkra shis gang ;
T02D2589:197b-24: ; des ni khyed kyi dbang bskur mchog las bkra
T02D2589:197b-25: shis shog /'khor los sgyur drug dge ba'i bkra shis
T02D2589:197b-26: glu blangs las // bsod nams rin chen dri med mi mnyam gang thob pa //
T02D2589:197b-27: des ni kun son 'byor ba'i dbang bskur chen po la //
T02D2589:197b-28: 'jam dpal grags bcas 'jig rten rnam par dag gyur
T02D2589:197b-29: cig / de nas gos la sogs pas brgyan te
T02D2589:197b-30: / sangs rgyas kyi cod pan dang dar dbyangs la sogs pa'i dbang bskur bar dbang bskur la /
T02D2589:197b-31: me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2589:197b-32: rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba byin la de kho na nyid bstan par bya ste /
T02D2589:198a-1: mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D2589:198a-2: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02D2589:198a-3: kun du bzang po thams cad bdag //
T02D2589:198a-4: rdo rje'i snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag //
T02D2589:198a-5: ces bya ba ni 'jam dpal la bya bar bshad de /
T02D2589:198a-6: ming thams cad kyi bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2589:198a-7: de nas hi zhes brjod la de bzhin du bdag po nyid du dbang bskur ro //
T02D2589:198a-8: aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'a dya
T02D2589:198a-9: nu tpa nna tv'a ta ces brjod la dril bu
T02D2589:198a-10: byin te chos bstan par bya'o //
T02D2589:198a-11: dngos rnams rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir //
T02D2589:198a-12: ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med byas //
T02D2589:198a-13: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' yis //
T02D2589:198a-14: dam pa'i dngos po byed par 'gyur //
T02D2589:198a-15: de nas yi ge dh'i: brjod la //
T02D2589:198a-16: ming gi dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya ste /
T02D2589:198a-17: phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du bzhag la /
T02D2589:198a-19: srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung //
T02D2589:198a-20: sdug bsngal mang po zhi bya'i phyir //
T02D2589:198a-21: shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs //
T02D2589:198a-22: de bas dam tshig bsrung bar gyis //
T02D2589:198a-23: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni //
T02D2589:198a-24: ci 'dod pa ni bsten bzhin du //
T02D2589:198a-25: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2589:198a-26: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
T02D2589:198a-27: ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni //
T02D2589:198a-28: mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe //
T02D2589:198a-29: de srid mtshungs med sems can don //
T02D2589:198a-30: mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus //
T02D2589:198a-31: gsang ba'i mchog gi dam tshig thabs //
T02D2589:198a-32: bsod nams byin rlob sgrub byed pa //
T02D2589:198a-33: dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub //
T02D2589:198a-34: sems can don ni ston par byed //
T02D2589:198a-36: yid kyi gzugs ni brtan pa'i phyir //
T02D2589:198a-37: phyag rgya dam tshig yin par grags //
T02D2589:198a-38: gang gis lus kun brtan pas na //
T02D2589:198a-39: phyag rgya yin par rab tu bsgrags //
T02D2589:198a-41: de nas shr'i brjod par bya'o //
T02D2589:198a-42: de nas spos la sogs pas yang dag par mchod
T02D2589:198a-43: nas lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas pa'i sngags
T02D2589:198a-44: dang phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab par bya'o ;
T02D2589:198a-45: / slob dpon du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D2589:198a-46: de nas rdo rje slob dpon ni //
T02D2589:198a-47: rjes su gnad pa'i sbyin brtson pas //
T02D2589:198a-48: slob ma rdzogs par shes nas ni //
T02D2589:198a-50: shin tu gsang ba'i gzhung 'di nyid //
T02D2589:198a-51: rdo rje slob mas gsol byas te //
T02D2589:198b-0: de nyid la ni yon gyi @198b mchog / dam pa phul nas gsol ba gdab //
T02D2589:198b-1: 'di zhes bya ba'i rdo rje can //
T02D2589:198b-2: byang chub sems ni rnam bsgoms pa //
T02D2589:198b-3: slob dpon zhabs kyi padmo la //
T02D2589:198b-4: dbang bskur phyir ni gsol ba 'tshal //
T02D2589:198b-5: slob dpon rab tu rmad byung ba //
T02D2589:198b-6: rgyal ba rnams kyi dbang bskur nyid //
T02D2589:198b-7: sangs rgyas byang chub thob byed pa //
T02D2589:198b-8: skal ba chen pos bdag la stsol //
T02D2589:198b-9: gang gis sems can thams cad kyi //
T02D2589:198b-10: rnyog med don ni bdag bgyid cing //
T02D2589:198b-11: brtul zhugs bzang khyod drin gyis ni //
T02D2589:198b-12: sangs rgyas kun don mdzad pa'ang bgyid //
T02D2589:198b-13: slob dpon phan par 'dod pa yis //
T02D2589:198b-14: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che //
T02D2589:198b-15: khams gsum kun gyis byas pa //
T02D2589:198b-16: sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya //
T02D2589:198b-17: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che //
T02D2589:198b-18: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas shing //
T02D2589:198b-19: khams gsum ye shes las byung ba //
T02D2589:198b-20: sangs rgyas kun gyi nga yis sbyin //
T02D2589:198b-21: sangs rgyas kun gyis nam mkha'i khams ;
T02D2589:198b-22: / yongs su gang bar rnam par bsgom //
T02D2589:198b-23: phyi rol dri sogs dam tshig gi / sprin ltar brtul zhugs can gyis bsgom //
T02D2589:198b-24: yang na rdo rje dbyings kyi ni //
T02D2589:198b-25: ting nge 'dzin gyis rdo rje bsgom //
T02D2589:198b-26: dam tshig mchog gi bum pa yang //
T02D2589:198b-27: 'dzin par mkhas pas bsgom par bya //
T02D2589:198b-28: rdo rje slob dpon bka' drin gyis //
T02D2589:198b-29: de tshe de la dbang bskur ba //
T02D2589:198b-30: rdzogs sangs rdo rje lha mo rnams //
T02D2589:198b-31: rang nyid gsol bar mdzad par 'gyur //
T02D2589:198b-32: de nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa rdo rje
T02D2589:198b-33: khu tshur gyis bzung nas dbang bskur bar bya ste
T02D2589:198b-34: / aom dza: h'um bam ho: ma h'a su kha badzra satva aa bhi she ka stvam /
T02D2589:198b-36: sarba badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam //
T02D2589:198b-37: dri bho me bha pa siddhya na ma: te bha
T02D2589:198b-38: ga w'ana ma h'a badzra ha ra su ra ta
T02D2589:198b-39: stvam / ma h'a badzra sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:198b-40: aom bhur bhu ba sva: zhes bya ba 'dis lag
T02D2589:198b-41: pa gnyis su rdo rje byin la phyi nang gsang
T02D2589:198b-42: ba'i mchod pa rnams kyi yang dag par mchod de
T02D2589:198b-44: me tog ma'i gzugs can gyis me tog gis gtor la /
T02D2589:198b-45: deng tshun chad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2589:198b-46: thams cad ces pas mchod na khyod mchod pa'i yan
T02D2589:198b-47: lag brtsams kyis / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang
T02D2589:198b-48: dpe byad rnams kyis brgyan ba byed pa'i skur mthong
T02D2589:199a-0: lag brtsams kyis / bar @199a * // 'gyur ro zhes brjod do //
T02D2589:199a-1: de nas bdug pa ma'i gzugs kyis bdug pas bdugs la 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02D2589:199a-2: gang gis sems can thams cad tshim par gyur pa'i
T02D2589:199a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khyed la 'jug par
T02D2589:199a-5: de nas mar me ma'i gzugs su mar me nye
T02D2589:199a-6: bar bstan la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste
T02D2589:199a-7: / deng nas brtsams te rdo rje chos dang 'dra
T02D2589:199a-8: bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan yang
T02D2589:199a-10: ma rig pas khebs pa'i sems can rnams la ye
T02D2589:199a-11: shes kyi snang bas snang bar byed par 'gyur ro
T02D2589:199a-12: ; / de nas byug pa ma'i gzugs can gyis
T02D2589:199a-13: byug pas byugs la 'di skad ces brjod par bya
T02D2589:199a-14: ; ste / deng tshun chad khyod sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
T02D2589:199a-15: 'jig rten thams cad du yang tshul khrims dang /
T02D2589:199a-16: ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab la sogs pa'i dri'i rgyun ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2589:199a-17: de nas lha mo sgeg mo'i gzugs can gyis me
T02D2589:199a-18: tog cig sgeg pa dang bcas pas 'phangs la 'di
T02D2589:199a-20: deng nas brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub
T02D2589:199a-21: sems dpa' dang bcas pa thams cad 'dod pas mchod
T02D2589:199a-22: cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla
T02D2589:199a-23: na med pa'i dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rangs
T02D2589:199a-24: pa'i rol pas sngags kyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'gro
T02D2589:199a-25: bas rol bar gyis shig / de nas lha mo
T02D2589:199a-26: phreng ba ma'i gzugs can gyis phreng ba bcings la
T02D2589:199a-27: 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2589:199a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas
T02D2589:199a-29: pa 'di dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2589:199a-30: cad kyi phreng bas rgyun du mchod pa la skyo
T02D2589:199a-31: ba med par gyis shig 'di lta ste /
T02D2589:199a-32: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba 'di ni /
T02D2589:199a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng brgyan rnams kyi mchog ni 'di yin no //
T02D2589:199a-34: de nas lha mo glu ma'i gzugs can dang /
T02D2589:199a-35: aom badzra satva su sam gra ha ta ces bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D2589:199a-36: glu blangs la 'di skad brjod par bya ste /
T02D2589:199a-37: deng nas brtsams te chos thams cad sgrogs shid //
T02D2589:199a-38: ring por mi thogs par sems can thams cad la
T02D2589:199b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par @199b
T02D2589:199b-1: sdud pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2589:199b-2: de nas lha mo gar mkhan ma'i gzugs kyi gar
T02D2589:199b-3: gyi lag pas sad par byas la 'di skad ces
T02D2589:199b-4: brjod de / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2589:199b-5: gar la rab tu 'jug cing de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2589:199b-6: thams cad gar gyi rjes su dgyes par gyis shig
T02D2589:199b-7: brjod de / / de nas rin po che'am gser
T02D2589:199b-8: gyi thur ma thogs la mdun du 'dug ste 'di
T02D2589:199b-9: skad ces brjod par bya ste /
T02D2589:199b-10: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02D2589:199b-11: 'jig rten rab rib bsam ba ltar //
T02D2589:199b-12: bu khyod kyis ni mi shes pa'i //
T02D2589:199b-13: rab rib rgyal ba rnams kyis bsal //
T02D2589:199b-14: de nas mig tu pra bkod la me long blangs nas //
T02D2589:199b-15: chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya ste /
T02D2589:199b-16: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02D2589:199b-17: dag cing gsal la dri ma med //
T02D2589:199b-18: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02D2589:199b-19: rgyu dang las las kun du byung //
T02D2589:199b-20: ngo bo nyid med gnas med par //
T02D2589:199b-21: de ltar chos rnams shes nas su //
T02D2589:199b-22: sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
T02D2589:199b-23: 'on kyang sangs rgyas sras su skye //
T02D2589:199b-24: de nas ho: zhes bya bas gzhu byin la //
T02D2589:199b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyis shig ces brjod do //
T02D2589:199b-26: phyogs bzhir mda' bzhi 'phan du gzhug cing /
T02D2589:199b-27: steng dang 'og tu yang re re 'phen du gzhug go //
T02D2589:199b-28: de nas sha dha ban dzdza ka byin la 'dis
T02D2589:199b-29: dngos grub thams cad dang nye bar spyod pa thams
T02D2589:199b-30: cad sprul la nye bar longs spyod cing /
T02D2589:199b-31: gzhan dag la yang byin cig / de nas rgyal
T02D2589:199b-32: mtshan byin la 'dis ni dgra thams cad dang 'thab
T02D2589:199b-33: pa las nye bar rgyal ba 'thob par 'gyur ro
T02D2589:199b-34: zhes brjod do // de nas rdo rje ste mas ma'i phyag rgya byin la /
T02D2589:199b-35: 'dis ma rungs pa thams cad sgrubs shig ces brjod do //
T02D2589:199b-36: gzhan yang aa badzra satva zhes bya bas me long blangs la 'di skad ces brjod do //
T02D2589:199b-37: rdo rje sems ba'i rang bzhin nyid //
T02D2589:199b-38: dag cing gsal la dri ma med //
T02D2589:199b-39: bu khyod kyi ni snying la gnas //
T02D2589:199b-40: sangs rgyas kun bdag rang nyid yin //
T02D2589:199b-43: gang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po
T02D2589:199b-44: byang chub kye sems rdo rje ni 'di nyid yin
T02D2589:199b-45: par rtogs shing / de nas chos kyi 'khor lo rkang pa gnyis kyi dbus su bzhag cing /
T02D2589:200a-1: lag pa g-yas par byin te /
T02D2589:200a-2: chos kyi 'khor lo dang smra ba gnyis kyi chos
T02D2589:200a-3: kyi yi ge dang lhan cig byin la 'di skad
T02D2589:200a-4: ces brjod do / ded nas brtsams te sems bskyed
T02D2589:200a-5: pa tsam gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cig /
T02D2589:200a-6: de ring phan chad 'jig rten la //
T02D2589:200a-7: skyob pa rnams kyi 'khor lo bskor //
T02D2589:200a-8: chos kyi dung ni bla med pas //
T02D2589:200a-9: kun du ma lus gang bar gyis //
T02D2589:200a-10: som nyi yid gnyis mi bya zhing //
T02D2589:200a-11: dogs pa med pa'i tshul gyis su //
T02D2589:200a-12: gsang sngags spyod pa tshul gyi mchog /'jig rten 'di la rab tu sgrogs //
T02D2589:200a-13: de ltar byas na sangs rgyas la //
T02D2589:200a-14: phan 'dogs drin du gzo zhes bya //
T02D2589:200a-15: rdo rje 'dzin pa de kun kyang //
T02D2589:200a-16: kun du khyod la srung bar byed //
T02D2589:200a-17: rang gi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod la /
T02D2589:200a-18: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan nas //
T02D2589:200a-19: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi //
T02D2589:200a-20: khams gsum na ni sdig med de //
T02D2589:200a-21: de bas 'dod la chags bral ba khyod kyis kyad
T02D2589:200a-22: [*kyang] ni ma byed cig / gsang ba bsgrags nas
T02D2589:200a-23: thal mo dang bcas pas dang por 'di skad brjod
T02D2589:200a-24: do // rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02D2589:200a-25: rdo rje mgon po rab sgrub mdzad //
T02D2589:200a-26: rdo rje dbang bskur rdo rje 'od //
T02D2589:200a-27: rdo rje dpal khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2589:200a-28: rdo rje bzhad pa chos chen po //
T02D2589:200a-29: dpal kun gyi ni rgyal po mchog / spros med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2589:200a-30: rdo rje las dang rdung ba che //
T02D2589:200a-31: gnod sbyin gtum po gdon chen po //
T02D2589:200a-32: rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya chen //
T02D2589:200a-33: sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2589:200a-34: byang chub sems dpa' 'byang chub che //
T02D2589:200a-35: sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2589:200a-36: rdo rje ye shes ye shes che //
T02D2589:200a-37: theg chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2589:200a-38: don kun gyi ni de nyid don //
T02D2589:200a-39: sems can don chen kun rig pa //
T02D2589:200a-40: kun mkhyen kun byas thams cad de //
T02D2589:200a-41: kun gzigs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2589:200a-42: rdo rje bdag rab rdo rje mchog / rdo rje brtson rab rdo rje 'chang //
T02D2589:200a-43: dam tshig chen po'i de nyid don //
T02D2589:200a-45: rdo rje lcags kyu 'dod pa che //
T02D2589:200a-49: rdo rje rgyal mchog rdo rje dgu //
T02D2589:200b-0: rig mchog @200b mchog dang mi yi mchog / rdo rje dam pa mchog chen po //
T02D2589:200b-1: rig mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2589:200b-2: rdo rje dbyings dang gsal ba che //
T02D2589:200b-3: rdo rje gsang ba rang gsang 'chad //
T02D2589:200b-4: rdo rje phreng ba bsam gtan che //
T02D2589:200b-5: rdo rje dgos la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2589:200b-6: sangs rgyas mchog gsang rdo rje mchog / sangs rgyas byang chub mkhas pa che //
T02D2589:200b-7: sangs rgyas ye shes sangs rgyas che //
T02D2589:200b-8: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02D2589:200b-9: sangs rgyas mchod pa mchod pa che //
T02D2589:200b-10: sems dpa' mchod pa rab mchog pa //
T02D2589:200b-11: thabs chen dang ni dngos grub che //
T02D2589:200b-12: rdo rje grub khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2589:200b-13: ta th'a ga ta'i glu chen po //
T02D2589:200b-14: ta th'a ga ta'i gsung dbyangs te //
T02D2589:200b-15: ta th'a ga ta sems chen po //
T02D2589:200b-16: rdo rje rdo rje phyag 'tshal khyod //
T02D2589:200b-17: sangs rgyas gtso bo rgyal bka' nyan //
T02D2589:200b-18: sangs rgyas bshes gnyen rgyal mchog skyed //
T02D2589:200b-19: rnam par snang mdzad che dang khyab //
T02D2589:200b-20: zhi khro ston la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2589:200b-21: ta th'a ga ta de nyid che //
T02D2589:200b-22: yang dag mtha' dang che ba'i tshul //
T02D2589:200b-23: pha rol phyin pa'i kun mkhyen pa //
T02D2589:200b-24: don dam khyod la phyag 'tshal la //
T02D2589:200b-25: kun du bzang dang spyod pa mchog //
T02D2589:200b-27: kun gyi mchog dang mnyam nyid mkhyen //

T02D2589:204a-8: sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs //

T02D2589:204a-10: byang chub sems ni gtang mi bya //
T02D2589:204a-11: phyag na rdo rje gang yin pa'o //
T02D2589:204a-12: gang 'di skyes pa tsam gyis su //
T02D2589:204a-13: sangs rgyas nyid du dogs pa med //
T02D2589:204a-14: dam pa'i chos ni mi smad cing //
T02D2589:204a-15: nam yang gtang bar mi bya'o //
T02D2589:204a-16: mi shes pa'am rmongs pa yis //
T02D2589:204a-17: tshul chen bstan par mi bya'o //
T02D2589:204a-18: bdag nyid yongs su spangs nas su //
T02D2589:204a-19: dka' thub can gyis ma gdugs shig / ci bde bar ni bde bar gzung //
T02D2589:204a-20: 'di ni ma byon rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D2589:204a-21: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya rnams //
T02D2589:204a-22: nam yang yongs su mi gtong zhing //
T02D2589:204a-23: slob dpon smad par mi bya ste //
T02D2589:204a-25: sangs rgyas kun mtshungs bla ma yi //
T02D2589:204a-26: slob dpon la ni gang smod pa //
T02D2589:204a-27: de ni sangs rgyas smad pas na //
T02D2589:204a-28: rtag tu sdug bsngal thob 'gyur te //
T02D2589:204a-29: rims dang dug dang dbyig dug nang //
T02D2589:204a-30: mkha' 'gro rnams kyis gtso bo dang //
T02D2589:204a-31: gdon dang log 'dren gtum po yis //
T02D2589:204a-32: bsad nas sems dmyal ltung bar 'gyur //
T02D2589:204a-33: de bas nan tan thams cad kyis //
T02D2589:204a-34: rdo rje slob dpon blo gros che //
T02D2589:204a-35: dge ba rab tu mi sbyoms pa //
T02D2589:204a-36: nam yang smad par mi bya'o //
T02D2589:204a-37: bla ma la ni gus bcas yon //
T02D2589:204a-38: rjes mthun khyod kyis sbyin par bya //
T02D2589:204a-39: des ni rims sogs gnod pa rnams //
T02D2589:204a-40: phyir zhing dbyung bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2589:204a-41: rang gi dam tshig slob dpon ni //
T02D2589:204a-42: sbyin min bu dang chung ma dang //
T02D2589:204a-43: rang srog gis rtag bstan bya na //
T02D2589:204a-44: longs spyod g-yo bas smos ci dgos //
T02D2589:204a-45: gang phyir bskal ba bye ba ni //
T02D2589:204a-46: grangs med par ni rnyed dka' ba'o //
T02D2589:204a-47: sangs rgyas nyid kyang brtson ldan la //
T02D2589:204a-48: tshe 'de nyid la ster bar byed //
T02D2589:204a-49: rtag tu khyod kyis dam tshig srungs //
T02D2589:204a-50: rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa mchod //
T02D2589:204a-51: rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul//
T02D2589:204b-1: de byin sangs rgyas thams cad la //
T02D2589:204b-2: rtag tu byin pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02D2589:204b-3: de byin pas bsod nams mchog dag gis //
T02D2589:204b-4: dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur //
T02D2589:204b-5: ded khyod skye ba 'bras bcas te //
T02D2589:204b-6: gang 'dir legs par gnas pas na //
T02D2589:204b-7: dam tshig lha rnams kun dang mnyam //
T02D2589:204b-8: rang byung du yang der skyes so //
T02D2589:204b-9: sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa //
T02D2589:204b-10: kun gyis deng khyod dbang bskur bas //
T02D2589:204b-11: khams gsum gyi ni rgyal po che //
T02D2589:204b-12: rgyal po'i bdag por bstan pa yin //
T02D2589:204b-13: deng ni bdud las rnam rgyal te //
T02D2589:204b-14: grong khyer mchog tu rab tu zhugs //
T02D2589:204b-15: khyed rnams kyi ni sangs rgyas nyid //
T02D2589:204b-16: deng nyid thob par the tshom med //
T02D2589:204b-17: aa: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu
T02D2589:204b-18: gsang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba phul du byung ba ste
T02D2589:204b-19: // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang //
T02D2589:204b-20: dpal rdo rje slob dpon gyis slob ma mchog rnams la //
T02D2589:204b-21: byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang bcas pas phyir
T02D2589:204b-22: mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas nyid du gyur cig /
T02D2589:204b-23: mchog tu rtag pa yin par khod du chud par
T02D2589:204b-24: bya'o // de la gtan tshig ci yod ce na /
T02D2589:204b-25: gang khyod kyis thams cad kyi bdag nyid du de
T02D2589:204b-26: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i
T02D2589:204b-27: mchog tu sems bskyed pa tsam gyi mthu nyid kyis
T02D2589:204b-28: / phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba yin la /
T02D2589:204b-29: phyir mi ldog pa nyid kyis na /
T02D2589:204b-30: des pa'i phung po la gnas te /
T02D2589:204b-31: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
T02D2589:204b-32: chub tu nges pa'i phyir ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D2589:204b-33: yin la / dus gsum ni mnyam pa nyid yin pas na /
T02D2589:204b-34: de ltar byung ba nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2589:204b-35: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D2589:204b-36: su mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par khong du
T02D2589:204b-37: chud par bya'o zhes bya ba ni mchog tu gsang
T02D2589:204b-39: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sbyor zhing //
T02D2589:204b-40: thams cad sbyor ba rjes sbyar ldan //
T02D2589:204b-41: sangs rgyas nyid du shes bya ste //
T02D2589:204b-42: sangs rgyas dam pa rtag pa'o //
T02D2589:204b-44: de yang ci'i phyir zhe na //
T02D2589:204b-45: khyod kyi bdag nyid thams cad du //
T02D2589:204b-46: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
T02D2589:205a-1: tshig yongs su gzung ba ni don yod pas //
T02D2589:205a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
T02D2589:205a-3: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
T02D2589:205a-4: rgyas pa nyid du mngon par rtogs par bya'o //
T02D2589:205a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal dang ldan
T02D2589:205a-6: pa'i dam tshig rjes su bsgrubs pas mchog tu grub
T02D2589:205a-7: pa ni // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du shes par bya'o //
T02D2589:205a-8: de bas na dus thams cad dang //
T02D2589:205a-9: gnas skabs thams cad du yang ci nus pas sdug bsngal ba dang //
T02D2589:205a-10: yid mi bde ba rnams kyi len pas khyed rnams
T02D2589:205a-11: kyis rtag pa nyid du rjes su bsrung bar bya
T02D2589:205a-13: ji snyed pa'i longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa thams cad dang /
T02D2589:205a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang
T02D2589:205a-15: ba bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i dam
T02D2589:205a-16: tshig sbyor bas legs par mchod la bde bar gzung
T02D2589:205a-17: bar bya zhing yang dag par gso bar bya'o //
T02D2589:205a-18: bdag nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du gzhan rnams la yang rig par sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2589:205a-19: gang gis na khyod pha rol mu stegs kyi gzhung
T02D2589:205a-20: gis log pa'i lta ba can du mi 'gyur zhing
T02D2589:205a-22: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis thams cad du ltung ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D2589:205a-23: lus 'di shin tu yang mi smra ba nyid dang /
T02D2589:205a-24: sems shin tu yang 'gog par mi 'gyur bar gang
T02D2589:205a-25: gis sku gsungs thugs rdo rje thams cad de bzhin
T02D2589:205a-26: gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs
T02D2589:205a-27: rdo rje dpal gyi rang gi dam tshig gis bla
T02D2589:205a-28: na med pa'i dngos grub mchog tu rtag par 'gyur
T02D2589:205a-29: bar yang gyis shig / yang smras pa /
T02D2589:205a-30: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad dang //
T02D2589:205a-31: cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis //
T02D2589:205a-32: sdig pa med kyis mi 'jigs shig / dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o //
T02D2589:205a-33: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal te //
T02D2589:205a-34: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02D2589:205a-35: rdo rje 'dzin pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi
T02D2589:205a-36: dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la mchog tu gsang
T02D2589:205a-37: ba'i 'di bka' stsal ba yin no //
T02D2589:205a-38: yid ni rab tu dang ba'i rdo rje yis //
T02D2589:205b-0: rang gi dam tshig mi zad bde la @205b brten //
T02D2589:205b-1: bde ba'i bde ba chung la sangs rgyas ni /
T02D2589:205b-2: kun dang 'dra mnyam rtag par khyod gyur te //
T02D2589:205b-3: slob mas gus par bla ma yis //
T02D2589:205b-4: rkang pa gnyis la phyag bya ste //
T02D2589:205b-5: de nas ji skad gsungs pa kun //
T02D2589:205b-6: rjes su bsgrub par khas blang ngo //
T02D2589:205b-7: de ltar dam bca' byas nas ni //
T02D2589:205b-8: cho ga 'di yis rang nyid kyis //
T02D2589:205b-9: rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa ni //
T02D2589:205b-10: blangs nas kyang ni de la sbyin //
T02D2589:205b-11: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de //
T02D2589:205b-12: rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na 'dug / khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02D2589:205b-13: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
T02D2589:205b-14: de nas aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma ya tishtha ae sha stvam /
T02D2589:205b-15: dha ra ya mi badzra sa tva hi hi hi hi h'um zhes brjod de //
T02D2589:205b-17: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D2589:205b-18: shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gro ba //
T02D2589:205b-19: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02D2589:205b-20: byang chub rdo rje rgyal bas gsungs //
T02D2589:205b-21: zhes brjod la dril bu sbyin no //
T02D2589:205b-22: de ltar dbang bskur byas nas ni //
T02D2589:205b-23: de nas sar pa'i gos rnams bskon //
T02D2589:205b-24: me tog dri la sogs pas mchod / mchod phyir gdu bu bcas par bya //
T02D2589:205b-25: de nas bla ma bdag nyid kyi //
T02D2589:205b-26: de yi spyi bor gdugs kyang gzung //
T02D2589:205b-27: thal mo sbyor ba byas nas ni //
T02D2589:205b-28: dkyil 'khor legs par bskor du gzhug / gdugs dang bcas pa sgo phyogs su //
T02D2589:205b-29: spyi bor 'dud de phyag 'tshal gzhug / slob ma 'di ni phul ba lags //
T02D2589:205b-31: mkhan pos de skad smras nas su //
T02D2589:205b-32: gdugs gzhan nas ni slob ma de //
T02D2589:205b-33: lag pas legs par blangs nas su //
T02D2589:205b-34: de nas 'di skad bsgo bar bya //
T02D2589:205b-37: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D2589:205b-38: lha rnams kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur //
T02D2589:205b-39: sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir //
T02D2589:205b-40: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin //
T02D2589:205b-41: nan tan bskyed de bri bar bgyi //
T02D2589:205b-42: sgrub pa po yang rgyud la sbyor //
T02D2589:205b-43: khyod kyis chos la ser sna dang //
T02D2589:205b-44: sems can rnams la mi phan pa //
T02D2589:205b-45: nyam nga chen por gyur kyang ni //
T02D2589:205b-46: bu khyod kyis ni mi bya'o /
T02D2589:205b-47: de nas slob ma re re yis //
T02D2589:206a-2: mthe bo nas ni bzung nas su //
T02D2589:206a-3: zhi ba yi ni sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2589:206a-4: rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02D2589:206a-5: slob ma gus dang ldan pa dang //
T02D2589:206a-6: rang gi rigs dang mtshams pa yis //
T02D2589:206a-7: sdig pa thams cad sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2589:206a-8: de ltar byas nas bdag bsrung ste //
T02D2589:206a-9: sngags pas slob ma las yon blang //
T02D2589:206a-10: slob ma yis kyang de nyid ni //
T02D2589:206a-11: ji ltar dga' bar 'gyur bar bya //
T02D2589:206a-12: de nas slob mas 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad do zhes ming du byas la /
T02D2589:206a-13: bskor ba lan gsum bya ste /
T02D2589:206a-14: phyag byas nas bdag nyid dbul bar bya zhing //
T02D2589:206a-15: mchod pa chen pos mchod par bya'o //
T02D2589:206a-16: shin tu dga' ba gad dang gang //
T02D2589:206a-17: khyad par can ni de dang de //
T02D2589:206a-18: de nyid mi zad 'dod pa yis //
T02D2589:206a-19: de dang de ni bla ma sbyin //
T02D2589:206a-20: de ni bsod nams tshogs su 'gyur //
T02D2589:206a-21: tshogs las dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur //
T02D2589:206a-22: yang na de ni dgar 'gyur ba //
T02D2589:206a-23: de ltar yang dag spyad par bya //
T02D2589:206a-24: de ltar yang dag dbang bskur ba //
T02D2589:206a-25: slob dpon zhes ni bshad pa yin //
T02D2589:206a-26: de yis bstan pa'i gsang sngags rnams //
T02D2589:206a-27: grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med //
T02D2589:206a-28: de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis mchod de //
T02D2589:206a-29: aom badzra satva su sam gra ham /
T02D2589:206a-30: aom badzra ratna ma nutta ram /
T02D2589:206a-31: aom badzra dharmma g'a ya ne /
T02D2589:206a-32: aom badzra karma ka ro ddha ba /
T02D2589:206a-33: zhes bya ba rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i
T02D2589:206a-34: mchod pa brgyad kyis phyi dang nang gi mchod pa
T02D2589:206a-35: byas la / thams cad ci nus pa dang /
T02D2589:206a-37: rjes su mthun par mchod pa rnams dang /
T02D2589:206a-38: slob ma rnams mchod pa byed du gzhug go //
T02D2589:206a-39: de'i 'og tu bza' ba dang btung ba dang /
T02D2589:206a-40: glu dang rol mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams
T02D2589:206a-41: kyis bdag dang gzhan dga' bar mchod cing ci 'dod
T02D2589:206a-42: pa nye bar longs spyod pa rnams bya'o //
T02D2589:206a-43: de nas thams cad su la yang ma smra shig
T02D2589:206a-44: / ces mna'i snying po byin la ji ltar zhugs
T02D2589:206a-46: de nas me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la legs par bstod de /
T02D2589:206a-47: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba gang
T02D2589:206a-48: bcing bzod pa gsol la nyi ma 'char ka'i dus
T02D2589:206a-49: su rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2589:206b-1: aom kri to ba sarba satv'a rtha //
T02D2589:206b-2: siddha ma datt'a y'a nu ga / gatstsha tv'am buddh'a bi sha yam //
T02D2589:206b-3: pu na ra ga ma na ya tstsha badzra sa tva mu:/
T02D2589:206b-4: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor ba rnams ni /
T02D2589:206b-5: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes bya bas rang gi lus la nye bar bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D2589:206b-6: de nas snying gnas byung ba'i rdo rje rin chen
T02D2589:206b-7: gyi phyag rgya rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas na
T02D2589:206b-9: mdzub mo gnyis kyis phreng ba bcing ba dang /
T02D2589:206b-10: go cha bcing ba snying po 'dis bya ste /
T02D2589:206b-11: aom badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa /
T02D2589:206b-12: sarba mu dra me dri dha ku ru ba ra ka ba tse na bam /
T02D2589:206b-13: go cha'i mthar phreng ba bcing ba bkrol la thal
T02D2589:206b-14: mo sbyar te bdag nyid mnyam pa'i thal mos dgyes
T02D2589:206b-17: yi ge brgya pa brjod la rdo rje dga' ba legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
T02D2589:206b-18: legs so rdo rje sems dpa' khyod //
T02D2589:206b-19: rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so //
T02D2589:206b-20: rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste //
T02D2589:206b-21: rdo rje las ni khyod legs so //
T02D2589:206b-22: theg pa chen po bla na med //
T02D2589:206b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang //
T02D2589:206b-24: theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i //
T02D2589:206b-25: mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad //
T02D2589:206b-26: aom badzra k'i li k'i li ya //
T02D2589:206b-28: badzra dha ra a'adzny'a pa ya /
T02D2589:206b-29: h'um h'um h'um h'um phat ces bya bas phur bu bton la 'o mas bkru'o //
T02D2589:206b-30: aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharmm'a n'am a'adaya nutpna
T02D2589:206b-31: tv'a ta ces bya ba 'dis tsho rtse rnams bsdus
T02D2589:206b-32: la 'bad pas chu klung chen por dor bar bya'o
T02D2589:206b-33: // de nas gnas kyang ba lang gi lci bas nye bar byugs la /
T02D2589:206b-34: bza' ba dang ni bca' ba rnams //
T02D2589:206b-35: ci dga' bar ni sbyin par bya //
T02D2589:206b-36: khyi dang bya rog la sogs la //
T02D2589:206b-37: cung zad tsam yang mi sbyin no //
T02D2589:206b-38: yo byad rdzas rnams thams cad ni //
T02D2589:206b-39: slob dpon dag gis bsdus nas ni //
T02D2589:206b-40: bdag rang nyid kyis spyad par bya //
T02D2589:206b-41: slob ma rnams la bgor mi rung //
T02D2589:206b-42: dkyil 'khor gyi ni yo byad kun //
T02D2589:206b-43: slob dpon bdag nyid dbang bar bshad //
T02D2589:206b-44: gal te slob mas spyad na ni //
T02D2589:206b-45: dam tshig las ni nyams par 'gyur //
T02D2589:206b-46: gang zhig spyad par mi 'dod na //
T02D2589:206b-48: dkon mchog gsum gyi yo byad du //
T02D2589:206b-49: de dag cho ga bzhin du dbul //
T02D2589:206b-50: gdugs dang rnga yab dri la sogs //
T02D2589:207a-2: ba dan gdug spos dri la sogs //
T02D2589:207a-3: dam pa'i chos la dbul bar bya //
T02D2589:207a-4: gos dang yo byad snod la sogs //
T02D2589:207a-5: dge 'dun rnams la dbul bar bya //
T02D2589:207a-6: de dag las ni slob ma yis //
T02D2589:207a-7: cung zad tsam yang mi bskur ro //
T02D2589:207a-8: dge 'dun med na dge slong sbyin ;
T02D2589:207a-9: / yang na dge slong ma la sbyin //
T02D2589:207a-10: gal te bdag nyid mi 'dod na //
T02D2589:207a-11: bsnyen bkur dag la sbyin par bya //
T02D2589:207a-12: de nas de yi phyi de nyin //
T02D2589:207a-13: nyes byas lhag ma zhi ba'i phyir //
T02D2589:207a-14: mkhas pa yis ni zhi ba yi //
T02D2589:207a-15: sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
T02D2589:207a-16: slob mas dag zhi bya'i phyir //
T02D2589:207a-17: spyan la sogs pa'i gsang sngags dang //
T02D2589:207a-18: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2589:207a-19: byams pa chen po'ang bsgom par bya //
T02D2589:207a-20: nyes byas thams cad zhi bya'i phyir //
T02D2589:207a-21: de nas zhi ba chen po bya'o //
T02D2589:207a-22: dad med dman la 'jug la min //
T02D2589:207a-23: 'dod la chags dang khro bo'i dbang bskur dang //
T02D2589:207a-24: slob ma bu min blo gros dman rnams la //
T02D2589:207a-25: cho ga'i bsgrub pa 'di ni sbyin mi bya //
T02D2589:207a-26: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po'i ye shes snang bas de skad ces bka' stsal to //

T02D2589:207b-0: dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa @207b lha'i rgyan thams cad kyis bzhugs pa /
T02D2589:207b-1: rje btsun 'jam dpal dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2589:207b-2: gal te bag med pas de grub par ma gyur na /

T02D2589:207b-4: 'khor de bzhin du byas nas de bzhin du sgrub
T02D2589:207b-7: der yang ma grub na ston zla tha chungs kyi

T02D2589:207b-15: dngos grub 'bring ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /
T02D2589:207b-18: ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2589:207b-19: de dag kyang de la lhag par mos pas mtshan

T02D2589:207b-29: dngos grub mchog sgrub pa la zhugs pa rnams kyis
T02D2589:207b-30: gal te dngos grub mchog ma grub kyang 'bring ngam
T02D2589:207b-32: dngos grub 'bring sgrub pa la zhugs pa rnams kyis
T02D2589:207b-33: kyang de ma grub kyang tha ma grub par 'gyur
T02D2589:207b-34: gyi / tha ma la sgrub par zhugs pa rnams kyi mchog dang 'bring ni ma yin no //
T02D2589:207b-35: de bas dngos grub mchog gi phyir 'bad par bya ste /
T02D2589:207b-36: dngos grub 'bring dang tha ma rnams ni 'bad pa med par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2589:207b-37: gsang sngags gzhan dag bsgrubs na mtshan gyi don gang

T02D2589:208a-1: gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod par gsungs ba yin no //
T02D2589:208a-2: de bas na 'di ltar gang ci yang rung ba
T02D2589:208a-3: ma brtags pa dag la sngon dang phyi ma'i don
T02D2589:208a-4: brtag par bya ba'i phyir de kho na nyid bshad
T02D2589:208a-5: par bya'o // ji ltar na mtshan yang dag par
T02D2589:208a-6: brjod pa las dkyil 'khor dang sngags dang phyag rgya
T02D2589:208a-7: dang lha rnams rnam par dgod pa'i khyad par gyi
T02D2589:208a-8: nges par bstan pa bshad pa ni med kyi rang
T02D2589:208a-9: bzor brtags pa lta bur shes so zhe na 'di
T02D2589:208a-11: thams cad ni mtshan yang dag par brjod pa nyid
T02D2589:208a-12: du gnas la de bzhin du bshad pa yin gyi
T02D2589:208a-13: rang bzor byas pa ni ma yin te /

T02D2589:208a-15: 'gyed pa'i snang bas dngos po rnams shin tu gsal
T02D2589:208a-16: bar mngon yang / dmus long dang mig med pa rnams kyis ni mi mthong ngo //
T02D2589:208a-17: de bzhin du shin tu gsal ba'i blo gros kyi
T02D2589:208a-18: mig ma tshang bas gal te rtsod dus zin kyang
T02D2589:208a-19: de'i tshe nyes pa yod pa ma yin no //
T02D2589:208a-20: de lta mod kyi blo gros dman pa rnams kyis

T02D2589:208a-23: gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed //
T02D2589:208a-24: gtsug tor chen po rmad byung gtsug / ces bya ba la sogs pas ni //

T02D2589:208a-29: bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bshad pa yin
T02D2589:208a-30: no // rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02D2589:208a-31: rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che //
T02D2589:208a-32: zhes bya la sogs pa ni byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug rnams bstan pa yin no //
T02D2589:208a-33: 'dzin pa chen po rdo rje zhags //
T02D2589:208a-34: rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che //
T02D2589:208a-35: zhes bya bas ni sgo srung rnams kyang gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2589:208a-36: che ba sangs rgyas rig sngags 'chang //
T02D2589:208a-37: zhes bya bas ni sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa'i rig pa bzhi bshad pa yin no //
T02D2589:208a-38: gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'khor du yang //
T02D2589:208a-39: mgon pos sa bcu dbang phyug ste //
T02D2589:208a-40: sa bcu la ni rab tu gnas //
T02D2589:208b-0: zhes bya bas ni sa @208b rnams bshad pa yin no //
T02D2589:208b-1: pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste //
T02D2589:208b-2: zhes bya bas ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams so //
T02D2589:208b-3: rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po //
T02D2589:208b-4: zhes bya bas ni dbang rnams so //

T02D2589:208b-6: zhes bya bas ni don gyi gzungs dang tshig gi gzungs dang /

T02D2589:208b-9: dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che //

T02D2589:208b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pas //
T02D2589:208b-17: kun du bzang po la sogs pa //
T02D2589:208b-18: byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug bshad pa yin no //
T02D2589:208b-20: gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal //
T02D2589:208b-21: don yod zhags pa rnam par rgyal //

T02D2589:208b-26: bgegs mthar byed rnams de bzhin du bshad pa yin no //

T02D2589:208b-29: rdo rje 'bar ba mig ni bzang //
T02D2589:208b-30: ces bya bas ni rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'o //
T02D2589:208b-32: ces bya bas ni rdo rje khrag 'thung ngo //
T02D2589:208b-33: hi hi zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed //
T02D2589:208b-34: ces bya ba ni rta mchog go //
T02D2589:208b-35: bdug pa ma la sogs rnams kyang //

T02D2589:208b-37: ces bya ba la sogs pas bstan pa yin te /

T02D2589:208b-44: ba la sogs pas mnan la phyi rol du gzhag
