T02D2589:210b-24: aom sva sti sv'a h'a zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2589:210b-25: sva sti ka'i me tog la sogs pa'i 'o //
T02D2589:210b-27: shin tu rgya cher che ba ba ni ma yin no //
T02D2589:210b-28: mdor bsdus na ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i me lha rnam pa bcu gnyis su bstan te /
T02D2589:210b-30: ye shes me nyid dang dang po ste /
T02D2589:210b-31: de ni dbang chen zhes su bsgrags //
T02D2589:210b-32: kha dog ser po'i mdog can la //
T02D2589:210b-33: mdog dang rgyas dang stobs kyang ster //
T02D2589:210b-35: ye shes rdzogs byed shes par bya //
T02D2589:210b-36: gnyis pa 'dzin pa zhes bya ste //
T02D2589:210b-37: ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od dang mnyam //
T02D2589:210b-38: dpal ldan gos kyang dkar po gon //
T02D2589:210b-39: bgrang phreng dang ni gundhe thogs //
T02D2589:210b-40: gsum pa rlung zhes bya ba ste //
T02D2589:210b-41: kha dog nag po rtsub pa'o //
T02D2589:210b-42: bzhi pa dmar po zhes bya ste //
T02D2589:210b-43: nub ka'i mtshams kyi dmar thag 'dra //
T02D2589:210b-44: lnga pa mi 'da' zhes bya ba //
T02D2589:210b-45: spun la kha dog dam pa ste /
T02D2589:210b-46: mgrin par ring la gzi brjid che //
T02D2589:210b-47: thams cad la ni phan 'dogs pa'i //
T02D2589:210b-48: drug pa khro bo zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2589:210b-49: mi g-yon dud pa'i kha dog can //
T02D2589:210b-50: gyen du ska brdzes sgra chen 'byin //
T02D2589:210b-51: mche ba bzhi pa stobs po che //
T02D2589:210b-52: bdun pa ltos ba zhes bya ste /
T02D2589:210b-53: rno la kha dog kun dang ldan //
T02D2589:210b-54: brgyad pa zad byed ces bya ste //
T02D2589:211a-2: / dgug pa yid las skyes zhes bya //
T02D2589:211a-3: sna tshogs gzugs can stobs po che //
T02D2589:211a-5: sha za'i mi ni de las gzhan //
T02D2589:211a-6: bcu gcig par ni shes par bya //
T02D2589:211a-7: 'dod med dbang gi las can no //
T02D2589:211a-8: rmugs byed ces pa bcu gnyis pa //
T02D2589:211a-9: sems can rmongs par byed pa'o //
T02D2589:211a-10: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs las skyes //
T02D2589:211a-11: las kyi rjes mthun gsang sngags dang //
T02D2589:211a-12: phyag rgya'i sbyor bar ldan pa yi //
T02D2589:211a-13: kun dang las don sgrub byed pa'o //
T02D2589:211a-14: de nas shin tu bsdus pa ni //
T02D2589:211a-15: rnam pa bzhi ru yongs bsgrags pa//
T02D2589:211a-16: sems can mos pa'i dbang gis ni //
T02D2589:211a-17: cho ga 'di ni bsdus pa yin //
T02D2589:211a-18: thab dang lha yi grangs dang ni //
T02D2589:211a-19: mdor bsdus 'bring dang rgyas pa ru //
T02D2589:211a-20: sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2589:211a-21: 'jig rten mgon pos gsungs pa yin //
T02D2589:211a-22: de las shin tu bsdus pa zlum po la sogs pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D2589:211a-26: zla ba phyed pa lta bu la khru gcig pa dang /
T02D2589:211a-34: las dang rdzas dang rjes su mthun par thob kyi tshad byas pa yin no ;
T02D2589:211a-35: /'dir thab khung rnam pa bzhir rdzas dang las kyi
T02D2589:211a-36: dbye ba las so sor nges pa yin gyi las
T02D2589:211a-37: thams cad pa'i thab khung ni mi snang ngo //
T02D2589:211a-40: rgyas pa la ni gru bzhi'o //
T02D2589:211a-41: dbang ba la ni gru gsum mo //
T02D2589:211a-42: mngon spyod la ni gru gsum zla ba phyed pa dang ldan pa'o ;
T02D2589:211a-43: / de la gdon dang nye bar 'tshe ba dang /
T02D2589:211a-44: rims dang bgegs kyis zin pa zha bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02D2589:211a-48: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pas na /
T02D2589:211a-49: zhi ba'i las zhes bshad do //
T02D2589:211a-58: gser 'gyur gyi rtsi la sogs pa grub pa ni rgyas pa'o //
T02D2589:211a-59: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang mi'am ci dang /
T02D2589:211a-60: skyes pa dang bud med la sogs pa dang rgyal
T02D2589:211b-0: po bran g-yog @211b dang bcas pa dbang du byed
T02D2589:211b-2: gsad pa dang bskrad pa dang /
T02D2589:211b-6: yan lag bcad pa ni mngon spyod do //
T02D2589:211b-7: las kyi tshogs de dag nges par shes par byas la //
T02D2589:211b-8: las thams cad dgug pa'i thab khung du thams cad bya'o //
T02D2589:211b-9: de nas yang rdo rje dang rin po che dang /
T02D2589:211b-10: padma dang sna tshogs rdo rje dang /
T02D2589:211b-11: 'khor los dbus su mtshan pas na //
T02D2589:211b-12: las thams cad pa zhes zer mod kyi de ni mi rigs te /
T02D2589:211b-13: phyag rgya gang yin pa lha yin la /
T02D2589:211b-14: lha gang yin pa de nyid phyag rgya yin pas na /
T02D2589:211b-15: rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa dang /
T02D2589:211b-16: m'a ma k'i'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D2589:211b-17: rin po che ni rin chen 'byung dang /
T02D2589:211b-18: rin chen sgrol ma'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D2589:211b-19: padma ni 'od dpag tu med pa dang /
T02D2589:211b-20: gos dkar mo'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D2589:211b-21: sna tshogs rdo rje ni don yod grub pa dang /
T02D2589:211b-22: sgrol ma'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D2589:211b-23: 'khor lo ni rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D2589:211b-24: sangs rgyas spyan gyi ngo bo nyid do //
T02D2589:211b-25: rigs pa 'dis na las thams cad pa nyid de /
T02D2589:211b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung nyid las /
T02D2589:211b-27: las thams cad pa 'di ci zhig rigs zhes la la dag zer ro //
T02D2589:211b-28: de yang rab tu grub par byed pa'i rgyu las ni //
T02D2589:211b-29: thab gru bzhi pa de nyid las thams cad pa'i thab khung yin par bshad de //
T02D2589:211b-30: de nyid dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa'i rgyud las bkag ste /
T02D2589:211b-31: rdzing bu'i dbyibs lta bur glu dang gsang ba rnams kyi lus bsreg pa dang /
T02D2589:211b-32: yan lag gzhig pa'i don du ji ltar 'gyur //
T02D2589:211b-33: thab khung gru bzhi pa ni rdo rje phreng ba'i rgyud las //
T02D2589:211b-34: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas rdo rjes brgyan pa'i thab khung las thams cad pa'o zhes gsungs te /
T02D2589:211b-35: de yang ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D2589:211b-36: zur bzhi pa la khru gang tsam /
T02D2589:211b-37: zabs su de'i phyed tsam brkos te /
T02D2589:211b-38: thab khung gi steng du sor bzhi tsam dor bar
T02D2589:211b-39: dpangs dang rgyar sor bzhi pa'i kun du mnyam pa'i
T02D2589:211b-40: kha khyer la ; phyogs rnams su lcags kyu dang /
T02D2589:211b-44: mtshams su zla ba kham pa dang /
T02D2589:211b-45: rtse gsum pa'i rdo rjes mtshan la thab kyi dbus
T02D2589:211b-46: su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa thab pas cung zad
T02D2589:211b-47: dma' ba 'dab ma brgyad la rdo rje brgyad lte
T02D2589:212a-0: ba'i ge sar la rdo rje rtse lnga pa @212a
T02D2589:212a-1: * // phyed nub phyed bgreng ba ste /
T02D2589:212a-2: 'di dag ni rdo rjes brgyan pa'i thab khung las thams cad pa'o //
T02D2589:212a-3: thab khung de nyid rje btsun rnam par snam snang
T02D2589:212a-4: mdzad mngon par byang chub pa rgyud chen po dang
T02D2589:212a-5: dam tshig gsum gyi rgyal ba'i rgyud chen po dang
T02D2589:212a-6: / kun nas dbang bskur bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po dang //
T02D2589:212a-7: phyag na rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po las gsungs pa ni //
T02D2589:212a-8: rdo rje brgyad dang ldan pa la //
T02D2589:212a-9: dbus su rdo rje chen po bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D2589:212a-10: rje btsun rdo rje 'dzin pas kyang rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po las //
T02D2589:212a-11: dbus su rdo rje rab tu brtag / ces gsungs pas //
T02D2589:212a-12: thab khung de nyid las thams cad yin par bshad do //
T02D2589:212a-13: dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las ni padma lta bu'i
T02D2589:212a-14: dbyibs can gyi thab khung las thams cad pa yin
T02D2589:212a-15: par bshad do // bud med dang rgyal po'i bu mo dang /
T02D2589:212a-18: don thams cad ni padma'i dbyibs lta bus 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
T02D2589:212a-20: padma 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po dang /
T02D2589:212a-21: rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen po
T02D2589:212a-22: las padma'i dbyibs can thab khung de nyid las thams
T02D2589:212a-23: cad pa yin par gsungs te /
T02D2589:212a-24: thab khung 'di ni zlum po la khor khor yug
T02D2589:212a-25: khru gang tsam la 'og tu khru phyed par brkos
T02D2589:212a-26: par dbus kyi 'dab ma la padma brgyad kyis bskor
T02D2589:212a-27: ba // thab kyi steng du sor bzhi dor ba
T02D2589:212a-28: dpangs dang rgyar song bzhi pa thab khung nas byung
T02D2589:212a-29: ba'i padma kha bye ba lta bu'i kha khyer la
T02D2589:212a-30: ba // // kha khyer gyi rgyab tu padma'i phreng bas bskor ba //
T02D2589:212a-31: thab kyi dbus kyi phyogs kyi padma rnams la rdo rje dang //
T02D2589:212a-34: sna tshogs rdo rje'i rgya dgod par bya'o //
T02D2589:212a-35: mtshams kyi padma la mig gnyis dang rdo rje rtse gsum dang //
T02D2589:212a-37: dbus kyi padma la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa dgod do //
T02D2589:212a-38: thab khung gi nang gi tha mar rdo rje phreng
T02D2589:212a-39: bas yongs su bskor ba'i thab khung ni las thams
T02D2589:212a-41: gzhan dag gis thams cad pa'i thub khung gzhan dag tu yang 'chad do //
T02D2589:212a-42: rje btsun gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa //
T02D2589:212b-0: @212b 'dir ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid
T02D2589:212b-1: bcom ldan 'das rje btsun 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
T02D2589:212b-2: pa ni don thams cad rdzogs pa yin par bshad
T02D2589:212b-5: sku mdog dang dbyibs sna tshogs pa'i ngo bo nyid
T02D2589:212b-6: yin pa'i phyir rten dang brten pa po'i ngo bo
T02D2589:212b-7: nyid yin no // de la shar phyogs kyi zhal
T02D2589:212b-8: ni me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi byang chub
T02D2589:212b-9: kyi sems rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid de
T02D2589:212b-10: dkar po zhi bar mdzad pa'o //
T02D2589:212b-11: lho'i zhal ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rin chen 'byung ldan gyi ngo bo nyid de /
T02D2589:212b-12: ser po rgyas pa 'phel bar mdzad pa'o //
T02D2589:212b-13: nub kyi zhal ni so sor kun du rtog pa'i
T02D2589:212b-14: ye shes 'od dpag tu med pa'i ngo bo nyid
T02D2589:212b-15: de / dmar po 'gro ba rnams dbang du mdzad pa'o //
T02D2589:212b-16: byang gi zhal ni bya ba bsgrub pa'i ye shes don yod grub pa'i ngo bo nyid de //
T02D2589:212b-17: nag po nyon mongs pa'i dgra rnams dang /
T02D2589:212b-18: bdud kyi dgra bo thams cad zad par mdzad pa ste mngon spyod do //
T02D2589:212b-22: mngon spyod kyi las rnams rdzogs par byed pas na //
T02D2589:212b-23: thab gcig la las thams cad pa'i thub khung du bshad do //
T02D2589:212b-24: de lta na ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid dbye ba la don med de //
T02D2589:212b-25: thab gcig tu las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro zhe na ;
T02D2589:212b-26: / don med pa ma yin te //
T02D2589:212b-27: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po nyid kyis legs par las byed pas na /
T02D2589:212b-28: dkyil 'khor thams cad zhi ba'i las la bskur zhing bka'i 'khor lo'i sbyor bas zhi zhes bya'o //
T02D2589:212b-29: de bzhin du rgyas pa dang /
T02D2589:212b-32: de bas na mtshan nyid tha dad pa'am /
T02D2589:212b-33: dgongs pa'i dbang gis nye bar gzung ba yin no //
T02D2589:212b-34: thab khung so so'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02D2589:212b-35: de la zhi ba la ni sa gzhi dkar po
T02D2589:212b-36: la rgyar khru gang tsam brkos la zhabs su sor
T02D2589:212b-37: bcu gnyis pa de'i dbus su padma'i steng du rdo
T02D2589:212b-38: rje rtse lnga pa sor brgyad pa thab kyi steng
T02D2589:212b-39: bar du song bzhi dor ba dpangs dang rgyar sor
T02D2589:212b-40: bzhi pa'i kha khyer gyis bskor ba la mtshams rnams
T02D2589:212b-41: su rdo rje rtse gsum pas mtshan pa /
T02D2589:212b-42: thab de sa gzhi dkar po dang ba'i lci bas byugs la /
T02D2589:212b-43: yang de gnyis dri dkar pos nye bar byug cing me tog dkar pos gtor ba dus gsum bya'o //
T02D2589:213a-0: rgyas pa la ni sa gzhi ser po la rgyar @213a * //
T02D2589:213a-1: khru do zabs su khru gang zur bzhi pa'am /
T02D2589:213a-2: rin po che zur brgyad pa dang 'dra bar brkos
T02D2589:213a-3: la de'i steng du sor brgyad pa'i kha khyer dbyibs
T02D2589:213a-4: de dang 'dra bar bskor la khung bur 'khor lo
T02D2589:213a-5: rtsibs brgyad pa'i lte ba rdo rje rin po che
T02D2589:213a-7: sa ser po dang dri ser pos thab dang sa gzhi de byugs la /
T02D2589:213a-8: me tog sna tshogs gtor bar bya'o //
T02D2589:213a-9: mngon spyod la ni rtsub cing gas pa dang /
T02D2589:213a-10: shin tu gnag pa'i sa gzhi la gru gsum pa
T02D2589:213a-11: zla gam gnyis mtshan pa dang ldan pa sor nyi
T02D2589:213a-12: shu pa zabs su sor bcu pa //
T02D2589:213a-13: thab kyi mgo byang du blta ba /
T02D2589:213a-14: 'og tu rtse gsum pa'i steng du khro bo'i rdo rje sor brgyad pas mtshan pa /
T02D2589:213a-15: de'i steng du sor gsum dor bar dpangs dang rgyar sor gsum dor ba //
T02D2589:213a-16: kha phyir bltas pa'i kha khyer gyis bskor ba /
T02D2589:213a-17: sa nag po dang ro bsregs pa'i thal ba dang /
T02D2589:213a-18: bong bu dang rnga mo'i rtug pa la sogs pa ci snyed pas byugs la /
T02D2589:213a-19: dri mi zhim pa'i dri dang me tog sngon po'am /
T02D2589:213a-22: dbang la ni sa gzhi dmar po la thab kyi
T02D2589:213a-23: dbyi bas bha ga lta bu rdo rje dang padmas
T02D2589:213a-24: mtshan pa'o // dgug pa la ni rdo rje rtse
T02D2589:213a-25: gcig lta bus dbus su rdo rje dang rin po
T02D2589:213a-26: mtshan pa'o // ches mtshan pa'o // de dang 'dra
T02D2589:213a-27: ba'i kha khyer gyis yongs su bskor bas dmar po
T02D2589:213a-28: dang dri dmar pos byugs pa //
T02D2589:213a-29: me tog dmar pos nye bar mdzes par byas pa'o //
T02D2589:213a-30: 'di gnyis kyi zabs dang rgya'i tshad la sogs pa
T02D2589:213a-31: ni zhi ba'i thab khung dang 'dra ba las thams
T02D2589:213a-32: cad pa'i thab khung kyang de bzhin te 'on kyang
T02D2589:213a-33: kha khyer ni padma kha bye ba lta bu la
T02D2589:213a-34: rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba dbus su rdo rje
T02D2589:213a-37: sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbus su 'khor lo dang ldan
T02D2589:213a-38: pas mtshan pa'o zhes pa la la dag brjod do
T02D2589:213a-39: // dkyil 'khor ram lha'i khang pa'i shar phyogs su zhi ba'i thab khung /
T02D2589:213a-41: nub tu dbang du bya ba dang /
T02D2589:213a-42: nub tu dbang du bya ba dang /
T02D2589:213a-44: byang du mngon spyod kyi thab khung bya zhing /
T02D2589:213a-45: tshon rtsi rnams kyang las dang rjes su mthun par brtag par bya'o //
T02D2589:213a-47: de nas thab khung gi gnas rab tu shis pa'i chu shing lo ma'am /
T02D2589:213a-48: mtshan dang ldan zhing shin tu sar pa'i gos dang /
T02D2589:213b-0: padma'i 'dab mas thab kyi mthar thug bar g-yogs @213b par bya'o //
T02D2589:213b-1: de nas ku sha dgram par bya ste /
T02D2589:213b-2: rtsa ba nas bton zhing ma nyam pa 'bus ma
T02D2589:213b-3: zos pa shin tu gsar zhing sngo ba'i ku shas
T02D2589:213b-4: g-yogs par bya'o // dang po shar du rtse bstan
T02D2589:213b-5: gzhag / gnyis pa lho phyogs kha ba bltas pa'o
T02D2589:213b-6: g-yogs par bya'o // // gsum pa'i rtse mo nub tu ste //
T02D2589:213b-7: bzhi pa rtse mo byang du'o //
T02D2589:213b-8: don kun bsgrub pa'i ku sha yis //
T02D2589:213b-9: thab kyi shar nas dang por g-yogs //
T02D2589:213b-10: 'dir ku sha blang ba'i sngags ni 'di yin te //
T02D2589:213b-11: ai ngam ku sha shu bha dhi bhya p'u ta pra hma bi ba tren /
T02D2589:213b-12: buddha dharmm'a sam gha ti pri thvisanydza ta ga rbha aa bi ghn'an ma ma sh'annim kurbandu sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:213b-13: gsang sngags 'di ku sha la lan bdun bzlas la sngar bshad pa'i cho gas dgram par bya'o //
T02D2589:213b-14: 'dab dang ku sha'i tshogs dgram pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2589:213b-15: zhib la ni pa la sha dang au dum w'a ra dang /
T02D2589:213b-21: n+ya gro dha la sogs pa shing 'o ma can las byung ba /
T02D2589:213b-22: 'dab ma dang bcas pa mnyam por bcad pa /
T02D2589:213b-23: rtse mo'i cha las byung ba'i mtho gang tsam gyi
T02D2589:213b-24: yam shing la sbreng rtsi dang mar la rtse mo
T02D2589:213b-25: gnyis btags la / dri dkar po'i spos chus bkrus
T02D2589:213b-26: pa rtse mo 'dab ma gnyis dang bcas pa ste
T02D2589:213b-27: gnyis btags la / / rtse gcig pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2589:213b-28: rnying pa dang lo ma med pa dang /
T02D2589:213b-38: srog chags dang bcas pa rnams ni spang bar bya'o //
T02D2589:213b-50: pri yang ku'i me tog dang /
T02D2589:213b-53: ge sar dang thang chu dri zhim pa ci snyed pa las sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2589:213b-54: rgyas pa la ni yam shing de rnams de nyid
T02D2589:213b-55: las sboms su chag gang la srid du khru gang
T02D2589:213b-57: mar la btags te dri zhim po'i spos chu la sbyangs la //
T02D2589:213b-58: mngar gsum la btags pa'i 'bras chan bzang po'i bshos dang /
T02D2589:214a-2: zho dang 'bras chan mar dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2589:214a-9: mngon spyod la ni nim pa dang /
T02D2589:214a-14: de las gzhan pa'i shing kha ba dang tshe ma can dang /
T02D2589:214a-15: rob ba sregs pa'i thal ba can dang /
T02D2589:214a-16: mgal dum gyi yam shing rtsa ba'i cha las byung ba gas pa sor bcu'i tshad tsam //
T02D2589:214a-17: dug dang khrag dang yungs ma la btags pa'i rtse mo gnyi ga rno ba dang ;
T02D2589:214a-25: ro bsregs pa'i thal ba dang /
T02D2589:214a-27: bong bu dang rnga mo la sogs pa'i rtug pa dang /
T02D2589:214a-29: bya rog la sogs pa'i gshogs pa dang /
T02D2589:214a-33: mi rus kyi phye ma dang /
T02D2589:214a-34: sbrang rtsi la sogs pa dang /
T02D2589:214a-36: rdzas re re zhing dug dang /
T02D2589:214a-40: da du ra'i lo ma'i khu ba la btags pa'i rdzas de rnams thal ba dang /
T02D2589:214a-41: sol ba'am phub ma las dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan byas la /
T02D2589:214a-42: gtub cing gtub cing sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2589:214a-43: dbang gi las la ni tsam pa ka dang /
T02D2589:214a-47: la ku tsa la sogs pa'i yam shing sor lnga pa la 'dab ma dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2589:214a-49: me tog skyur po rnams dang /
T02D2589:214a-50: gzhan yang rang gi rtog pa las gsungs pa'i rdzas rnams kyis sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2589:214a-51: dgug pa la ni de nyid dang tsher ma lcags kyu lta bu'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2589:214a-52: au dum w'a ra pa la sha //
T02D2589:214a-53: plaksha dang ni n+ya gro dha //
T02D2589:214a-54: seng ldeng dang ni aa rka dang //
T02D2589:214a-55: aa mra be ta ka ta dang /
T02D2589:214a-56: aa ma dya dang sha mi dang /
T02D2589:214a-57: aa pa ma rka las byung dang /
T02D2589:214a-58: aa shvadtha dang bcas pa ni //
T02D2589:214a-59: yam sreg shing ni bcu gnyis bstan //
T02D2589:214a-60: gsar zhing drang la mtho gang tsam //
T02D2589:214a-61: rtse gnyis dri zhim legs par btags //
T02D2589:214a-62: yam shing dag ni rtse gcig tu //
T02D2589:214a-63: las rnams kun la bsreg par bya //
T02D2589:214a-64: zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gang cung zad //
T02D2589:214b-0: @214b gang yang rgyas pa'i bsreg bya dang /
T02D2589:214b-1: bdag gi zangs te de dag kun //
T02D2589:214b-2: nyin re sv'a h'a'i mthar bcas dbul //
T02D2589:214b-3: mar la btags pa'i gu gul dang /
T02D2589:214b-4: s'a la'i thang chu la sogs pa //
T02D2589:214b-5: gsang sngags lha yi bye brag gis //
T02D2589:214b-6: sbyin sreg la ni dbul bar bya //
T02D2589:214b-7: dri dang me tog sogs mchod pa //
T02D2589:214b-8: las thun rang sngags ji bzhin bzla //
T02D2589:214b-9: rdzas rnams kyi ni mtshan nyid do //
T02D2589:214b-10: zhi ba la ni mchod sbyin gyi shing srog chags
T02D2589:214b-11: med pa rnams la thab khung las cung zad dma'
T02D2589:214b-12: ba'am / dgon pa'i ba lang gi lci ba'i bud shing bya'o //
T02D2589:214b-13: rgyas pa la ni dgon pa'i ba lang gi lci
T02D2589:214b-14: ba ma gtogs pa ji skad du bshad pa'i bud
T02D2589:214b-15: shing rnams 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2589:214b-16: mngon spyod la ni khab dang /
T02D2589:214b-18: dri mi zhim pa'i bud shing dan dur khrod kyi shing ngam /
T02D2589:214b-19: bong bu dang rnga mo la sogs pa'i rtug pa'am /
T02D2589:214b-21: dbang dbu bya ba la ni ni mba dang /
T02D2589:214b-22: aa mra'i shing dang gzhan yang me tog dang bcas pa'i shing ngo //
T02D2589:214b-23: dgug pa la ni tsher ma dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2589:214b-24: las thams cad pa la ni las dang rjes su mthun pa'i bud shing gis bya'o //
T02D2589:214b-25: bud shing gi mtshan nyid do //
T02D2589:214b-26: gser ram dngul lam rdo'am shing ngam //
T02D2589:214b-30: shel las byas pa'i snod legs par bkrus pa dri
T02D2589:214b-31: zhim pa'i spos kyis legs par bdugs pa'i mchod yon
T02D2589:214b-38: bkod ma la sogs pa'i chu ngogs gtsang ma skye bo mang pos bsten pa ma yin pa //
T02D2589:214b-39: rgyal po dang nye ba ma yin pa //
T02D2589:214b-44: ma he dang glang po che rnams kyis smos par ma byas pa'i chu ngogs las //
T02D2589:214b-46: snod gzhan gyis ma reg pa //
T02D2589:214b-48: sme sha can dang bcas pas bsten pa'am //
T02D2589:214b-49: ngan cing dman pa la 'jug pa dang /
T02D2589:214b-54: sha bkra la sogs pa'o nad kyis yongs su gdungs
T02D2589:214b-55: pa rnams kyis ma mthong zhing ma reg pa'i chus
T02D2589:214b-56: mchod yon gyi snod bkang la /
T02D2589:215a-1: dz'a ti dang ma li ka la sogs pa'i me tog gis brgyan pa //
T02D2589:215a-2: spos dri zhim pos bdugs pa'i mchod yon legs par brdungs pa'i gser gyi gdu bu dang /
T02D2589:215a-3: gsang byed la sogs pa btags pa'i lag pa dang /
T02D2589:215a-5: rang gi rtog pa las bshad pa'i sngags lan bdun bzlas la g-yon phyogs su gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2589:215a-6: zhi ba la ni dri dkar po la sogs pa
T02D2589:215a-7: dang sbyar ba'i chu rang gi lha'i sngags sv'a h'a'i
T02D2589:215a-8: mtha' dang bcas pas bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2589:215a-9: de bzhin du rgyas pa la ni ser po la
T02D2589:215a-10: sogs pa dang sbyar ba'i chu til dang zho ru
T02D2589:215a-11: bcas pa aom gyi mtha' dang bcas pas bzlas pa
T02D2589:215a-12: bya'o // mngon spyod la ni dri nag po dang sbyar ba'i chu khrag dang //
T02D2589:215a-14: ba gcin dang bcas pa la phat kyi mtha' dang bcas pas bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D2589:215a-15: dbang la ni dri dmar po la sogs pa dang
T02D2589:215a-16: sbyar ba'i chu bo'i mtha' dang bcas pas bzlas pa
T02D2589:215a-17: bya'o // dgug pa la ni dza'i mtha' dang cas pas bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D2589:215a-18: thams cad du yang dri la sogs pa ni las dang rjes su mthun par gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2589:215a-19: mchod yon gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D2589:215a-20: de nas zhin ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang du bya ba ni rdo rje gnod sbyin dang //
T02D2589:215a-21: rdo rje rtse mo gnyis kyi sngags kyi las thams cad pa'i chu'i snod dang /
T02D2589:215a-22: mchod yon gyi snod la bzlas la rang gi g-yon
T02D2589:215a-23: phyogs su bzhag nas de dag nyid dang bzlas pa'i
T02D2589:215a-24: chus bsang ba'i bud shing la sogs pa sbyin sreg
T02D2589:215a-25: gi rdzas rnams rang gi g-yas phyogs su gzhag par
T02D2589:215a-26: bya'o ; / gsad pa dang bskrad pa dang /
T02D2589:215a-27: rnam par dbye ba la sogs pa'i las rnams la ni bsad pa dang /
T02D2589:215a-28: dgod pa go bzlog ste bya'o //
T02D2589:215a-29: aom badzra yaksha h'um rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags so //
T02D2589:215a-30: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis las mthe'u chung gi rtse mo gnyis mche bar bya ste /
T02D2589:215a-31: khar gzhag pa 'di ni 'di'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:215a-32: aom badzra shi kha re ru ta ma ta zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rtse mo'i sngags so //
T02D2589:215a-33: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis ri 'degs par bya ba ni 'di'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2589:215a-34: rdzas gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2589:215a-35: zhi ba la ni rang gi lha'i chos kyi yi
T02D2589:215a-36: ge las thab khung bskyed la de'i dbus su yi
T02D2589:215b-0: ge ram sum mdo @215b ris mtshan dang bcas pas
T02D2589:215b-1: aom las byung ba'i padma'i steng du gnas pa'i ai
T02D2589:215b-2: las byung ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang na
T02D2589:215b-3: chu'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas pa dung dang
T02D2589:215b-4: / kunda lta bu'i pa pa k'i me mig gsum
T02D2589:215b-5: pa ral pa cod pan du ldan pa lag pa
T02D2589:215b-6: bzhi g-yas pas dbyug pa dang /
T02D2589:215b-8: g-yon na gundhe dang phreng ba thogs pa rgyan dang gos dang /
T02D2589:215b-9: mchod phyir thogs pa dkar po dang ldan pa /
T02D2589:215b-10: lus kyi yan lag thams cad nas bdud rtsi'i rang
T02D2589:215b-11: bzhin gyi 'od zer dkar po 'phro bar bsam par
T02D2589:215b-12: bya'o // rgyas pa la ni de bzhin du 'od
T02D2589:215b-13: gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang na dbang chen gyi dkyil
T02D2589:215b-14: 'khor de'i dbus na rgyas pa'i me dbang chen zhes
T02D2589:215b-15: bya ba ral pa dang cod pan thogs pa mig
T02D2589:215b-16: bya'o // gsum pa // phyag bzhi pa g-yas na dbyug pa thogs pa dang /
T02D2589:215b-17: mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa g-yon na phreng ba dang gundhe thogs pa rgyan dang gos dang /
T02D2589:215b-18: mchod phyir thogs ser por ldan pa /
T02D2589:215b-19: 'od zer ser po gtong ba'i tshogs kyis sems can ma lus pa'i khams kyi stobs dang /
T02D2589:215b-21: dpal rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes kyi me bsam par bya'o //
T02D2589:215b-22: dbang du bya ba la ni de bzhin du 'bar
T02D2589:215b-23: ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang na me'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2589:215b-24: steng kha dog dmar zhing nyi ma 'char ka lta
T02D2589:215b-25: bur 'od zer dmar po rab tu 'gyed pa //
T02D2589:215b-26: lag pa bzhi pa g-yas na dbyug pa dang /
T02D2589:215b-28: g-yon na zhags pa dang gundhe thogs pa /
T02D2589:215b-29: rgyan dang gos dang phreng ba dang /
T02D2589:215b-31: mchod phyir thogs pa dmar po dang ldan pa mig gsum pa /
T02D2589:215b-33: cod pan dang ldan pa'i dbang gi me dbang gi las la bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2589:215b-34: mngon spyod la ni de bzhin du 'bar ba'i dkyil
T02D2589:215b-35: 'khor gyi nang du rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng
T02D2589:215b-36: du h'um las byung ba'i mig gsum pa /
T02D2589:215b-37: lag pa bzhi pa du ba'i mdog can mi g-yo ba /
T02D2589:215b-38: g-yas na ral gri dang dbyug pa thogs pa /
T02D2589:215b-39: g-yon na zhags pa dang gundhe thogs pa /
T02D2589:216a-0: skra kham gyen du 'bar shas cher khro zhing mig dmar ba mche ba gtsigs pa @216a * //
T02D2589:216a-2: khros shing shas cher 'jigs su rung ba rgyan dang gos dang /
T02D2589:216a-3: mchod phyir thogs la sogs pa nag po dang ldan pa /
T02D2589:216a-4: 'od zer nag po'i phreng ba rnams kyis srid pa
T02D2589:216a-5: gsum khyed par byed pa'i rlung zhes bya ba'i me
T02D2589:216a-6: gsad pa la sogs pa'i gdug pa'i las rnams la
T02D2589:216a-7: bsgom par bya'o // de la zhi ba la ni
T02D2589:216a-8: 'o ma can gyi shing las byung ba'i me'am rgyun
T02D2589:216a-9: bsgom par bya'o // bzhag gi me'am / bram ze tha mal pa'i mes bya'o //
T02D2589:216a-10: rgyas pa la ni rgyal po'am /
T02D2589:216a-11: rgyal rigs kyi khyim nas byung ba'i me'am /
T02D2589:216a-12: dgon pa'i me'am nags mched pa'i mes bya'o //
T02D2589:216a-13: mngon spyod la ni dur khrod kyi me'am /
T02D2589:216a-14: rus pa'am rdo las byung ba'i me'am /
T02D2589:216a-15: gdol pa'i khyim las byung ba'i mes bya'o //
T02D2589:216a-17: rje'u rigs kyi khyim las byung ba'i mes bya'o //
T02D2589:216a-18: dgug pa la ni gar mkhan dang rol mo pa'am /
T02D2589:216a-19: lam du bus pa'i mes bya'o //
T02D2589:216a-21: dgang gzar ni gser ram dngul gyi rgyu las byas pa'am /
T02D2589:216a-22: mchod sbyin gyi shing las byas pa padma'i 'dab ma'i
T02D2589:216a-23: dbyibs lta bu de'i yu ba skyes bu tshad dang
T02D2589:216a-24: ldan pa'i mthe bo sor sum cu rtsa bzhi rdo
T02D2589:216a-25: rje khu tshur la sogs pas gzung du rung ba
T02D2589:216a-26: / de'i rtse mo'i char sor bzhi pa /
T02D2589:216a-28: zabs su sor gnyis pa dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pas mtshan pa /
T02D2589:216a-29: khu ba byung ba'i bu ga sor gcig tsam de'i
T02D2589:216a-30: mchu sor bzhi pa la rdo rje rtse gsum pas
T02D2589:216a-31: mtshan pa / yu ba'i 'og tu rdo rje dang rin po che sor drug pa bya'o //
T02D2589:216a-32: blugs gzar ni yu ba khru gang tsam padma'i dbyibs lta bu la kha'i rgyar sor gnyis pa /
T02D2589:216a-33: zabs su sor gcig pa dbus su rdo rje rtse
T02D2589:216a-34: lnga pas mtshan pa yu ba'i 'og tu rdo rje
T02D2589:216a-36: dgang gzar med na sor mo lnga gzhi bas nas dgang blugs byas la /
T02D2589:216a-37: srin lag dang gung mo dang mthe bo gzhibs pas ni sreg blugs cig shos bya'o //
T02D2589:216a-38: dgang gzar dang blugs gzar gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D2589:216a-39: de nas legs par khrus byas shing yan lag dris bsgos la ji skad du bshad pa'i rgyan dang /
T02D2589:216b-0: gos la sogs pa @216b dang ldan pas zhi ba dang /
T02D2589:216b-5: bskrad pa'i bsam pas sbyin sreg gi las bya ba
T02D2589:216b-6: dang ldan zhing rang gi lha'i sbyor ba dang ldan
T02D2589:216b-7: pas las dang rjes su mthun pa'i yid kyis 'jigs
T02D2589:216b-8: pa med par sems can thams cad la phan par
T02D2589:216b-9: brtson pas ji skad du gsungs pa thams cad bya'o
T02D2589:216b-10: // de la zhi ba la ni gos dang cod pan dang /
T02D2589:216b-11: rgyan dkar po dang ldan zhing gsang byed dang bcas
T02D2589:216b-12: pa gdu bu dang bcas pas ji skad du bshad
T02D2589:216b-13: pa'i bsrung ba'i cho ga dang bzlas brjod bya zhing
T02D2589:216b-14: byams pa chen po dang ldan pas mi smra bar
T02D2589:216b-15: 'jam zhing bde pa'i stan nang tshangs can la padma'i
T02D2589:216b-17: lag pa'i padma gnyis kyi gru mo'i mthar thug gi bar du dri zhim pos legs par byugs la /
T02D2589:216b-18: phyi dro'i dus su shar du bltas /
T02D2589:216b-19: blos bsgrub par bya ba dmigs nas yar gyi ngo'i tshes gcig nas brtsams te /
T02D2589:216b-20: ji srid bdag gam gzhan zhi bar mngon par 'dod
T02D2589:216b-21: pa zhi bar gyur pa de srid du zhi ba'i
T02D2589:216b-22: las bya'o // rgyas pa la ni de bzhin du phreng ba dang /
T02D2589:216b-23: byug pa dang gos ser po dang /
T02D2589:216b-24: rgyan sna tshogs pa dang ldan pas bzang po'i 'dug
T02D2589:216b-25: stangs dang yid rab tu dga' bas zla ba nya
T02D2589:216b-26: nas brtsams te / phyi ma'i nya'i bar du ji
T02D2589:216b-27: srid du mngon par 'dod pa rgyas par gyur pa
T02D2589:216b-28: de srid du byang du kha ba ltas te /
T02D2589:216b-29: dga' ba dang ldan pas snga dro'i dus su rgyas pa'i las bya'o //
T02D2589:216b-30: mngon spyod la ni khros shing rgyan dang gos sngon po'am /
T02D2589:216b-31: khrag gis spags [?] pa'i gos bgos la stan sra ba la lho phyogs su kha bltas te /
T02D2589:216b-32: bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan gyi brang la mnan pa'am /
T02D2589:216b-33: stan med par rkang pas rkang pa mnan zhing /
T02D2589:216b-36: gdong gnyer ma bsnyer ba dang /
T02D2589:216b-37: snying rje chen pos dkon mchog gsum la gnod par
T02D2589:216b-38: byed pa'i bdud dang dgra rnams bzlog par bya ba'i
T02D2589:216b-39: phyir / zla ba mar ngo'i nyin zhag gang yang
T02D2589:216b-40: rung ba la khro bo nyid tshad mar bya ste
T02D2589:216b-41: phyir / / nyi ma gung ngam mtshan phyed la mngon spyod kyi las bya'o //
T02D2589:216b-42: dbang la ni khro ba med pa dang /
T02D2589:217a-1: med par sems can ma lus pa gdon pa la
T02D2589:217a-2: chags pas gos rgyan dmar po dang ldan pas stan
T02D2589:217a-3: bde ba la rdo rje skyil mo krung du 'dug
T02D2589:217a-4: ste / kha nub bam byang du bltas la dgug pa la sogs pa'i las bya'o //
T02D2589:217a-5: las dang rjes su mthun pa'i tshul gyis phyi rol
T02D2589:217a-6: gyi sprul pa'i me lha la bod par bya ste
T02D2589:217a-7: / rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi sngags dang phyag rgyas
T02D2589:217a-8: sbyangs la de bzlas pa'i chu ku sha'i rtse mos
T02D2589:217a-9: blangs pas skor phyogs su lan gsum bsangs la gtsang
T02D2589:217a-10: zhing skam pa'i rtsva dang bcas pa'i bud shing btsug
T02D2589:217a-11: la rlung yab kyis rlung dang /
T02D2589:217a-12: aom dzva la h'um zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis sbar la /
T02D2589:217a-13: dam tshig sems dpa' thab kyi dbus su bsams nas /
T02D2589:217a-14: phyag rgya 'di sngags dang bcas pas ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang bar bya'o //
T02D2589:217a-15: lag pa g-yas pa mi 'jigs par byas la /
T02D2589:217a-16: mthe bo'i rtse mo srin lag gi tshigs kyi rtsa
T02D2589:217a-17: bar bzhag la dgug pa'i tshul gyis yang dang yang
T02D2589:217a-18: du bskyod la mngon par 'dod pa'i me'i sngags 'don
T02D2589:217a-20: ae hye hi ma h'a bh'u ta de bi ra shi dvi dza sa ta ma /
T02D2589:217a-21: gri hi tv'a hu ti ma h'a ra smin sanni hi to bha b'a /
T02D2589:217a-22: aom p'a pa ka aagna ye nv'a h'a zhi ba la'o //
T02D2589:217a-23: rgyas pa la ni de bzhin du /
T02D2589:217a-24: aom ma he ndra aagna ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:217a-26: aom ka ma aagna ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:217a-28: aom kro dha aagna ye dza hi tro tra ya h'um /
T02D2589:217a-29: che ge mo m'a ra ya h'um phat /
T02D2589:217a-31: sngar bshad pa'i bsang gtor gyi chogs bsangs la mchod yon dbul lo //
T02D2589:217a-32: ai yam aa rgham m'a yam da ttam gri hna
T02D2589:217a-33: siddhi mme pra yatstsha sv'a h'a zhes brjod la lag
T02D2589:217a-34: pa gnyis kyis mdun du mchod yon phul la /
T02D2589:217a-35: zhabs la zhabs bsil dbul lo //
T02D2589:217a-36: spyan drang ba la sogs pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2589:217a-37: de nas ji skad du bshad pa'i bsrung ba dang mchod pa la sogs pa byas la /
T02D2589:217a-38: rigs thams cad kyi bdag po nyid du gyur pas /
T02D2589:217a-39: rje btsun 'jam dpal gyi snying po lan bdun bzlas pa'i mar gyis nye bar gsal bar sbar la /
T02D2589:217a-40: de'i lce dang dgang gzar dang blug gzar gyi kha
T02D2589:217a-41: la de nyid kyi sa bon rnam par bkod de
T02D2589:217b-0: pus mo gnyis kyi bar du lag @217b pa bcug
T02D2589:217b-1: la dang por blugs gzar gyis mar gyi dgang blugs
T02D2589:217b-3: rgyas pa dang dbang dang dgug pa'i las la zhal cung zad gdangs par dbul lo //
T02D2589:217b-4: mngon spyod la shin tu gdangs par dug dang bcas pa'i yungs mar dbul lo //
T02D2589:217b-5: gnas skabs 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02D2589:217b-6: la la ni spyan gnyis la dbul bar bya ste /
T02D2589:217b-7: bltas pa tsam nyid kyis tshim par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2589:217b-8: la la ni dpral bar ro //
T02D2589:217b-10: la la ni thugs kar ro //
T02D2589:217b-11: la la ni lte ba'i gnas su'o //
T02D2589:217b-12: la la ni mdun du dbul bar bya'o zhes sna
T02D2589:217b-13: tshogs par rtog par byed pa'i gnas rab tu dgag
T02D2589:217b-15: yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sde
T02D2589:217b-16: snod shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud chen
T02D2589:217b-17: po las gnas kyi nges pa mdzad pa yin te
T02D2589:217b-19: zas ni zos par gyur pa yis //
T02D2589:217b-20: yid dga' ba la sogs par 'gyur //
T02D2589:217b-21: de bas 'bad pa chen po yis //
T02D2589:217b-22: sbyin sreg las ni nges par bya //
T02D2589:217b-24: de bas na zas kyi bya ba byed par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2589:217b-25: de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D2589:217b-26: ji ltar 'khor los sgyur ba gling bzhi'i dbang phyug
T02D2589:217b-27: gi rgyal po ni rin po che bdud kyi rgyu
T02D2589:217b-28: las byas pa'i snod kyi nang du kha dog dang
T02D2589:217b-29: dri dang ro rnams dang ldan pa phan zhing bde
T02D2589:217b-30: bar rnam par 'ju ba'i zas la spyod par byed
T02D2589:217b-31: do // de bzhin du gsang sngags kyi 'khor los sgyur ba chen po yang stong pa nyid dang /
T02D2589:217b-33: smon pa med pa dang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal
T02D2589:217b-34: ba'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi'i ngo bo nyid
T02D2589:217b-35: kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i gling chen po bzhir gsang
T02D2589:217b-36: sngags kyi rgyal po chen po mdzad pa /
T02D2589:217b-37: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi rin po che'i
T02D2589:217b-38: snod du gsang sngags kyi yi ge thams cad dang
T02D2589:217b-39: ldan pa dri nga ba thams cad dang bral ba'i
T02D2589:217b-40: tshul khrims kyi dri dang ldan pa zhi ba dang
T02D2589:217b-41: / drag po la sogs pa'i ro thams cad dang
T02D2589:217b-42: ldan pa sems can thams cad la phan pa dang
T02D2589:218a-1: smin pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi la longs spyod do //
T02D2589:218a-2: snod rnams ni las dang rjes su mthun par bya ste /
T02D2589:218a-3: de la snod kyi nges pa'i rim pa 'di yin no //
T02D2589:218a-4: zhi ba la ni dngul gyi snod do //
T02D2589:218a-5: rgyas pa la ni gser gyi snod do //
T02D2589:218a-6: dbang la ni zangs kyi snod do//
T02D2589:218a-7: mngon spyod la ni khar ba'i snod dam lcags kyi
T02D2589:218a-8: snod kyi phyi rol gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga
T02D2589:218a-10: nang gi sbyin sreg gi rim pa ni 'di yin no //
T02D2589:218a-11: 'di ltar phyi rol gyi sbyin sreg la las dang
T02D2589:218a-12: rjes su mthun par snod rnams bsams la lag pa
T02D2589:218a-14: mthe'u chung lcags sgrog tu sprel pas /
T02D2589:218a-15: blugs gzar bzung la sor mo lhag ma rnams yu ba'i steng du bzhag la /
T02D2589:218a-16: shin tu sbyangs shing legs par bzhu ba'i mar gyi
T02D2589:218a-17: dgang blugs phul la dge ba dang mi dge pa'i
T02D2589:218a-19: dbyibs dang mdog dang mdog dang dri dag las //
T02D2589:218a-20: dge dang mi dge yongs brtags la //
T02D2589:218a-21: dang po byas nas shes byas la /
T02D2589:218a-22: mtshan ma ngan pa zhi bya'i phyir //
T02D2589:218a-23: zhi ba yi ni cho ga yis //
T02D2589:218a-24: mnyam par bzhag la sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2589:218a-25: nyes pa'i dogs pa las 'das na //
T02D2589:218a-26: phyi nas las rnams brtsam par bya //
T02D2589:218a-27: dbyibs ni glang po che dang /
T02D2589:218a-40: blugs gzar lta bu bsngags so //
T02D2589:218a-43: byi ru bcag pa lta bu dang /
T02D2589:218a-47: gser zhun ma lta bu dang nyi ma 'bar ba dang /
T02D2589:218a-48: g-yas su 'khyil zhing shin tu snum pa bsngags so //
T02D2589:218a-49: sgra ni char sprin gyi 'brug sgra dang /
T02D2589:218a-62: ngang pa dang rma bya la sogs pa lta bur yid du 'ong ba'i sgra dag bsngags so //
T02D2589:218b-5: gla rtsi la sogs pa dang mtshungs pa'i dri bsngags so //
T02D2589:218b-6: de dag las bzlog pa ni bsngags pa ma yin te /
T02D2589:218b-7: dbyibs ni mdung rtse lta bu dang /
T02D2589:218b-9: ba lang gi mgo lta bu la sogs pa ni mi shis shing smad par bya ba yin no //
T02D2589:218b-10: mdog ni kha dog ngan pa dang //
T02D2589:218b-17: pa la sha la sogs pa'i mdog ni mi shis so //
T02D2589:218b-18: dri ni mi ro'i dri dang /
T02D2589:218b-19: dri ngan pa sna tshogs pa'i smad pa'i rdul dang /
T02D2589:218b-24: nya'i zhag la sogs pa'i dri ni smad pa yin no //
T02D2589:218b-26: khyi dang ce sbyang dang la sogs pa dang 'dra zhing 'ur 'ur po dang /
T02D2589:218b-27: sim sim zer ba'i sgra ni mi shis pa yin no //
T02D2589:218b-31: cung zad cung zad 'bar ba dang /
T02D2589:218b-34: rtsub cing gnag pa sprin dang /
T02D2589:218b-35: pa la sha'i mdog can ni smad par bya ba yin no //
T02D2589:218b-36: de ltar bgegs dang bcas shes nas rdo rje gnod
T02D2589:218b-37: sbyin gyi sngags dang phyag rgyas bsang zhing rnam par
T02D2589:218b-38: sbyangs la yang dag par gsungs te /
T02D2589:218b-39: mar gyi dgang blugs bdun sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2589:218b-40: yang rang gi sngags kyis bsangs la /
T02D2589:218b-41: dang por blugs gzar gyis dgang blugs gsum mam /
T02D2589:218b-42: bdun me'i rang gi sngags kyis sbyin sreg byas la /
T02D2589:218b-43: blugs gzar la sogs pas mar la sogs pa'i dgang blugs gsum mam /
T02D2589:218b-45: 'dir rim par ni yam shing gis me 'bar ba byas pa la mar dang /
T02D2589:218b-47: de'i 'og tu 'bras chan la sogs pa de nas zhu ba'i rdzas thams cad ni zhal du bya'o //
T02D2589:218b-48: yam shing dang mi rus kyi phye ma la sogs pa ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du'o //
T02D2589:218b-49: zho dang 'bras chan la sogs pa'i bza' ba dang /
T02D2589:218b-50: 'thor 'thung dang til la sogs pa ni phyag tu'o //
T02D2589:219a-1: yon dang mar me mdun du dbul bar bya'o zhes la la dag zer ro //
T02D2589:219a-2: de nas 'thor 'thung dang bsang gtor la sogs pa byas la /
T02D2589:219a-3: me lha thab khung du 'bar ba'i rnam pa'am /
T02D2589:219a-4: rang gi gzugs kyis me'i phyogs su gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2589:219a-5: 'di la log par bsgrub pa dag yod de /
T02D2589:219a-6: la la ni thab kyi phyi rol du me'i phyogs su 'jog par byed do //
T02D2589:219a-7: la la ni gshegs su gsol ba dag byed do //
T02D2589:219a-8: la la ni thab khung de nyid kyi nang du me'i phyogs su 'jog par byed do //
T02D2589:219a-9: de las thab kyi phyi rol du 'jog pa dang gshegs su gsol ba ni mi rigs te /
T02D2589:219a-10: lha rnams zhal ni me yin te //
T02D2589:219a-11: spyin sreg de nyid me la gnas //
T02D2589:219a-12: sbyin sreg gis ni tshim byas nas //
T02D2589:219a-13: dgyes pas dngos grub ster bar 'gyur //
T02D2589:219a-14: zhes gsungs pas mes stong par sbyor sreg byed pa
T02D2589:219a-15: ni mi ro'i khar zan stobs pa dang 'dra bar
T02D2589:219a-18: me yi gnas ni mi shes par //
T02D2589:219a-19: gang zhig sbyin sreg las byed pa //
T02D2589:219a-20: de ni sbyin sreg las byas min //
T02D2589:219a-23: thab khung gi phyogs gcig tu bkod pa dang /
T02D2589:219a-24: 'bar ba'i rnam par yongs su gyur par byas pa
T02D2589:219a-25: la yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha mi snang
T02D2589:219a-27: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2589:219a-28: ye shes kyi me lce yang dag par 'byung ba'i
T02D2589:219a-29: chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge yongs su gyur pa
T02D2589:219a-30: / shes par kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid las ma lus pa'i gzhir gyur pa /
T02D2589:219a-31: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi me'i thugs ka'i zla ba dang /
T02D2589:219a-32: padma'i steng du rang gi lha'i sa bon gyi yi
T02D2589:219a-33: ge yongs su gyur pa'i mtshan ma las byung ba'i
T02D2589:219a-34: las dang rjes su mthun pa'i rgyan dang kha dog
T02D2589:219a-36: yang dag par mchod cing 'thor 'thung sngon du 'gro bas dgang blugs la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2589:219a-38: me gnas kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D2589:219a-39: de la zhi ba la ni rdo rje rtse mo'i
T02D2589:219a-40: sngags kyis sbyin sreg gi yo byad rnams bsangs la
T02D2589:219b-0: / me thab kyi dbus su sku @219b mdog dkar zhing zhi ba /
T02D2589:219b-1: na bza' dkar po bsnams pa /
T02D2589:219b-3: padma dkar po la bzhugs par aom badzra dh'a tu
T02D2589:219b-4: sv'a h'a zhes bya ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das rnams
T02D2589:219b-5: par snang mdzad phyag gnyis byang chub mchog gi phyag
T02D2589:219b-6: rgya bcas pa dang ldan par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2589:219b-7: rgyas pa la ni de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan zhal dgyes shing mgu ba /
T02D2589:219b-8: na bza' ser po bsnams shing padma ser po la bzhugs par bsam par bya'o //
T02D2589:219b-9: mngon spyod la ni de bzhin du gshin rje gshed du 'dug pa rgyan dang /
T02D2589:219b-10: na bza' nag po dang ldan zhing khros pa yi
T02D2589:219b-11: ge h'um las byung ba sngar bshad pa'i gdan la
T02D2589:219b-13: dbang la ni ho las bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
T02D2589:219b-14: chags pa rgyan dang na bza' dmar po dang ldan
T02D2589:219b-16: dgug pa la ni de bzhin du yi ge dza las rdo rje rgyal po bsam par bya'o //
T02D2589:219b-17: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo
T02D2589:219b-18: bo nyid yin pas rje btsun 'jam dpal nyid zhi
T02D2589:219b-19: ba la sogs pa'i las rnams la bsgom par bya'o
T02D2589:219b-20: // de nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang dpag bsam gyi shing dang /
T02D2589:219b-23: rdo rje dang rkang mgyogs dang /
T02D2589:219b-25: gser 'gyur rtsi dang bcud len la sogs pa dngos
T02D2589:219b-26: grub chen po bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir cho ga
T02D2589:219b-27: 'dis gsang sngags tshim par bya ba dang /
T02D2589:219b-29: yang dag par 'bar bar byas la de'i 'og tu bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2589:219b-30: rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung gi ngogs gnyis kyi
T02D2589:219b-31: la las rang gi lha'i gzugs brnyan byas la padma'i
T02D2589:219b-32: sbubs kyi nang du bcug ste /
T02D2589:219b-33: tshon gyis byugs nas padma'i skud pas dkris la mar dang sbrang rtsis nang bkang ste /
T02D2589:219b-36: padma sar phye mar btags pas gtor la /
T02D2589:219b-37: ga phur dang bdug pas bdugs te zhag gcig smyung
T02D2589:219b-38: bar gnas la de'i 'og tu zhag gsum gsang sngags
T02D2589:219b-39: 'di dang dri dkar po dang sbyar ba'i chu rgyun
T02D2589:219b-40: phra bas dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D2589:219b-41: aom sarba de ba aa tsa ti tya aa mrirta dha re sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:219b-42: aom h'um phat ni sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:220a-1: gyis thams cad zhugs par gyur pa dang /
T02D2589:220a-2: rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bo la bskyon te bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2589:220a-3: de ltar gsang sngags kyi lha tshim par byas na /
T02D2589:220a-4: dngos grub myur du stsol bar 'gyur ro /
T02D2589:220a-5: gzi brjid bskyed pa dang tshim par bya ba ni
T02D2589:220a-6: gsang sngags 'dis blugs gzar dang mar gyi sreg blugs
T02D2589:220a-7: dbul bar bya'o / aom hri kham sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:220a-8: de ltar sbyin sreg dang chu la gshegs su gsol ba dang /
T02D2589:220a-9: mchod pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2589:220a-10: de la bsreg par bya ba ni mar dang til dang /
T02D2589:220a-14: gshegs su gsol ba'i rdzas ni padma dang /
T02D2589:220a-18: dz'a ti'i me tog gi rigs rnams dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2589:220a-19: me tog de dag nyid kyis mchod pa dang sreg blugs kyang bya'o //
T02D2589:220a-20: de nas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i sbyin sreg gi grangs rdzogs pa dang /
T02D2589:220a-21: mtha' mar aom h'um hr'i: zhes bya ba'i de bzhin
T02D2589:220a-22: gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying pos mar gyi sreg
T02D2589:220a-23: blugs lan gsum mam bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig
T02D2589:220a-24: gis gzi brjid bskyed par bya'o /
T02D2589:220a-25: de'i mthar dgang blugs phul la /
T02D2589:220a-29: yang dag par mchod la legs par bstod de /
T02D2589:220a-30: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir gsol ba btab la bzod par gsol te /
T02D2589:220a-31: de nas sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2589:220a-32: aom mu: zhes brjod nas gyen du dkrol te /
T02D2589:220a-33: aom kri to ba sarbba sa tv'a tha //
T02D2589:220a-34: siddhi ma datt'a ya th'a nu ga //
T02D2589:220a-35: gatstsha tv'am buddh'a bi sha yam //
T02D2589:220a-36: pu na ra ga ma na yatstsha //
T02D2589:220a-37: zhes brjod la ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol nas /
T02D2589:220a-38: sprul pa'i me thab kyi dbus su bsams la yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2589:220a-39: bsang gtor dang 'thor 'thung la sogs pa sbyin la
T02D2589:220a-40: sreg rdzas kyi lhag ma rnams sbyin sreg bya ste
T02D2589:220a-41: / mthar dgang blugs pa dang 'thor 'thung yang byin
T02D2589:220a-42: nas bsang gtor yang byas la mchod nas mngon par
T02D2589:220a-43: 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir gsol ba btab la
T02D2589:220b-0: / / me lha sngar bshad @220b pa'i sngags dang
T02D2589:220b-1: phyag rgya de nyid bcings la mthe bong bsgreng ste
T02D2589:220b-2: / / / ya hi ya hi zhes bya ba dang gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D2589:220b-3: de nas sngar bshad pa'i cho gas gnas bsrung ba dang bdag bsrung ba byas la /
T02D2589:220b-4: yi ge brgya pa lan bdun bzlas nas rang gi
T02D2589:220b-5: dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa yang dag
T02D2589:220b-6: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos la
T02D2589:220b-8: dngos grub ma lus 'byung gnyis mtshor gyur cing //
T02D2589:220b-9: dpag med bde bskyed sbyin sreg de nyid ni //
T02D2589:220b-10: 'jam bcas mi gnas grags pa zhes bya ba //
T02D2589:220b-11: sems can phan phyir yang dag bshad pa yin ;
T02D2589:220b-12: / de nyid dam par bshad pa'i kun stong bdag nyid thab khung ni //
T02D2589:220b-13: rnam pa kun du thog mtha' med pa'i padma rdo rje ldan //
T02D2589:220b-14: nam mkha'i ngos ltar yangs la btags pa tsam gyis sa bon la //
T02D2589:220b-15: blo ngan bsregs nas shin tu 'bar la nyon mongs zhir ba zhi //
T02D2589:220b-16: bde gshegs sras bcas sngags kyis 'bar ba'i gzi brjid 'phro bas 'khyud //
T02D2589:220b-17: srid pa gsum gyis thab tu 'dus byas dngos po
T02D2589:220b-18: thams cad bsreg / blo gros ngan pa shin tu
T02D2589:220b-19: bsregs pas kun rtog kun las grol //
T02D2589:220b-20: nyon mongs gdung bzhi bar bshad pa'i zhi ba'i gdugs su bgyis //
T02D2589:220b-21: nang gi sbyin sreg dag tu rnam rtog dra ba rnams //
T02D2589:220b-22: bsreg par bya zhes thub pa'i zla ba dag gis gsungs //
T02D2589:220b-23: bgegs dang dngos grub rnams ni rnam par rtog pa tsam //
T02D2589:220b-24: gnyid med de nyid du ni rnam par rtog pa'ang stong pa yin //
T02D2589:220b-25: phyi dang nang gi dbye ba yis //
T02D2589:220b-26: rnam pa gnyis su 'dir bshad pa //
T02D2589:220b-27: sbyin sreg cho ga shes pa la //
T02D2589:220b-28: rnam pa kun du'ang dga' phyir ro //
T02D2589:220b-29: nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam par rjes 'gro rab gnas chos //
T02D2589:220b-30: de bzhin gshegs pas glegs bam rdo rje dril bu
T02D2589:220b-31: dag /'jig rten don dam mi shes 'di na'ang mgon
T02D2589:220b-32: po yis // 'jig rten phan par bzhed pas rab gnas mdzad pa yin //
T02D2589:220b-36: stang stabs dang bzlas brjod dang /
T02D2589:221a-0: slar bsdu ba rnams ni gsang sngags kyi tshul la de kho @221a * //
T02D2589:221a-1: na bcu yin par gsungs so //
T02D2589:221a-2: slob ma de nyid bcu shes shing //
T02D2589:221a-3: mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag ldan //
T02D2589:221a-4: sngags dang phyag rgya cho ga shes //
T02D2589:221a-5: las rnams kun la shin tu mkhas //
T02D2589:221a-6: lha khang mchod rten sku gzugs dang //
T02D2589:221a-7: dam chos glegs bam ras ris dag / zin cing thams cad rdzogs pa dang //
T02D2589:221a-8: bde ba'i yon tan kun bskyed pa //
T02D2589:221a-9: shes nas mtshan nyid la mkhas pas //
T02D2589:221a-10: rab tu gnas pa byed par 'os //
T02D2589:221a-11: bsod nams 'phel par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2589:221a-12: gtsug lag khang sogs khyad 'phags bya //
T02D2589:221a-13: steng g-yogs mchod rten gnas rnams dang //
T02D2589:221a-14: khyim dang lha yi khang par yang //
T02D2589:221a-15: sangs rgyas la sogs rab gnas pa //
T02D2589:221a-16: cho ga las gsungs bzhin du bya //
T02D2589:221a-17: cho ga nyams par mi bya ste //
T02D2589:221a-18: rab gnas rtag tu smod pa dang //
T02D2589:221a-19: tshe 'dir sdug bsngal chen po dang //
T02D2589:221a-21: de bas dngos grub 'dod pa yis //
T02D2589:221a-22: bdag nyid kyis ni ci nus dang //
T02D2589:221a-23: de bzhin cho ga gsungs tshul gyis //
T02D2589:221a-24: kun nas rab tu 'bad de bya //
T02D2589:221a-25: de ltar byas na bsod nams che //
T02D2589:221a-26: mthong dang ma mthong skye 'gyur la //
T02D2589:221a-27: sngags pa bzang pos sku gzugs ni //
T02D2589:221a-28: dgos par gyur pa de las byung //
T02D2589:221a-29: gang du sku gzugs zin nas ni //
T02D2589:221a-30: yun rings nas kyang ma mchod na //
T02D2589:221a-31: ji srid mchod gnas ma gyur pas //
T02D2589:221a-32: de nas mi shis skye bar 'gyur //
T02D2589:221a-33: ji ltar skyes bu la la zhig / rigs dang mtshan nyid med pa dag //
T02D2589:221a-34: 'jig rten kun gyis bkur mi byed //
T02D2589:221a-35: sku gzugs dag kyang de bzhin 'gyur //
T02D2589:221a-36: sku gzugs rab gnas ma byas par //
T02D2589:221a-38: sngags dang bral bas thal bar ni //
T02D2589:221a-39: sbyin sreg byas bzhin 'bras bu med //
T02D2589:221a-40: de bzhin 'dir ni sngags me gnas //
T02D2589:221a-41: mchod gnas mchod par byed pa gang //
T02D2589:221a-42: las de yi ni rnam smin gyis //
T02D2589:221a-43: skye ba kun du mchod mi 'gyur //
T02D2589:221a-44: byang chub sems dpas gsol pa //
T02D2589:221a-45: bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir rab tu gnas pa med
T02D2589:221a-46: pa'i chos rnams la rgyal bas rab tu gnas par
T02D2589:221a-47: mdzad // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
T02D2589:221b-0: sangs rgyas @221b kun du gnas gyur kyang //
T02D2589:221b-1: de ni gang la'ang gnas pa med //
T02D2589:221b-2: nam mkha' bzhin du thams cad du //
T02D2589:221b-3: gnas pa thams cad rab tu brtag /'jig rten kun rdzob la gnas nas //
T02D2589:221b-4: rab tu gnas par yongs brtags kyi //
T02D2589:221b-5: don dam tshul du gang zhig la //
T02D2589:221b-6: gang gis gang du rab gnas bya //
T02D2589:221b-7: gzod nas zhi zhing skye med la //
T02D2589:221b-8: 'di lta'i rab gnas ji ltar bya //

T02D2589:221b-10: rgyud rnams yang dag sbyang phyir byas //
T02D2589:221b-11: de la dang po re re zhig yongs su brtag pa'i gnas nye bar sbyangs par gdugs dang /
T02D2589:221b-15: spos dang me tog la sogs pa dang /

T02D2589:221b-17: gyi nyi ma shis pa dang skar ma bzang po
T02D2589:221b-18: la slob dpon shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas /

T02D2589:221b-20: gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la
T02D2589:221b-21: sogs pa rnams la phyag byas te /

T02D2589:221b-23: thig gdab cing gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pa dang /

T02D2589:221b-31: dga' ldan na ni bzhugs pa las //

T02D2589:221b-34: 'dir zhugs rtag tu mgon por ni //
T02D2589:221b-35: gyur nas me tog la sogs 'di //
T02D2589:221b-36: byang chub sems ni 'phel ba'i phyir //

T02D2589:221b-38: sku gzugs lhag par gnas byas la //

T02D2589:221b-40: slob ma smyung bar gnas pa yis //
T02D2589:221b-41: bya ba 'di dag thams cad spyad //
T02D2589:221b-42: sngags pa gang dag ci sgom dang //
T02D2589:221b-43: cho ga mchod la sogs pa bya //
T02D2589:221b-44: g-yo med pa yis byas gyur na //
T02D2589:221b-45: mchod sbyin chen po'i 'bras bu thob //
T02D2589:221b-46: spyan drangs gdan la bzhugs gsol dang //
T02D2589:222a-0: de bzhin mchod yon me tog @222a * //
T02D2589:222a-2: / spos dang mar me lha bshos te /

T02D2589:222a-5: ras ni ser pos g-yogs par bya //
T02D2589:222a-6: sbyang bas legs par bsal bya zhing //
T02D2589:222a-7: de nas sngags 'dir yung skar ni //
T02D2589:222a-8: chu 'am yang na me nang du ;
T02D2589:222a-9: / lan cig yongs su gtang bar bya //
T02D2589:222a-10: aom sarbba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:222a-12: de nas rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i skur bsams la dbu la yi ge aom /
T02D2589:222a-13: zhal la yi ge hr'i: thugs kar yi ge h'um dgod do //
T02D2589:222a-14: yang na gang dang gang gi sa bon gang yin pa de //
T02D2589:222a-15: de'i thugs kar dgod par bya'o //
T02D2589:222a-16: de nas der ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang /
T02D2589:222a-19: dbang du byas la bsgrub bo //
T02D2589:222a-20: de nas til mar dri chen gyis bskus la d'ur wa'i pir gyis sbyang zhing bkru'o //
T02D2589:222a-21: til mar gyi sngags ni aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya bi sho dha ne sv'a h'a //
T02D2589:222a-22: bum pa lnga'am brgyad rin po che lnga dang /
T02D2589:222a-23: 'bru lnga sman ldan dang ldan zhing dri zhim po'i spos chus yongs su gang ba /
T02D2589:222a-24: mgul pa ras bzang pos bcings la //
T02D2589:222a-25: aa mra'i lo ma la sogs pas kha bkab pa

T02D2589:222a-27: bya'o // aom bi shuddha badzrod ka h'um /
T02D2589:222a-28: aom dzin dzi ka sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:222a-29: aom a'a ro li ka sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:222a-31: zhes rigs kyi dbye bas mngon par bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2589:222a-32: dbang bskur ba'i cho ga dang /
T02D2589:222a-33: de bzhin rig pa sbyang dang ni //
T02D2589:222a-34: bkra shis zhes grags yid 'od pa'i //
T02D2589:222a-35: tshigs bcad 'di ni brjod par bya //
T02D2589:222a-36: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D2589:222a-37: lha rnams kun gyis khrus gsol ba //
T02D2589:222a-38: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02D2589:222a-39: de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo //
T02D2589:222a-40: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka
T02D2589:222a-41: sa ma ya shri ye h'um spyan gyi sngags ni
T02D2589:222a-42: // aom ru ru sphu ru tishatha siddha lo tsa ne //
T02D2589:222a-43: sarbb'a rtha s'a dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:222a-44: lugs ma khrus ni bya bar gsungs //
T02D2589:222a-45: ri mo me long dag la bkru //
T02D2589:222a-46: ras ris cu ni med bya'am //
T02D2589:222a-47: lag pa slar yang bsang gtor bya //
T02D2589:222a-48: ga phur gur kum bcas pa yi //
T02D2589:222a-49: ras dkar zung gis dgab par bya //
T02D2589:222a-50: aom badzra bha ba se sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:222b-0: aom badzra @222b aa bhirna bi bhu sha ne sv'a h'a //
T02D2589:222b-1: dkyil 'khor dbus su bcug nas ni //
T02D2589:222b-2: de nas rang gi dam tshig bsgrags //
T02D2589:222b-3: sngags dang phyag rgyas rab bskur bas //
T02D2589:222b-4: ci rigs par ni dbang bskur bya //
T02D2589:222b-6: de bzhin du ni cod pan dang dar dbyangs bcing ba byas la bzhugs su gsol lo //
T02D2589:222b-7: de yang 'og tu shin tu dung pa dang /
T02D2589:222b-8: de ni mi yo drang por ni //
T02D2589:222b-9: sku gzugs yang dag gzhag bya ste //
T02D2589:222b-10: de ltar min na nyes bskyed 'gyur //
T02D2589:222b-11: mar tog spos dang de bzhin dri //
T02D2589:222b-12: de bzhin mar me na bza' ste //
T02D2589:222b-13: de kun gsang sngags ldan par ni //
T02D2589:222b-14: lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya//
T02D2589:222b-18: sngags kyis bsang byas bshos bsngogs te /
T02D2589:222b-19: gser las byas pa'i thur ma yis //
T02D2589:222b-20: spyan ni dbye ba byas nas ni //
T02D2589:222b-21: zhal zas de ni mkhas pas bstabs //
T02D2589:222b-22: aom badzra tsa kashu sa manta tsa kashu bi sho dha ni sv'a ha'/
T02D2589:222b-23: aom di bya aan sa m'a d'i dhya na pri na ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:222b-24: de ltar byas nas de nas yang //
T02D2589:222b-25: shes rab can gyi slob ma gzhug //
T02D2589:222b-26: khyod kyis nga la gsol btab pa'i //
T02D2589:222b-27: sku gzugs dag ni khyad par du //
T02D2589:222b-28: ji skad gsungs bzhin rab gnas pa //
T02D2589:222b-29: de ni ngas bcas byed du bcug //
T02D2589:222b-30: khyed kyis de ni kun rdzogs pas //
T02D2589:222b-31: ci bde bar ni mchod par gyis //
T02D2589:222b-32: de bas dbang bskur dam tshig la gnas par byas nas //
T02D2589:222b-33: sbyin blugs stong ngam de'i phyed dam de'i phyed kyi
T02D2589:222b-34: mngar gsum dang bsres pa'i 'bru thams cad kyis sbyin
T02D2589:222b-35: sreg bya'o // bdag nyid dang ni slob ma kun //
T02D2589:222b-36: zhi dang rgyas pa 'phel bya'i phyir //
T02D2589:222b-37: thab khung zur ni bzhi pa la //
T02D2589:222b-38: 'o ma can shing bud shing bya //
T02D2589:222b-39: de yi yam shing 'o ma mar //
T02D2589:222b-40: bshos kyi lhag ma dbul bar bya //
T02D2589:222b-41: aom badzra a'a yu she sv'a h'a zhes bya ba
T02D2589:222b-42: la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga las gsungs
T02D2589:222b-43: pa bzhin zhi ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2589:222b-44: gtsug lag khang ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D2589:222b-46: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas ting nge
T02D2589:222b-47: 'dzin sna tshogs kyi gzhal yas khang chos kyi dbyings
T02D2589:222b-48: ltar yangs par yid kyis sngags 'dis bskyed par bya'o
T02D2589:223a-0: // aom h'um hr'i: de nas lhag par @223a * //
T02D2589:223a-2: mchod pa la sogs pa byas la //
T02D2589:223a-3: dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga las bshad pa'i cho gas gtor ma byin te /
T02D2589:223a-4: yang mchod pa byas nas rab tu gnas pa bya'o //
T02D2589:223a-5: aom su pra tishtha badzre sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:223a-6: aom h'um hr'i: bhu kham badzr'i bha ba dri dha tishtha bhu kham zhes bya'o //
T02D2589:223a-7: de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02D2589:223a-8: rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pas byin gyis
T02D2589:223a-9: brlabs pas rdo rje ltar mi phyed cing legs par
T02D2589:223a-10: rab tu gnas pa bsams la bus pa lnga'am //
T02D2589:223a-11: brgyad dam bcu drug spos chus yongs su gang zhing //
T02D2589:223a-12: mngon par bsngags pas gtsug lag khang ma lus par bsang gtor bya'o //
T02D2589:223a-13: de'i sngags ni aom badzrod ka aa bhi shinytsa //
T02D2589:223a-14: de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngar bstan pa'i cho gas rab tu gnas par bya'o //
T02D2589:223a-15: de nas gtsug lag khang skyong du dang po chen po dgug pa dang /
T02D2589:223a-18: dbang du bya ba byas la rdo rje h'um mdzad
T02D2589:223a-19: kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pas lung bsgo bar bya
T02D2589:223a-20: ste // ji srid gtsug lag khang 'di gnas pa de srid kyi bar du khyod kyis srungs shig //
T02D2589:223a-21: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun gyi bka' yang khyod kyis sgrubs shig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
T02D2589:223a-22: de bzhin du 'phags pa'i mchod rten yang lhag par gnas pa dang /
T02D2589:223a-24: mchod pa la sogs pa dang por byas la //
T02D2589:223a-25: yi ge bhr'um las rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D2589:223a-26: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma yongs su gyur pa las mchod rten gyi gzugs su bskyed cing //
T02D2589:223a-28: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gzhal yas khang du bsams la //
T02D2589:223a-29: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D2589:223a-31: rig pa'i lha thams cad spyan drangs te //
T02D2589:223a-32: bcug la mchod rten du bzhag ste mnyes par byas
T02D2589:223a-33: la khrus dang mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad kyis
T02D2589:223a-35: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa bhisheka sa ma ya shri ye h'um //
T02D2589:223a-36: aom su pra tishtha badzra sv'a h'a /
T02D2589:223a-37: aom h'um hr'i: bh'um tri tra tishtha zhes bya bas rab tu gnas par bya'o //
T02D2589:223a-38: de nas phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D2589:223a-39: pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par bsam par bya'o
T02D2589:223b-0: // lhag ma @223b ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2589:223b-1: dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam rab tu gnas par bya ba ni 'di ltar bya ste //
T02D2589:223b-2: gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten dang /
T02D2589:223b-3: ras ris dang glegs bam dag ni me long nyid la bkru'o //
T02D2589:223b-4: lhag par gnas pa la sogs pa thams cad ni snga ma bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2589:223b-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge'i rnam pa yongs su gyur nas //
T02D2589:223b-6: kun rdzob dang don dam par ston par bsams la //
T02D2589:223b-7: aom pradznye shru te ma rti bi dza ye sv'a h'a zhes pa dang //
T02D2589:223b-8: aom h'um hr'i: tham zhes bya bas kyang rab tu gnas pa dang dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2589:223b-9: sngags ston pa'i glegs bam ni rdo rje chos yi
T02D2589:223b-10: ge'i gzugs su yongs su gyur pa las sngags kyi
T02D2589:223b-11: gzugs kyi skus 'khor ba na 'gro ba ma lus
T02D2589:223b-12: pa'i don mdzad par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2589:223b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02D2589:223b-14: rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bsam mo //
T02D2589:223b-16: gtor ma la sogs pa ni sku gzugs spyan dbye ba'i cho ga bzhin du bya'o //
T02D2589:223b-17: de nas sil snyan dang rol mo byas la gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D2589:223b-18: rdzogs sangs rgyas dang lha rnams dang //
T02D2589:223b-19: de sras tshangs sogs lha tshogs kun //
T02D2589:223b-20: gang zhig cho ga'i bya ba ni //
T02D2589:223b-21: nongs gyur de dag bzod mdzad rigs //
T02D2589:223b-22: sbyin bdag rnams la zhi ba dang //
T02D2589:223b-23: bde legs chen po kun mdzad de //
T02D2589:223b-24: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol //
T02D2589:223b-25: slar yang 'byon par mdzad du gsol //
T02D2589:223b-27: bskal pa brgya las lhag gnas zhing //
T02D2589:223b-28: sa dang me dang chu dang ni //
T02D2589:223b-29: rlung las lha rnams kun gyis bsrungs //
T02D2589:223b-30: slob dpon slob ma bcas pa dang //
T02D2589:223b-31: bu dang tsha bo rnams bsrungs te //
T02D2589:223b-32: rab dga' yid bder gyur nas ni //
T02D2589:223b-33: rab gnas bzang po dag tu bzhud //
T02D2589:223b-34: shes rab ye shes dri med pa'i //
T02D2589:223b-35: mnyam med de la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D2589:223b-36: rdo rje dril bu'i mtshan nyid dang //
T02D2589:223b-37: bye brag rnams ni bshad par bya //
T02D2589:223b-38: gser sogs las byas rdo rje ni //
T02D2589:223b-39: rtse lnga 'od zer bcas pa la //
T02D2589:223b-40: chang gzungs cha gsum mdzes pa dang //
T02D2589:223b-41: ra dang rtse mo'i bye brag can //
T02D2589:223b-42: tshad ni sor bzhi dag dang ni //
T02D2589:223b-43: brgyad dang bcu dang bcu gnyis dang /
T02D2589:224a-0: @224a * // bcu drug de bzhin nyi shu ste //
T02D2589:224a-1: de las nyung dang lhag par min //
T02D2589:224a-2: rdo rje brgyad po nges pa yi //
T02D2589:224a-3: tshad yin par ni bshad pa yin //
T02D2589:224a-4: mdzes shing ma zhag 'jam pa dang //
T02D2589:224a-5: brtan zhing ma gas sra bar 'gyur //
T02D2589:224a-6: sor bzhi pa yi tshad dag ni //
T02D2589:224a-7: de las nyes 'gyur tha ma yin //
T02D2589:224a-8: sum 'gyur rdo rje bar ma ste //
T02D2589:224a-9: bzhi 'gyur dag ni mchog yin no //
T02D2589:224a-10: chur ni gsum du byas pa yi //
T02D2589:224a-11: dbus ma'i cha ni zlum por bya //
T02D2589:224a-12: dkyil ma brgyad chas mtho bar bya //
T02D2589:224a-13: zlum po ra rtse gsum pa la //
T02D2589:224a-14: cha gcig dbus su gnas par bya //
T02D2589:224a-15: khro gnyer sna tshogs ldan pa dang /
T02D2589:224a-16: rin chen 'dab ma myu gu dang //
T02D2589:224a-17: padma de bzhin gnyis su bya //
T02D2589:224a-18: ra ni cha gsum gnas pa las //
T02D2589:224a-19: cha gcig dag ni dkyil du gzhag //
T02D2589:224a-20: sor gcig brgyad car bya ba ni //
T02D2589:224a-21: dbus ma'i ra yi bar zhes bya //
T02D2589:224a-22: gzhan rnams cho ga ji bzhin bya //
T02D2589:224a-23: zur bzhi shin tu rno ba dang ;
T02D2589:224a-24: / dkyil sbom rtse mo phra ba la //
T02D2589:224a-25: 'og dpag gsum dang ldan zhing rdzogs //
T02D2589:224a-26: dbus ma lhag bcas mdzes par bya //
T02D2589:224a-27: de bzhin phyogs kyi char bzhag pa'i //
T02D2589:224a-28: ra gzhan dag ni yan lag bzhi //
T02D2589:224a-29: phra zhing dbus su gug pa dang //
T02D2589:224a-30: dbus ma'i ra la 'dud pa ste //
T02D2589:224a-31: rgya ni dbus ma'i ra yi phyed //
T02D2589:224a-32: nas 'bru tsam gyis ma reg pa'o //
T02D2589:224a-33: chu srin mche ba gtsigs 'dra ba'i //
T02D2589:224a-34: chu srin kha nas dbyung bar bya //
T02D2589:224a-35: ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid ra //
T02D2589:224a-37: rno dang mi rno gyes pa dang //
T02D2589:224a-38: zhi ba dag dang rnam pa bzhi //
T02D2589:224a-39: phyi rol ra ni rgyar gyur pa //
T02D2589:224a-40: gang zhig de yi dbus ma mtshungs //
T02D2589:224a-41: gsang ba'i rdo rje rdo rje'i dbang //
T02D2589:224a-42: mtshan nyid dag gi khyad par ni //
T02D2589:224a-43: nang gi dbus ma'i ra dag ni //
T02D2589:224a-44: bzhi cha yis ni bskyed par bya //
T02D2589:224a-45: phyi rol gri gug dbyibs 'dra la //
T02D2589:224a-46: rno zhing rtse mo gyes par bya //
T02D2589:224a-48: chu srin gdong gis zin par bya //
T02D2589:224a-49: rdo rje rtse gsum gang yin par //
T02D2589:224a-50: mtshams dag tu ni gnas par bya //
T02D2589:224a-51: de bzhin sna tshogs par gyur pa //
T02D2589:224a-52: rdo rje rgya gram min par bshad //
T02D2589:224a-53: de yang dpung bzangs kyi rgyud las //
T02D2589:224a-54: sgrub pa pos ni nges par 'chang ba yi //
T02D2589:224b-0: rdo rje gang yin de ni 'dir @224b bshad bya ;
T02D2589:224b-1: / sor bcu bcu gnyis bcu drug bco brgyad dang //
T02D2589:224b-2: mchog gi tshang ni sor yang nyi shu'o //
T02D2589:224b-3: gser gyi rdo rje rig 'dzin nyid dang ni //
T02D2589:224b-4: sa ni thob par bya phyir rab tu shis //
T02D2589:224b-5: rgyal po'i don du dngul ni mchog yin te //
T02D2589:224b-6: zangs kyi rin chen 'byung ba'i glu bskul la //
T02D2589:224b-7: lha min dbang po 'khrul 'khor gzhig pa dang //
T02D2589:224b-8: phub tu 'gro ba rdo yi rdo rje'o //
T02D2589:224b-9: don kun bsgrub pa la ni lcags gsum gyi //
T02D2589:224b-10: gnod sbyin sde 'joms pa la lcags kyi'o //
T02D2589:224b-11: don gzhan la ni sed ldeng dpal dang tshe //
T02D2589:224b-12: nad med nor rdzas la ni bil ba'o //
T02D2589:224b-13: gnod sbyin ma bsgrub pa la ma dhu'i shing //
T02D2589:224b-14: chos kyi don du aa shvad las byas shing //
T02D2589:224b-15: gsal zhing rtse mo dgar rnams gzhig pa la //
T02D2589:224b-16: mi rnams pa sang pa la ni mi rus kyi //
T02D2589:224b-17: shel las byas pa'i mig 'phrul chen po la //
T02D2589:224b-18: dbye phyir nim pa las byas rab tu shis //
T02D2589:224b-19: bsad cing skam la ba ru ra yi shing //
T02D2589:224b-20: sha za bsgrub pa la yang rtag tu shis //
T02D2589:224b-21: lha dang gnod sbyin dri za bsgrub pa la //
T02D2589:224b-22: sgron shing las ni byas pa'i rdo rje'i //
T02D2589:224b-23: ji ste rlung ni dbang du byed 'dod na //
T02D2589:224b-24: de tshe klu shing rtsa las byed pa'o //
T02D2589:224b-25: gzugs bsgyur pa la sa las byas pa'o //
T02D2589:224b-26: ro langs bsgrub pa la ni ka dam pa'i //
T02D2589:224b-27: bu nam ga dang ra ja aarka dang //
T02D2589:224b-28: aa shvad shing gi rdo rje nor gyi phyir //
T02D2589:224b-29: bla ba aa mra shri barna ba //
T02D2589:224b-30: aardzu la sogs pa las byas pa ni //
T02D2589:224b-31: mi rnams g-yul las rgyal bar bya phyir ro //
T02D2589:224b-32: yid du 'ong ba'i 'dod pa thob bya'i phyir //
T02D2589:224b-33: tsandan dkar po dang ni dmar po ste //
T02D2589:224b-34: dbyibs legs 'jam zhing ma nyams rma med pa'o //
T02D2589:224b-35: rdo rje rtse lnga sra ba bcang bar bya //
T02D2589:224b-36: dang po zlos tshe de ni thogs nas su //
T02D2589:224b-37: bzlas brjod zin na myur ba kho nar ni //
T02D2589:224b-38: dad pa'i sems kyis phyag byas dri sogs kyis //
T02D2589:224b-39: mchod nas rdo rje rgyal ba'i zhabs drung gzhag //
T02D2589:224b-40: nga yi rigs kyi gsang sngags sgrub pa pos //
T02D2589:224b-41: rdo rje med na 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2589:224b-42: de las gcig kyang rnyed par ma gyur na //
T02D2589:224b-43: khu tshur bcangs la rtse gcig sems kyis bzlas //
T02D2589:224b-45: lcags gsum las byas dril bu mthar //
T02D2589:224b-46: phyi la padma ba lang kha //
T02D2589:224b-47: rdo rje padma bde gshegs rigs //
T02D2589:225a-0: @225a * // las mchog dgu ni skyed par byed //
T02D2589:225a-1: rdo rje la sogs ma ldan dang //
T02D2589:225a-2: khong stong lce dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2589:225a-3: gru bzhi mnyam pa'i kha cher dang //
T02D2589:225a-4: rtse mo mdung gi gnas dang bcas //
T02D2589:225a-5: cha bzhi rnam par spangs pa ni //
T02D2589:225a-6: bil ba dpal nor rgyas pa thob //
T02D2589:225a-8: khong stong rkang pa drug dang ldan //
T02D2589:225a-10: zhi dang rgyas pa'i don ston te //
T02D2589:225a-11: cha gsum yongs su dor bar ni //
T02D2589:225a-12: mtshan ma phreng ba ska rags bcas //
T02D2589:225a-13: skye med don gyi zab pa dang //
T02D2589:225a-14: shes rab sgra yi rjes 'gro dbyangs //
T02D2589:225a-15: 'og pu ska rags ldan pa yi //
T02D2589:225a-16: ba lang kha ni mchog tu bshad //
T02D2589:225a-17: dril bu zur bzhi mnyam pa dang /
T02D2589:225a-18: sor ni bdun dang brgyad dang bcu //
T02D2589:225a-19: rigs ni lnga po kun la yang //
T02D2589:225a-20: dngos grub thams cad ster byed gsungs //
T02D2589:225a-21: de ltar dril bu gsum mnyam par //
T02D2589:225a-22: rdo rje padma sogs kyis brgyan //
T02D2589:225a-23: bum pa dang ni ldan pa ru //
T02D2589:225a-24: blugs pas dngos grub ster bar bshad //
T02D2589:225a-25: 'di ni dril bu'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2589:225a-26: nam mkha' dri med dkyil 'khor legs bris pa'i //
T02D2589:225a-27: rnam par dkar ba'i dge ba gang yin des //
T02D2589:225a-28: 'gro kun lta ngan sprin tshogs rnams bsal te //
